T04ksmadhlu:2: vaśena grastā hi praṇaṣṭaprajñā nāgārjunādīṃśca mahāmahimnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:7: paramārthagambhīrodadhinayamanavagāhya atra kecidāhuḥ - yuktyāgamābhyāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sidhyatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:12: prekṣakāstatpravacanamata - mabhyupagamyamānebhyo 'pi niḥsaṃśayaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpratipādakaṃ kimapi vacanamupadarśayituṃ na śaknuvanti
T04ksmadhlu:18: trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ parikalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannānāṃ kramaśaḥ lakṣaṇata utpattitaḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ sandhāya sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā
T04ksmadhlu:26: tena sarvabhāvā api mṛṣā eva vyavasthāpyante /
T04ksmadhlu:31: na khalu sarve bhāvāḥ pratyakṣata evaṃ viviktāḥ [śūnyāḥ] anubhūyante /
T04ksmadhlu:33: abhāvāya tāvad nīrūpatayā na kathamapi svarūpopadarśanena vijñānajanakatvaṃ yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:40: atha kaiścid arthāntarā viviktateti pakṣo gṛhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:41: tadā itareṇa tāvat pratyakṣeṇa śūnyatā grāhyā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:42: sarvadharmaḥsvabhāvavādiṣu ye kecana [dharmāḥ] pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante [te] sarve dharmā viviktāḥ pratīyeran /
T04ksmadhlu:47: [5] ayaṃ tāvad [viṣayaḥ] sarvajñādīnāṃ yogināṃ pratyakṣeṇa sugamya ityucyamāne 'pi na khalu vidvadbhyastṛptimāsādayati,
T04ksmadhlu:53: [6] nāpyanumānenāpi 'sarve bhāvāḥ śūnyāḥ' iti sādhayituṃ śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:56: svabhāvāśrayarahitaiḥ sarvahetubhiḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā sādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:57: [7] paraiḥ siddhatvāt parābhyupagatahetvādibhiḥ svapakṣaḥ prasidhyediti cet tadāpi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:59: ithaṃ yadā parābhyupagatahetvādayo yadi na vāstavikāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:66: parābhyupagatasādhanādayo yadi sanmātrā evābhyupeyante tadā bhāvā api sasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ nābhyupeyante?
T04ksmadhlu:67: [8] sarvadharmaśūnyatā kutrāpi kenāpi hetunā na sambaddhā,
T04ksmadhlu:69: yadi [sambandhaḥ] siddhaḥ syāt tadā sarve tattvadarśinaḥ syuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:70: pūrvata eva siddhatvād yuktyanusaraṇamapi nirarthakaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:71: [9] api ca, na tāvat kāryasvabhāvaliṅgābhyāṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā /
T04ksmadhlu:73: tvanmate tu etau [kāryasvabhāvau] na sambhavataḥ tathā hi - sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena kasyāpi kenāpi saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānabhyupetatvāt kāryahetustāvanna sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:74: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvena kasyāpi ātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāsattvāt kutastāvat svabhāvahetuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:77: sā taditaraviviktasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratītau satyāmapi asacchāstraśravaṇavimūḍhamanasā
T04ksmadhlu:79: tava tu sādhyamānasarvadharmābhāvavyavahārasya pratyakṣataḥ jñānārthaṃ kiñcidapi nāstyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:82: atyantaparokṣāt sarvadharmavivekāt sahānavasthānavirodhenāpi na kiñcidapi sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:83: yadi sidhyet tadā tadviruddhādayo bhāvatvenaiva sidhyeyurityanabhyupetā na syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:86: ye tatrāvikalakāraṇāni tebhyo niyataṃ yasminna bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:89: yad yasmin parihriyate yanna vicchidyate tayorubhayorabhāvayordvitīyo virodho vyavasthāpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:91: tathāvidhau dvāvapi virodhau sarvadharmāniḥsvabhāvavādiṣu naiva sambhavataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:92: gaganāravindādiṣu na santi avikalakāraṇānyapi tathā nāsti atadvyāvṛttyā paricchedo 'pi bhāvaparyantavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:93: sattāvyavacchena yadyapi paricchedo vyavasthāpyate tathāpi kutracit kācit,
T04ksmadhlu:95: kintu bhavantastāvat kutrāpi kasyāpi vyavacchedaṃ kathamapi naivābhyupagacchanti /
T04ksmadhlu:96: yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatāpratyāsannāstadā yuṣmāsu kimapyavikalakāraṇasattvaṃ na sidhyet /
T04ksmadhlu:99: tadā ta evāsmāsu vastusantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ tadviruddhopalabdhyasambhavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:103: [13] vyāpakānupalabdhirapi vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau vyāpyaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatvaṃ tu tāvanna kasyāpi vyāpyaṃ sidhyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:104: yadi sidhyatīti cet tad vyāpyameva hi vastutayā siddhaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:105: [14] kāraṇānupalabdhirapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau kāryatvaniṣedhāya yadi prayujyate tadā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva siddho na bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:106: yadi siddhastadā yat kāraṇaṃ yaccāpi vā kāryaṃ tadeva vastu syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:107: [15] sarvadharmeṣu kasyāpyekasya niṣedhād eteṣāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapyekaṃ kāraṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:110: eteṣāṃ pratisvaṃ nimittānyapi niṣeddhuṃ na śakyante,
T04ksmadhlu:112: [17] api ca, nairātmyaṃ yadi sarvadharmagocaratāyāṃ sādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:120: [19] yadi lokaprasiddhā rupādayastadā dṛṣṭānta eva tāvannopalabhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:126: yadi sa nirākriyate tadā pratyakṣasyaiva bādhaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:127: yadi sa badhyate tadā nānumānasyāpi sausthityam /
T04ksmadhlu:128: pratyakṣasambandhādanuprāptānumānenāpi sa eva kathaṃ bādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:129: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho na bādhyate tadā vastuvādināmeva sausthityam,
T04ksmadhlu:131: [21] api ca, sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sādhayitu yadi kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo hetuḥ pradarśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:133: [22] yadi abhāvasvabhāvastadā asadabhavayoḥ parasparasambandhāabhāvāt kathaṃ sādhayiṣyati?
T04ksmadhlu:137: yato hi tat sādhayituṃ nānyat kimapi pramāṇamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:141: yato hi yadi niḥsvabhāvastadā kathaṃ sa siddhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:169: yanna svato nobhayato nāpi vinaṣṭāddhetornāpyahetuto nābhīṣṭānnityāddhetoḥ kāryotpattirbhavatīti tathāvādinastat [sarvaṃ] yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:174: yato hi yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadeva 'para'ḥ ityabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:175: kāryotpādāt prāk pareti nāmro 'siddhatve 'pi bhāvasya tu naiva hāniḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:181: yadyevamasti tadā kasmiṃścidaparasmin drāridrayamūḍhatvādidharmāṇāṃ dṛśyatvena paratvahetoḥ sarvajagaddāridrayādidharmopādānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:182: [28] avyavahitādavinaṣṭāt parāt kāryotpattau kāryakāraṇasamakālikatvaprasaṅgo bādhakapraṇamiti yadi kaścidevaṃ manyate,
T04ksmadhlu:189: yathā avyavahitavinaṣṭo bhāva uttarakṣaṇabhāvinā bhāvena saha yugapad vyavasthāpyo na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:192: yathā ca pūrvāparāvyavadhānena pravahamānajaladhārāyāṃ viṣayaikatvaṃ na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:193: tathaiva asyāpi tatsadṛśatvāt samakālikatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
T04ksmadhlu:198: yadi vidyamānakāryasyotpattinirṣidhyate tadā tava [pakṣe] ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaśca na syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:202: naiva ca syāt śaśaśṛṅgādyutpattiprasaṅgaḥ tattathāvidhahetūnāmabhāvādanutpatteḥ na tvabhāvāddhetoḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:206: anyathā sāṃvṛtike 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve kathaṃ na sarvataḥ sarvotpattirbhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:207: [31] api ca, yadi vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭādayo vikalpāḥ pāramārthikīmutpattiṃ bādhante,
T04ksmadhlu:209: vastubalapravṛttasya hetorviṣasya puruṣecchāvaśena vibhāgo na yuktarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:210: yadi patyakṣabādhitatvāśaṅkayā tasmin hetutvaṃ na pravartata ityucyeta tarhi sa hetureva nāsti,
T04ksmadhlu:222: tadanantaraṃ yadi sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirna bhavettadā sarveṣāmandhabadhiratvādiprasaṅga ityapi kathanaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:228: anekasmād vā ekasyotpattiḥ [tataḥ sa] viruddho hetusvabhāvātikrānto janakatvenānabhyupagato bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:229: tathāpi vidyamānamātrādanekasvabhāvāt pradīpādeḥ anekasvabhāvaṃ kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:230: hetubhedo bhedako na bhaviṣyatīti na syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:232: hetuviśeṣeṇa kāryaviśeṣotpāda iti yadeva kathanaṃ tadeva hetubhedasya bhedakatvapratipādakamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:233: [33] yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa prakṛtyā śānta ityetadanaikāntikatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:238: [34] yo hi paramārthato 'san sa saṃvṛtāvapi svabhāvato 'nutpanno dṛśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:244: ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvāt' ityevamabhidadhānā ye prasaṅgaṃ sādhayanti teṣāmapi tathā parairanaṅgīkārād heturasiddha eva,
T04ksmadhlu:248: yadi paryudāsātmake tadā ekānekasvabhāvarahitātvasya bhāvasvabhāvatvenābhyupetatvāttadapyanabhyupagataṃ na bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:251: [37] yacca sarvābhilāpavirahalakṣaṇaṃ tanna kiñcid gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vā,
T04ksmadhlu:257: [39] yadyubhe abhāvasvabhāvatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇāpanne eveti manyase cet,
T04ksmadhlu:265: [41] atrāpi vyāvṛttyā bheda iti manyate cet?
T04ksmadhlu:267: yadyevaṃ svād bhāva eva te syātām,
T04ksmadhlu:269: [42] api ca yathā kenāpi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvahetunā bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā sādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:273: [43] api ca, yadi vijñānamapyanyadharmavat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ syāttadā tadanupādeyaṃ syād vitathatvādanyadharmavat /
T04ksmadhlu:275: naiva yogijñānamapi syānna ca taistattvapratibodhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:276: naiva teṣāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ syānna ca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:278: [44] saṃvṛtau yogijñānādīnāmabhyupagamād buddhā api viparyastā bhaveyuriti prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:279: [45] api cāsti bhavatāṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvapratijñāyāṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ virodho 'pi /
T04ksmadhlu:283: [46] agnyādayo ye bhāvāḥ parokṣarvenābhyupagatāste 'pi abhrāntena niyatadhūmādihetunā anumānapramāṇena satsvabhāvātmakā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:290: tānyapi samastalokaikacakṣurbhūtena tāyinā svakīyenānāvṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā pratyakṣīkṛtya anyebhyo 'pi samprakāśitāni,
T04ksmadhlu:293: [48] bhagavatā khalu ye āntarabahyavastūnāmanekavidhāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ samupadiṣṭāste 'pi svabhāvavirahitāḥ kathaṃ yujyante,
T04ksmadhlu:295: [49] kuśalākuśalamarmaṇāṃ phalabhūtā devanarakādigatayo bhavantīti svayambhuva upadeśāt kathaṃ na virodhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:298: [51] sūtrādiṣu āryāṇāṃ mārgābhyāsabalena yā uttarottaralokottarajñānaphalavyavasthā sāpi na syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:309: no tu nīlam” ityādinā tāvannīlādayo bhāvāḥ kalpānāpoḍhalakṣaṇena pratyakṣapramāṇena jñāyanta iti pratipāditam,
T04ksmadhlu:310: naiva hi gaganotpalavartīni nīlādīni cakṣurvijñānenānubhūyanta iti /
T04ksmadhlu:312: tat sarvatra nirodhadharmakam” anena sādhyavyāptahetunānumānapramāṇenopadarśitāḥ kṣaṇasthitadharmiṇo bhāvāḥ prasiddhā iti spaṣṭamupadarśitam
T04ksmadhlu:315: [57] “dhūmena jñāyate vahniḥ salilaṃ ca balākayā” iti /
T04ksmadhlu:316: agnyādayo bhāvāḥ kāryaliṅgena niyataṃ jñāyamānatvānniyataṃ svabhāvamavadhārayantīti suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:318: [58] abhidharmādau ye ṣaḍ hetavaścatvāraśca pratyayā abhihitāste 'pi sarvadharmānutpādavāde tāvatkathaṃ yujyante,
T04ksmadhlu:320: [59] sūtreṣu sarve dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyataneṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ samupadiṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:321: skandhādīnāṃ bhagavatā kāryakāraṇasvabhāvatvasamprakāśanāt kathaṃ te sarvedharmānutpādatāyāṃ saṅgṛhītāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:322: [60] yadi skandhadivyatiriktasya kasyacid dharmasya anutpādaḥ sādhyate tadā nāsti [kaścit] vivādaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:324: [61] yadyevaṃ manyate yatsaṃvṛtau pramāṇādīnāmabhyupagamānnaiva eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dūṣaṇānāmavakāśo yujyata iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:326: yato hi yāni pramāṇādīni saṃvṛtāvabhyupetāni tāni niścayena sarvābhilāpavidhuralakṣaṇaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vyāvṛttasvabhāvānyeva vyāhatāni syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:327: yadyevaṃ na syāttatadā lokavirodha āgamavirodhaśca kathaṃ parihataḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:329: yadi bhavantastānapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmamātramupacāramātraṃ vyavahāramātramiti pravyāharanti,
T04ksmadhlu:332: [62] api ca, kā nāma saṃvṛtirityapi vaktavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:344: bhavataḥ pratijñāyā eva hāniḥ bhavo 'pyutpadyata eva,
T04ksmadhlu:347: saṃvṛtiviparītasyānutpādasya paramārthatvāt tadā paramārthato 'nutpāda eva syādityasambaddhabhidhānaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:355: tadā nityasya vikalpātmakatvāttat [itaraṃ] tāvat sāmarthyānnirvikalpaṃ jñānamityatasyadavasthāyāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:356: 'saṃvṛtisat' - iti kathanaṃ tu nirvikalpakajñānena tatpratīyata ityabhihitaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:358: [tathātve ca] anumānakalpanāyā api tāvat parihāraḥ syāt savikalpakatvāttasyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:361: śāstrakārā vā prākṛtā vā janāḥ prathame vikalpe bhāvo hyanekaparasparaviruddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:365: [66] atha māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti cet tadā ko hi nāma māyārtha iti vaktavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:369: atha bhrāntijñānena māyeti cet tadā ābhyantarikajñeyanayena ko hi viśeṣaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:372: [68] atha śabdārtha iti cettadā kathabhedaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:373: pratyātmādhigamyā ye sukhādayaste kutra saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:380: athaivaṃ manyate yadābhāsaparikalpyau vyāmiśrya sāmānyākārena gṛhyanta iti?
T04ksmadhlu:391: [69] atha kṣaṇamātrānantarānavasthānena asthirārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthastadviparītaśca nityārthaḥ paramārtha iti siddhasādhanamevaitat,
T04ksmadhlu:394: ato nāsti vivādaḥ tathā sāṃvṛtikānāṃ vastusāmānyalakṣaṇāmāṃ yā nairātmyarupā dharmatā sāsti paramārthataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:395: sāpi utpādād vā tathāganāmanutpadād vā sarvakālamavikāratayā nityābhyupeyate /
T04ksmadhlu:396: [70] atha asatyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyartha iti tadā kathaṃ sā satyamiti parasparaviruddhayoḥ satyāsatyayoraikātmyānupapatteḥ bhāvasvabhāvaiva kācana
T04ksmadhlu:397: anyathā kathaṃ jagat tathā satyaṃ sidhyet,
T04ksmadhlu:402: athāpramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyeta?
T04ksmadhlu:406: [73] api ca, yadi bhāvasvabhāvā abbhyupagamyante tadā teṣvāropito mithyāsvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtisatyam,
T04ksmadhlu:411: tadā saṃvṛtirapi vitathā syāt paramārtho 'pyaśakyavyavasthānaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:413: [74] yadi yathākathañcana kañcidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāttadā kimarthaṃ sa sādhayate?
T04ksmadhlu:414: sa naiva paramārthaḥ kathaṃ sa jñānenāvadhārayituṃ śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:415: na ca paramārthaśabdenāpyabhidhātumarhaḥ evaṃ tāvannāyaṃ paramārthaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:419: yadi yathākathañcana kiścidekaḥ paramārthaḥ syāt tadā paramārthato 'sadbhāvasyaikasya yathākathañcana nirākaraṇād bhāvasattāyā evābhyupagamaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:426: ataḥ pakṣo 'yam 'na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ' iti na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:428: evaṃ bhinnābhinnatvasya anyo 'nyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvena ekasya pratiṣedhe 'parasya vidhānaṃ na bhavettadā asattvameva /
T04ksmadhlu:429: sa tadā pratiṣeddhumapi kathaṃ śaktaḥ ekasmin yugapatparyudāsaprasajyayorvirodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:430: [76] anyacca, bhavatāmanusāreṇa tu puṇyajñānasambhārau duṣparipūraṇau syātām,
T04ksmadhlu:432: pūjānugrahakāmyayā yad dīyate tad dānaṃ tvatyantaṃ prasādamabhinirvartayati,
T04ksmadhlu:434: sa cānupalambhaḥ kiṃ deyābhāvād vā viṣayābhāvād vā bhavati?
T04ksmadhlu:435: prathame tāvat pakṣe na ko 'pi kimapi dadātīti puṇyasyaivābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
T04ksmadhlu:436: sattvābhāvācca yo hi bodhisattvānāṃ sattvārthapariśramaḥ sa nirarthaka eva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:440: yadyevaṃ na syāuttadā bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ kathamarthibhyaḥ putrādidānaṃ kṛtam?
T04ksmadhlu:444: [77] api ca, 'sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ' ityettasya tāvat ko hyarthaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:445: yadi svayambhāvasya abhāvānniḥsvabhāvā ityabhidhīyante tadā siddhasādhanameva,
T04ksmadhlu:448: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā nirapekṣatvānnityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:449: yadyucyeta - vinaṣṭā bhāvāḥ svasvabhāvenānutpannatvāt svasvabhāvena na santīti niḥsvabhāvāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:455: kṣaṇikasya khalu vastuno dvitīye kṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ nābhyupeyate /
T04ksmadhlu:456: yadyucyeta yathā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya paramārthena svabhavato 'sattvād sasattvaṃ tathā niḥsvabhāvatvamiti tadapi
T04ksmadhlu:458: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:459: paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā bālapṛthagjanaiḥ parikalpitena grāhyagrahakāreṇa virāhitā api āryajñānasya advaitātmanā gocaratvena sthitā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:464: yadyucyeta ādito 'nutpannatvāt sarve bhāvā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
T04ksmadhlu:466: atha pūrvamutpannasya vastunaḥ punaranupattyā sarve dharmā anutpannā iti tadapi siddhasādhanameva,
T04ksmadhlu:474: sarvadā ca pūrvavinaṣṭānāṃ sajātīyotpatteḥ atha bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitasya svalakṣaṇato 'nutpādādanutpāda ucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:477: atha svato 'nutpādād anutpāda ityucyeta tadāpi nāsti virodhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:480: yadi sarvaśaḥ sarvānutpādād anutpāda ucyate tadā darśanādivirodho durnivāraḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:481: yadi parasparaviśeṣānutpādād anutpādo 'bhidhīyate tadā [yadi] tathatāsvabhavatāmupādāyocyate tadā nāsti doṣaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:482: [kintu] yadi lokaprasiddhasvabhāvatāmupādāyocyate tadā kena darśanādivirodho nivārayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:496: “kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ dharmamayoniśaḥ śabdaśaḥ pravicayya mahāyānaprasadāyatano na bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:497: śabdaśo 'nabhipretya yoniśo manasi kṛtvā mahāyānaprasādāyatano bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:507: sāṃyogikasya svabhāvamabhisandhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yadasattvaṃ samprakāśitaṃ tacchabdaśo 'bhiniviśya [ye] sāṃkleśikadharmāṇāṃ vaiyavadānīkadharmāṇāṃ cāpyasattve 'bhiniviśante,
T04ksmadhlu:510: [ataḥ] bodhisattvasya śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāyāmasaddṛṣṭi saiva tasya mahatī dṛṣṭiriti,
T04ksmadhlu:513: tato vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭisaṃkleśāpavādadṛṣṭitattvāpavādadṛṣtayastāvajjāyante yadā nimittadṛṣṭyā sarvāpavādaḥ [yadā] kriyate tadā vyavahārāpavādadṛṣṭerapyabhiniveśo
T04ksmadhlu:523: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
T04ksmadhlu:524: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:525: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ skandhānāṃ sattaiva tāvannirdiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:527: “asti karma asti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate” anena tāvad vacanena virodho 'pi samupajāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:528: evaṃ yadi paramārthataḥ karmāpyasti vipāko 'pyasti tadā sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā bhavituṃ nārhanti /
T04ksmadhlu:529: yadi saṃvṛtau santīti cet tadā karturapi saṃvṛtau sadbhāvāt “kārakastu nopalabhyate” ityevaṃ na vaktavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:532: yadi te bhaved yathā dṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:534: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:535: anena yadi sarvadharmāṇāmasattvaṃ tadā saṃkleśavyadānayorapavādadoṣaḥ prasajyata iti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:539: bāhyo na vidyate hyartho yathā bālairvikalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:544: ataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena na sidhyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:554: anena tāvad vijñānameva paramārthasattvānidarśanatvādiguṇopetaṃ śāścatocchedāntadvayavinirmuktamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:559: “ye paramārthasato 'pi vijñānasyāpavādaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāmabhiniviśya śūnyatādṛṣṭikāste 'cikitsyāḥ” iti /
T04ksmadhlu:566: sarvathātyantaviyuktaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ yattanna tenopalabhyata idaṃ śūnyatālakṣanamuktaṃ bhavati” /
T04ksmadhlu:571: anirvacanīyadharmatāvabodhena saṃskārāsaṃskārābhyāṃ prajñaptamiti yaduktaṃ tena virodhaḥ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:573: nāvaśiṣṭamiti yad bhavatābhihitaṃ tadapi yuktyāgamābhyāṃ viruddham,
T04ksmadhlu:576: tathā hi kecana parahitāśayā eva pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:579: tathaivānye svasukhasampattisādhanatatparā anyavyāghātaṃ kṛtvā tadduḥkhavinivṛttito virajyate /
T04ksmadhlu:581: tathaivetare tāvad bhavāntarakhecchato viramya svamuktyarthaṃ prayatante /
T04ksmadhlu:582: aye tu kevalaṃ paravimuktimevānucintayanti saṃbodhinidānāṃ ca dānādipāramitāpravṛttimālambante /
T04ksmadhlu:585: svābhilāṣadvāreṇaiva pravṛttidarśanād śraddhaiva hi pravṛttiheturiti niścitam /
T04ksmadhlu:587: ato nānāgotratvāt sattvānāṃ tulyajātīyagotrakairvidhīyamānapratipattiviśeṣānurūpaṃ phalalakṣaṇayānamapi nānā bhavatīti yuktibhirnānāyānataiva niścīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:594: evamevānekeṣu sūtreṣvapi śrāvakādiyānatrayanirdeśād āgamato 'pi tāvannānā yānāni sidhyantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:595: āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkādiṣu yaddhi ekaṃ hi yānamiti vyapadiṣṭam,
T04ksmadhlu:597: dharmadhātulakṣaṇatayā yānānāṃ bhedābhāvād ekameva yānamiti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:598: athavā yānīkṛtaṃ yānamiti yānikurvatāṃ śrāvakādipudgalānāṃ nairātmye 'tulyatvābhāvād ekameva yānam /
T04ksmadhlu:600: athavā aniyatagotrakāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ mahāyānenaiva niryāṇād ekameva yānaṃ deśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:604: athavā bhagavatā svayamanekadhā śrāvakayānādibhirniryāṇadvāraiḥ parinirvāṇasandarśanād ekameva yānam /
T04ksmadhlu:605: athavā nāsti mahāyānād viśiṣṭataraṃ yānāntaramiti tadadhikārād ekameva yānamiti,
T04ksmadhlu:609: anyacca, naikabhavaparamparāyāṃ sambhārān paripūrya bodhisattvā buddhatvapadamadhigamiṣyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:610: śrāvakā aśeṣabhavasaṃyojanaṃ prajahantīti teṣāṃ naikajanmasādhyaṃ buddhātvadhigantuṃ ko 'pi bhavapratīsandhirnaiva sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:611: tathā hi - mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ yaduktaṃ so 'pyātmagrahaprabhava eveti niyatam abhīṣṭaṃ ca /
T04ksmadhlu:613: tatsamucchedena teṣāṃ janmano 'pyādhārarasyābhāvāt tad [janma] api samucchidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:615: āryāsaddharmapuṇḍarīke bhagavatā yacchrāvakebhyo buddhātvādhigatervyākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu nirmitaśrāvakāṇāṃ nirmāṇasya,
T04ksmadhlu:623: katipayeṣu [sūtreṣu] - “tathāgatagarbhāḥ sarve sattvāḥ” iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tathatālakṣaṇāyāstathatāyā abhiprāyeṇa vyapadiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:628: tatra tāvad 'nāgamataḥ sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:630: kiṃ kenāpyanabhyupetatvādāgama ekāntenānupādeya eva bhavatyuta utadeyo 'pīti?
T04ksmadhlu:641: tadvidāṃ sudhiyāṃ viraheṇa bhagavata ādimadhyaparyavasānakalyāṇaṃ pravacanaratnamanāśritā api kiṃ tāvadadhigatasvaparahitasampādanonopāyaṃ tarkanipuṇaṃ vidvāṃsamapi nāśrayiṣyante?
T04ksmadhlu:642: athavā, ajñā vaṇijo yathā vimugdhatayānarghaṃ ratnamapi parityajanti tathā suvijñāstarkanipuṇā api vaṇijastanna parigṛhṇantīti na /
T04ksmadhlu:647: sa cet samyagiti tadā bhavanto 'pi yadi bhagavatpravacanaṃ suparīkṣyaivābhyupayantītyato bhagavatā prajñāpārāmitādiṣu yo hi madhyamo mārgaḥ suspaṣṭamādiṣṭastaṃ kinnāśrayiṣyantīti?
T04ksmadhlu:648: yadi svayaṃ tamāśrayituṃ na śaktāstathāpyāryanāgātjunapādairyo hyanekayuktipradīpaprakāraiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭastadbalenāpi kimiva nābhyupagacchanti?
T04ksmadhlu:649: yato hi sa ācāryastāvad bhagadvacananirdiṣṭatvena prathamāṃ bhūmimāsāditatvena cāryalaṅkāvatārādau vyākṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:650: tasyāpi yadi nirdeśo viparyastaḥ syāttadā naiva tāvad bhagavatā tathā vyākṛtaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:651: ato yadayācāryavacānaṃ tyajyate bhagavadvacanamapi nūnaṃ parityaktaṃ bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:652: phalata āryanāgārjunapādapratipadītaṃ mārgaṃ parityajya anāryapudgalapradarśitapathāśrayaṇaṃ tāvānnaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:653: na vayaṃ śabdānāṃ bhāvikaḥ kaścana sambandha iti manyāmahe /
T04ksmadhlu:655: te tāvat [śabdāḥ] saṅketābhijñānena vyavahāre vakturicchāṃ dyotayante arthāvasthādibhirabhrāntapuruṣairabhihitāḥ śabdāḥ vivakṣitārthāsambaddhā iti na sarvathā niścetuṃ śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:657: kṣīṇarāgadveṣamohānāṃ śabdā aviparītārthā iti pratipādanena sarveṣāṃ śabdā viparītārthā evati na,
T04ksmadhlu:659: atastrirupapaliṅgāni parikṣaṇapariśuddhāni ādimadhyāntakalyāṇaniyatāni tāvad vacanāni avisaṃvādakatvād vidvadbhiḥ samāśrayaṇīyānyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:661: pratipādayāmāstathāpi yadā āgamārthaṃ vinintayāmastadā vyākaraṇapramāṇatvena sampradarśayāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:667: athavā yadartho nānyatra netuṃ śakyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:676: na katipayeṣu” avameva punastatraivoktam - “tadyathāpi nāma devaputra,
T04ksmadhlu:692: ato yāni ca yāvanti ca paramārthamadhikṛtya anutpādīni lakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni tāni sarvāṇi nītārthatvena grahītavyāni,
T04ksmadhlu:696: yāvad ye sūtrāntā saṃvṛtipratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante neyārthāḥ yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ paramārthapratipattaye nirdiṣṭāsta ucyante nītārthāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:701: yāvad ye sūtrāntā ātmasattvajīvapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakāravedakān anekarutairasvāmikān svāmina iva nirdiśanti,
T04ksmadhlu:703: yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥsattvanirjīvaniḥpudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāsta ucyate nītārthāḥ - iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:704: sutrāntareṣu 'tāvadanutpādādinirdeśā abhiprāyāntareṇa nītārtha ityabhihitāḥ' - iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:706: ekaṃ hi sthitau ātmādinirdeśā api nītārthāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:712: yadyevaṃ tadā kathaṃ bhagavatā āryasandhinirmocanasūtre trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhāṃ niḥsvabhagavatāmabhipretya sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:716: atha cāsacchastraśravaṇābhiniśavaśād viparyastamatayaḥ saṃvṛtau asantamanṛtamapi nityādivasturupatayā samāropya yathā rūpapratibhāsaṃ tathaiva
T04ksmadhlu:717: te āropāpavādāntadvayapatitatamatitayā antadvayarahite paramagambhīre paramārthanayasāgare nānupraviśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:718: ataeva tāvad bhagavān 'anutpādādinirdeśaḥ paramārthādhikṛtaḥ' iti nirucya trividhaniḥsvabhāvatābhiprāyapratipādakamantadvayarahitaṃ0
T04ksmadhlu:719: madhyamapathaṃ madhaymapathaṃ prakāśayituṃ nītārthameva mataṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavān /
T04ksmadhlu:722: tatravicāritaṃ tāvad vastu yathāpratibhāsaṃ māyāvat pratītyasamutpannam,
T04ksmadhlu:727: 'yaḥ prattyasamutpannaḥ sa svabhāvataḥ śūnya iti vidvāṃso nirdhārayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:734: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham //
T04ksmadhlu:735: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
T04ksmadhlu:738: yaḥpratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04ksmadhlu:739: yaḥpratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥśūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:742: yacca śūnyaṃ svabhāvena na hi taccasti kutracit //
T04ksmadhlu:747: yasmin dharme nāsti svabhāvaḥ sa na tāvad vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:750: yadanutpannamaniruddhaṃ tad 'atītam' iti prajñaptuṃ naiva śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:751: na ca tadanāgataṃ pratyatpannamityapi vā prajñaptuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:752: yacca kālatraye 'pyanupapannaṃ tannāma lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ prajñaptamiti vā na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:753: yato hi tat sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ nāmamātrasaṃketamātravyavahāramātrasaṃvṛtimātrābhidheyamātraprajñaptimātrebhyo 'tiriktaṃ nāsti /
T04ksmadhlu:759: ato hi bhagavan yacca nāmamātraṃ saṃketamātraṃ na tattathyamiti” vistareṇābhihitam /
T04ksmadhlu:760: ata eva paratantrasvabhāvo na tathyatve yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:765: māyādito 'bhinno yo hi paratantrasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nityānityādibhiḥ paramārthata upacaritaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:766: sa eva ca parikalpitasvabhāvaḥ so 'pi yathā parikalpyate tathā lakṣaṇenāsiddhatvāllakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:767: sāpi niḥsvabhāvatā vastutaḥ paratantrasvabhāve eva sthitā /
T04ksmadhlu:769: ata eva yathā anityādibhiḥ parikalpitāḥ sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato lakṣaṇaśūnyatvena anutpannāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:772: ata eva hi prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ āryasandhinirmocane 'pi yathoktam -
T04ksmadhlu:778: ata evāhaṃ lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhavātābhisandhāya 'sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ' iti yadupadiśāmi,
T04ksmadhlu:780: paratantrasvabhāvaśca yathā saṃvṛtau hyuktastathā parikalpitātmanā virahitatvena prasidhya saṃvṛtisvabhāvasyānapavādamapi nirdiśati,
T04ksmadhlu:784: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
T04ksmadhlu:785: sarve dharmāḥ paramārthataḥ sadā bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāmeva pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:788: sa hi pramāṇaiḥ samyugupapatrannasvabhāvatayā paramārtha ityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:800: phalataḥ anutpādideśanāṃ nītārthāṃ sādhayituṃ darśanādivirodhaṃ parihartuṃ yathāśabdaparikalpanaṃ ca nirākartum āryasandhinirmocane tāvadabhihitam
T04ksmadhlu:802: paramārthaniḥsvabhāvaṃ dharmanairātmaprabhāvitamityabhipretya mayā sarve dharmā anutpannāḥ sarve dharmā aniruddhāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:807: asannimittagrahaṇād asaddarśanaṃ tad bhavedityato nimittadarśanaṃ taducyate /
T04ksmadhlu:810: yo hi saṃvṛtau hetupratyayabalasambhūtatvena māyāvannisvabhāvatvena ca 'prayogajaḥ' ityuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:813: etadarśaṃ yo hi parikalpitasvabhāva uktaḥ so 'pyāgantuka eva kalpanābhinirhatatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:816: ataḥ sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvenānena paramārthato niḥ svabhāvāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:818: yadi sa tāvadasat svāttadā saṃkleśavyadānadharmā naiva vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyeran,
T04ksmadhlu:823: te pūrvasvabhāvamapi vasturupeṇa parigṛhya paścāttasyāpyabhāvaṃ matvā anutpannādideśanānāṃ śabdaśo 'rthābhiniveśaṃ kurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:836: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
T04ksmadhlu:837: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
T04ksmadhlu:839: sa tāvad bhāvābhiniveśapūrvaka iti sūtreṣu pratipāditam /
T04ksmadhlu:842: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
T04ksmadhlu:843: ato ye khalu bhāvābhiniveśaparaśāste tāvat paratantraṃ sanimittaṃ paśyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:844: ye tu vyapagatabhāvagrāhāste tathā na kurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:848: tatra nityādayo doṣāḥ sambhavanti na vā katham //
T04ksmadhlu:860: ye puṇyāni na kurvanti narāste kutsitā hatāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:869: yaddhi proktaṃ tatkathamiti cintāyāmatrāpi yathā kathitasya parikalpitasvabhāvasya samāropo bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:875: ataḥ - “samāropāpavādaṃ hi vikalpanto vinaśyati” ityuktam / ata eva ca -
T04ksmadhlu:880: tathā hiyathā vikalpyate tathā paramārthataḥ paratantrasyānutpannatvāt parikalpitātmanā anutpanna eva /
T04ksmadhlu:882: saṃvṛtyā paratantratayā samutpannatvāt tadāśritā anye vikalpā nirmāṇanirmitasadṛśā samutpadyante / ata eva -
T04ksmadhlu:887: atastatra tatra yā paratantrasvabhāvāstitatvadeśanā yāśca bhāvotpatyādideśanāstāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:888: sarvāḥ deśanāḥ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ bhayahetuparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyotpādāśayena abhiprāyataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:893: buddhayā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
T04ksmadhlu:894: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhayā prakalpyate //
T04ksmadhlu:895: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:899: ato mahākaruṇāmayena tathāgatena lokabhayaviṣayaparivarjanārthaṃ vyavahāravaśena tasya utpattinirodhau bhavata ityupadiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:900: kulaputra, nātra kaścid dharma utpadyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:907: evaṃ yāvad vedanāto vijñānaparyantam” - iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:911: yadyapi rupādayaḥ paramārthato 'nutpannastathāpi bālapṛthagjanaiste utpādādisvabhāve parikalpyante /
T04ksmadhlu:916: “kulaputra , yo bodhisattvaḥ dharmān ayoniśo manasikṛtya śabdaśaḥ pravicinoti,
T04ksmadhlu:920: yaduktaṃ tattu ye paramārthābhiprāyānabhijñāḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvamapyapavadante te 'yoniśo
T04ksmadhlu:922: nikhileṣvapi sūtreṣu śabdaśo 'rthābhiniveśapariharāya abhipretārthāvabodhāya ca samyag yatnotpādārthaṃ sarveṣu cādhimaktyupādārthamevābhihitam,
T04ksmadhlu:924: na hi mādhyamikāḥ śabdaśo 'rthaṃ parikalpayantīti pūrvamevoktatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:927: kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ samyak prajñayā rūpapratyavekṣaṇaṃ yāvd vijñānapratyavekṣaṇaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04ksmadhlu:931: na ca nirodhamupalabhate yāvad vijñānaparyantaṃ yathāvadutpādaṃ nopalabhate,
T04ksmadhlu:932: yato hi so 'pi tāvad [anupalambhaḥ] paramārthato 'nutpādapravṛttayā prajayā bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:935: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyāṃ paramārthe na vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:938: ye tāvadanutpādādinirdeśān 'sarve dharmāḥ paramārthata utpadyante saṃvṛtisvabhābhāvataśca notpadyante' ityetasmin mate sthāpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:942: saṃvṛtitaścotpannā iti nirdiṣṭāḥ satyadvayanirdeśādiṣu tāvad - devaputra,
T04ksmadhlu:947: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:956: tatraiva tathā proktatvāditi cet? tathā hiḥ
T04ksmadhlu:963: kamāṇyabhisaṃskurvantīti yadaivaṃ sūtrārtho vivecyeta tadā evaṃvidhena tāvad vivecanena
T04ksmadhlu:966: svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sada sarvadharmāḥ vastuṃ vibhāventi jinānaputrāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:967: sarveṇa sarvaṃ bhavasarvaśūnyaṃ prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām //
T04ksmadhlu:974: ityevaṃ bhavadbhiścittacaittātmakasya traidhātukasya yadasamyaktvaṃ parikalpyate tadapi asamyagākāropagrahaṇāvabhāsatvena viparyayāditayā procyate
T04ksmadhlu:975: mithyāsvabhāvenopagrahaṇād yastasyātmatvenāvabhāsaḥ sa kathaṃ samyag bhāva iti bhavet,
T04ksmadhlu:978: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā sāṃkhyādiparikalpiteṣu pradhānādivikāreṣu bhavatāṃ ko dveṣaḥ svād,
T04ksmadhlu:980: ata evaḥ kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:989: anenaiva hetunā kleśā api paramārthatastattvāni syuḥ /“
T04ksmadhlu:991: anena tāvad ātmādīnāṃ mithyākāropagrahaṇena pravṛttatvād ātmādivat kleśā api sarve
T04ksmadhlu:992: mithyākāropagrahaṇena pravṛttatvād ātmādivat kleśā api sarve mithyāsvabhāvā evetyevaṃ tāvannirdiśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:993: ityevaṃ traidhātukāḥ khalu cittacaitasikā mithyākāragraharaṇapravṛttatvāt svākāra iva tadabhinnatvācca mithyāsvabhāvā eveti nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:994: bodhisattvebhyustu viśeṣataḥ kliṣṭatvāt sarvaparikalpānāṃ te mithyā evātaḥ “mithyā sarvavikalpāḥ” ityevaṃ tāvat pratipāditam /
T04ksmadhlu:995: yadi nāsti paramārthato vastunāṃ svakīyaḥ kaścana svabhāvastadā -
T04ksmadhlu:996: na hyātmā vidyate skandhe skandhāścaiva hi nātmani /
T04ksmadhlu:997: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:998: yadi yaduktaṃ tad yadyevamuddhriyate yadanena nioṣedhamukhena svandhādīnāṃ tāvat sattaiva nirdiśyata iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1000: yato hyatra “na te yathā vikalpyante” iti yaduktaṃ tena sattayā niṣedho vidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1001: “na ca vai na santi ca” ityamunā ca ye yathā saṃvṛtavavabhāsante,
T04ksmadhlu:1006: yadyevaṃ na bhavettadaikasminnasattvabhidhāya punaḥ sattvena nirdeśaḥ kathaṃ sambadhyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:1009: samudācarati talloke na ca loke sthitaśca saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:1024: yato hi tadabhūtamaniruddhamanāgamamanirgamamanutpannamacyumanabhiniṣpannam anirvacanīyatvād vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1026: tathaiva rupādivijñānaparyantaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati,
T04ksmadhlu:1027: ita ārabhya...... saṃvṛtimātraṃ bhavati” ityetatparyantaṃ yad vistareṇābhihitaṃ tadarthasambaddhaṃ karaṇīyamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1029: asti vipākaḥ kartā tu nopalabhyate' yadevamuktaṃ tattāvad etadviruddhaṃ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:1030: yato hi yadā karmādayaḥ paramārthataḥ santi,
T04ksmadhlu:1031: tadā na bhavanti sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1032: yadi saṃvṛtitaste santi tadā karturapi saṃvṛtitaḥ satvāt 'kartā tu nopalabhyate' ityetatkathanaṃ na yuktisaṅgataṃ syāditi cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1039: yadi te bhaved yathādṛṣṭāḥ sarve syustattvadarśinaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:1041: na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca //
T04ksmadhlu:1044: atrāpi 'yadi sarvāṇi vastūni yathāvabhāsante tathaiva paramārthato vidyante' iti tadā 'sarve 'pi tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ' iti syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1046: yaddhi 'abhāvāt sarvadharmāṇām' ityuktaṃ tena vastūnāṃ saṃvṛtisattvaṃ pratipāditam 'na te tathā yathā dṛṣṭāḥ' iti vacanāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1049: prāptirabhisamayo jātirnirodhaḥ saṃkleśo vyavadānamiti vyavahārata eva saṃvidyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1057: yaduta traidhātukam” iti yaduktaṃ tatkathaṃ nīyate?
T04ksmadhlu:1058: evameva āryāndhimirmocane āryaghanavyūhādiṣvāpi sarvadharmāṇāṃ cittamātra kāyatvena nirdiṣṭatvāccittameva hi tāvat paramārthataḥ sat,
T04ksmadhlu:1060: ataśca sarve dharmāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvena na sādhyituṃ śakyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1063: yato hi yathā cittasattā nirdiṣṭā tathaiva rūpasyāpi sattāyā nirdeśastattatsūtreṣvanekadhā kṛto vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1064: atha pramānabādhitatvāt suttrāntareṣu ca niṣiddhatvāta paramārthataḥ sattvena vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1067: sūtrāntareṣvapi niḥsvabhāvatvena nirdiṣṭatvāt paramārthato 'gṛhītāpi sā cittamātratā kramaśaḥ paramārthanayasamudrāvagāhanahetumātratayā nirdiṣṭetyevaṃ grahaṇanīyamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1068: ityevaṃ ye tāvat sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvatayā yugapajjñātumakṣamāste kadācana cittamātratāmāśritya kramaśo bāhyārthaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ praviśanti / ata eva
T04ksmadhlu:1072: tadā tamapi niḥsvabhāvatvenāvabudhya nitarāṃ gambhīranaye praviśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1080: anye tu bruvate - cittamātratā hi tavat svaprasiddhasvabhāvā,
T04ksmadhlu:1084: ata eva bhagavatā tatpradarśanārthaṃ vastūni cittamātratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāni,
T04ksmadhlu:1088: sarve buddhāḥ sadā sarvān dharmān jānanti sarvathā /
T04ksmadhlu:1094: yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
T04ksmadhlu:1095: yannaivātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat trikālātītam /
T04ksmadhlu:1098: yasya nāstyutpādastasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ yasya nāsti svabhāvastasya nāstyutpādaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1104: yasya nāstyāgamo nirgamaścyutirjātistasya na santi saṃskārāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1122: dharmadhāturhi dvābhyāmantābhyāṃ vinirmuktaḥ sarvadharmanisvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ niṣprapañca iti vacanīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1123: sa cāpi dharmadhātuḥ 'ayaṃ saḥ - ityākāreṇa nirupayitumaśakyatvād arupyaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1129: yadi madhye cittasvabhāvatāyāḥ ko 'pyaṃśaḥ paramārthasan syāttadā tatsattayā nityānityābhiniveśaḥ khalu kathaṅkārameko 'ntaḥ syād,
T04ksmadhlu:1130: yato hi yathā vastutattvaṃ tathā yathāvadanugamya manaskaraṇaṃ patanasthānamiti naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1131: nityādisvaruopamatirijya vastubhūtaḥ kaścidanyo vastvākāro 'sambhavī madhye hi vastu khalu svasvabhāvasyāsattvād abhūtamiti grahaṇaṃ nāsti tāvad anta ityevaṃ yadi cintyeta,
T04ksmadhlu:1138: yadi madhye vastunaḥ sattvaṃ tadā tatsattvagrahaṇaṃ kena tatsattvagrahaṇaṃ kena niṣiddhaṃ syāt?
T04ksmadhlu:1139: āryasamādhirājasūtre madhye sataḥ paramārthasthitasya vastuno niṣedhāya yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1146: ayaṃ tāvat sūtrārthaḥ - āśrayaṇīye madhye yadi vastusatāṃ nāsti kimapi svarūpaṃ tadaiva
T04ksmadhlu:1147: 'madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti panḍitaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tad yuktaṃ syādityucyate yadyasti
T04ksmadhlu:1148: kimapi vastu tadā kathaṃ na paṇḍitastasmin sthānaṃ na grahīṣyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1154: idaṃ tāvat sūtrasya tātparyam - utpādabhaṅgayoḥ sthitilakṣaṇe ca madhye paramārthato 'sattvāccittaṃ tāvanmadhyārahitaṃ sat pravartate pratibudhyate cetyucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1155: apere khalvabhidadhate - saṃvṛtau hi vijñānavad bāhyārthā api saṃvidyanta iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1156: anyathā daśabhūmakasūtre - aṣṭabhyāṃ hi bhūmau saṃsthitā bodhisattvā lokadhātvantargatānāṃ paramāṇvādīnāṃ saṃkhyāṃ parijānanti - iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1159: mahadgatatāṃ ca apramāṇatāṃ ca vibhaktiṃ ca prajānāti /
T04ksmadhlu:1161: asyāṃ ca lokadhātau yāvanti pṛthvīdhātoḥ paramāṇurajāṃsi tāni prajānāti /
T04ksmadhlu:1167: yato hi yuktibhirvicāraṇāyāṃ satyāmubhāvapi naiva parīkṣāṃ sahete,
T04ksmadhlu:1170: vijñaptimātratākathanasya tāvat phalaṃ tu paraparikalpitānāṃ kartubhoktrādīnāṃ niṣedha eva,
T04ksmadhlu:1172: athavā - sarvadharmeṣu pūrvaṅgamatvāccittaṃ sarvadharmāpekṣayā pradhānaṃ sidhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1173: yāvad yathā “nāstyarthaṃ cittameva tu” iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1174: yathā vā “vāsanairlulitaṃ cittamārthābhāsaṃ pravartate” ityādi yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1175: yathā vā “vāsanairlulitaṃ cittamārthābhāsaṃ pravatate” ityādi yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1176: tadapi nirākāreṇa cittena viṣayagrahaṇaṃ kathamapi na yujyata ityavaśyaṃ tat sākārameva mantavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:1177: ataścittākāraṃ vyatiricya arthākārāvabhāsābhāvāt tanniṣedhena sākāracittameva tāvannirdiśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1179: athavā ātmadisattānirdeśa iva tadvineyajanāpekṣayā yathā sadvaidya āturān puṣṇāti tathā bhagavanto nānavidyā deśānāḥ pravartayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1181: āture āture yadvad bhiṣag dravyaṃ prayacchati /
T04ksmadhlu:1182: buddhā hi tadvat sattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti vai //
T04ksmadhlu:1183: nānyān visaṃvādayatīti vineyajanānāṃ hitasukhakaratvāt sārthakaṃ vacanam /
T04ksmadhlu:1184: parahitaṃ tāvadekāntatayā satyamiti heturbhagavatsu tāvannāsti mṛṣāvādo 'pi / ata uktam -
T04ksmadhlu:1189: kintu niḥsandigdhaṃ sūkṣmavastusvabhāvaṃ samyak sādhayituṃ nāsti sarvathā ko 'pi āptāgamaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1192: tadā nirarthakaṃ brahmacaryam” iti yaduktaṃ tatkiṃ nāsti sat?
T04ksmadhlu:1194: yato hi tatpramāṇabhūtaṃ paramārthaṃ ko hi nāma tyajet /
T04ksmadhlu:1195: ayaṃ tāvat sūtrārthaḥ - iyaṃ hi pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇā tathataiva paramārthaśabdavācyā paramasya jñānasya gocaratvāt,
T04ksmadhlu:1197: yadi tadapyasat syāttadā yathā pudgalo dharmāśca bālapṛthagjaneṣu prasiddhāstathaiva syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1198: tathā sati sarve janā anāyāsena ādita eva tattvadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1199: tattvadarśanārthaṃ ca prayatno 'pi nirarthakaḥ syāditi suspaṣṭameva /
T04ksmadhlu:1204: iti uaduktaṃ tena kathaṃ na virodhaḥ syāditi cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1206: ye khalu paramārthasat vastvabhyupagamya punastasyāsattvaṃ parikalpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1209: te pūrvaṃ sattvaṃ parikalpya paścāt tadasattvaṃ parigṛhṇanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1210: ataḥ sadasadantayoḥ patitatvāt te antadvayarahitaṃ sarvaprapañcapaśamaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1226: yaduta rāgadveṣamohābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā punarapi rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvaṃ vikalpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:1229: yaśca buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ rāgadveṣamohānnābhyupaiti bhāvalakṣaṇavinirmuktatvād vidyante neti /
T04ksmadhlu:1232: mahāmatirāha - ya eṣa bhagavan abhyupagamya rāgadveṣamohān na punarabhyupaiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1241: sandhāyoktaṃ mayāvaraṃ khalu sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirna tveva nāstyastitvābhimānikasya śūnyatādṣṛṣṭiḥ iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1244: abhutvā yasya utpādo bhūtva vāpi vinaśyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1245: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te śāsane sthitāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:1247: tasyāsti nāsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat //
T04ksmadhlu:1248: dvitīyapadyārthadvāreṇa svamataṃ saṃsthāpya 'parikalpitasvabhāvaviviktatvād viviktaṃ jagadityeva tāvat sūtrārthaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1249: ataśca nāsti virodhaḥ' ityabhidadhadbhiḥ kaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ ityabhidhātavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:1250: atha pramāṇaviruddhamapi yad bālaiḥ satyamiti gṛhyate taditi cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1251: tadāśeṣaṃ jagat paramārthato 'nutpannamapi bālairyadutpattyādikaṃ paramārthataḥ sadityāropyate tad vakṣyamāṇapramāṇairniṣiddhatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvamiti kasmānna gṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1253: tadā yaddhi bhagavatābāhyārthāḥ parikalpitasvabhāvatvāchūnyāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tasya paramārthato na santīti vyākhyānaṃ kasmānna kriyate?
T04ksmadhlu:1255: tadā vijñānasyāpi tathā vyākhyānaṃ na kartuvyam,
T04ksmadhlu:1257: pramāṇai katipayairyadi vijñānaṃ vastusat sidhyati tadā dvividhameva parikalpitam,
T04ksmadhlu:1260: ataśca jagadidaṃ yathoktaparikalpitasvabhāvaviviktamityasmābhirapyabhyupeyata iti nāsti sarvathā durūham /
T04ksmadhlu:1263: sarvaśūnyatālakṣaṇatvāttasya' iti yaduktaṃ tadapyanena nirākṛtaṃ bhavati” ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1264: tatrāpi rāgādayo ye saṃkleśātmakasaṃvṛtisvabhāvānāṃ paratantralakṣaṇānāṃ samyaktayā
T04ksmadhlu:1265: saṃkliṣṭakaraṇena saṃsāre niyojanena pratipakṣe ca yathākramaṃ vidhyanabhūtābhūtatvādinā cāropyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1268: ataḥ pariniṣpannalakṣaṇayuktāni bodhipakṣānukūlavyavadānānyapi vipakṣātyantapratighātarupeṇa parinirvāṇe ca niyojanādinā samyaktayā vastudharmatāyāmāropitāni,
T04ksmadhlu:1274: tathyasaṃvṛtau tu dvayorapi bhāvāt saṃkleśabyadānapakṣayorabhāvādoṣo 'pi na khalu prasajyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1276: “na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā,
T04ksmadhlu:1278: na vijñānaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:1279: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃkāravijñānānāṃ na rāgadharmatā nāpi virāgadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T04ksmadhlu:1280: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ dveṣadharma vā adveṣadharmi vā,
T04ksmadhlu:1282: na vijñānaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:1283: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dveṣadharmatā nāpi vigatadveṣadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T04ksmadhlu:1284: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā,
T04ksmadhlu:1286: na vijñānaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
T04ksmadhlu:1287: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na mohadharmatā nāpi vigatamohadharmatā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
T04ksmadhlu:1288: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
T04ksmadhlu:1290: na vijñānaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
T04ksmadhlu:1291: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānām asaṃkleśatā avyavadānatā iyamucyate prajñāpāramitā” / ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1293: “katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti?
T04ksmadhlu:1295: paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmābhāvasamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ” ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1299: tatra ye cāpi saṃkleśahetavo vā vyavadānahetavo vā dharmāste sarve svabhāvataḥ śūnyāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1308: sarvadharmān ākāśasamān vijñāyāpi saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānaṃ ceti vyavahiyete ākāśadharmatā cāpi nāpanīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1310: mañjuśrīḥ, jātinirodhadharmavān na ko 'pi dharmo bhavati” ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:1311: yadi punaḥ parikalpitalakṣaṇaśūnyaḥ ko 'pi dharmaḥ syāt tadāsminneva sūtre -
T04ksmadhlu:1314: arthānniḥsvalakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmikā animittā amanaścittavijñāptikā anutpannā aniruddhā ahetukā asañcārā asanudācārā anakṣarā anirghoṣasvarāḥ santi” /
T04ksmadhlu:1323: tatra ko hi nāma bhāva iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1325: sa eva tadanirvacanīyatāyāmavabuddhatvad asaṃskṛtanāmnā kevalaṃ vyavahiyate” /
T04ksmadhlu:1327: tathā bhagavatpravacaneṣu ca yadāryajñānagocaraṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ tad bhāvasvabhāvena saditi nirdiṣṭam,
T04ksmadhlu:1330: atrāryajñānagocarāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yo hi nairātmyalakṣaṇo dharmadhatuḥ sa eva bhāvaśabdena vivakṣayā vastvabhiniveśaśālināṃ bhayasthānaṃ parihartukāmena tathā deśitam /
T04ksmadhlu:1331: athavā āryajñānāni sarve ca dharmāḥ tathatāpannāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1333: bhagavadbhitrapi vineyajanāśayānurodhena tāvat sā dharmataiva vividhairupāyairupadiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:1335: padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā bālānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1344: utpādād vā tathāgatānāmanutpādād vā tathāgatanāṃ sarvakāleṣu sthitatvād asaṃskṛteti nāmnāpi vyapadiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:1347: anyathā bhavatsammatam asaṃskṛtastvapi tat kathaṃ bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:1351: vadanti ye vai tathatāmasaṃkṛtāṃ tathaiva cānye kṛtakāṃ yatastām /
T04ksmadhlu:1352: notsāhavanto hyubhaye bhavanti dharmasya jñāne sugatopadiṣṭe //
T04ksmadhlu:1353: atastaditthaṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayorvastutvagrāhastāvad antagrāha iti athavā śrāvakapratyekabuddhanāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1354: yad gocaraṃ tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ vastitvatyabhyupagacchātāṃ bālānāṃ kevalaṃ santrāsapadavivarjanārthameva
T04ksmadhlu:1356: buddhabodhiattvānām atyantalokottarajñānasya viṣayastu pāramārthikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvathāsat,
T04ksmadhlu:1365: yadi buddhabodhisattvānāṃ jñānasya viṣayaḥ paramārthalakṣaṇena sahaikībhūtaṃ tadā kathaṃ tajjñānaṃ satpakṣavivarjitaṃ syāt?
T04ksmadhlu:1366: ata eva hi bālānāṃ santrāsapadavivarjanārtham āryajñānagocaraṃ vastusadityupadiṣṭam,
T04ksmadhlu:1367: na tu paramārthato vastu svalakṣaṇasaditi kathanārtham /
T04ksmadhlu:1369: tadā buddhāṃ bodhisattvāśca sadvikalpasambaddhā na bhavantīti?
T04ksmadhlu:1373: tathā hi āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre - “kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyasidṛṣṭiṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1378: na ca na cāstītvadṛṣṭirnipātyate āryavastusvabhāvanirdeśenaḥ kintu uttrāsapadavivārjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate,
T04ksmadhlu:1382: kiṃ tu mahāmate svayamevādhigatayāthātathyaviviktadharmavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti” - iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1383: ato yadāryajñānagocaraviṣayo vastusvalakṣaṇatvena nirdiṣṭa nirdiṣṭaḥ sa tāvad bhagavata upāyenaiva deśanāmātram /
T04ksmadhlu:1384: ato bhagavato 'sandigdhaṃ pravacananayamanupādāya te mithyā [moṣadharmakaṃ] vastusvabhāvatvena vikalpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1385: te tāvābhimānino bhagavantamapi apavādya svayaṃ vinaśyanti parāṃścāpi nāśayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1386: evamitthamasninneva sūtre vastusabhāvābhiniveśinaḥ ātmagrāhagṛhītatvānna muktā bhaviṣyantītyevaṃ samupadiṣṭam - “punaraparaṃ mahāmate,
T04ksmadhlu:1387: pramāṇatrayāvayavapratyavasthānaṃ kṛtyā āryajñānapratyātmādhigamyaṃ svabhāvadvayavinirmuktaṃ vastu svabhāvato vidyata iti vikalpayiṣyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1390: sa evaiṣāmātmagrāhaḥ poṣagrāhaḥ puruṣagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāhaḥ syāt” /
T04ksmadhlu:1391: api ca, yadi paramārthataḥ syāt kimapi vastusat tadā tadavaśyaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā syād,
T04ksmadhlu:1393: tasmin vastūni nityānityatvacintayā pravṛttā yā prajñā,
T04ksmadhlu:1396: ata eva tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yaduktaṃ tenāpi virodhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1398: ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitāro vā yadā prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti tadā prajñāpāramitāvadevopadiśanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1402: evameva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni dhyānāpramāṇārupānusmṛtisatmyakprahāṇārddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni
T04ksmadhlu:1407: tatra ye prajñāpāramitāvanna kaurvanti tatkathamiti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1417: yataśca yatrarūpameva nāsti tatra kuto nityamanityaṃ vāāa?
T04ksmadhlu:1422: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatha mā ca kamapi dharmaṃ samatikramatha,
T04ksmadhlu:1428: yato hi sarve dharmā svabhāvataḥ śūnyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1432: tasyāṃ na ko 'pi grāhyo heya utyādyo nirodhyaśceti /
T04ksmadhlu:1435: ataḥ sarve vastuvādinastāvad dharmatathatāṃ viparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ [tannirdeśaḥ] prajñāpāramitopadeśa iva prativarṇika eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1436: sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāvādinastvaviparītatayā nirdiśantyataḥ sopattikā eva ta iti bhagavatā suspaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:1440: tāvadāgamadvara sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyāḥ' ityabhidadhatāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1442: tatra yadyalpamatitayā evaṃvidhaṃ gambhīradharmatāṃ nādhimoktuṃ pārayanti tathāpi savikalpamātmano mandaprajñatvadosamavalokayadbhistatparityāgo naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1443: ātmānaṃ vināśya pareṣāmapi mahārthavirahaṃ kṛtvā praṇāśo naiva samīcīnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1444: evaṃ hi sati svaparadroha eva sa syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1445: ataḥ prajñāvantaḥ śraddhāvantaśca gambhiradharmaparityādagṛṣṭiṃ parivarjya bhagavantaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1446: pramāṇīkṛtya ātmano 'jñānadoṣakāraṇāt tadaparijñānaṃ sambhāvyata iti vicārya gambhīrasūtreṣu
T04ksmadhlu:1450: ata eva āryaratnakūṭasūtre proktam - “ye 'sya gambhīradharmasya gāmbhīrya prajñayā avaboddhumaśaknuvānāste tathāgatameva pramāṇaṃ kurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1452: yataśca vividhādhimokṣānusāraṃ tathāgatā eva dharmopadeśe pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:1454: nāsmādṛśairjñātuṃ śakyata iti vicārya tatparityāgo naiva yuktarūpaḥ” /
T04ksmadhlu:1455: ityuvamāgamamukhena sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā eveti siddhā bhavanti / 48
T04ksmadhlu:1458: te dvayābhāsasya mithyātvena tadvyavasthāpitaḥ svabhāvo 'pi mithaivetyabhidadhate /
T04ksmadhlu:1462: dvayābhāso 'pi yadi mithyaiva tadā katajjñānarūpamavaśiṣyate yat khalu paramārthasad bhavet?
T04ksmadhlu:1463: anyattad vijñānaṃ grāhakākārarahitaṃ tadarvāgdarśibhiḥ nānubhavituṃ yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1470: yato hi kāmaṃ syāttadadvayaviruddhaṃ tathāpi tena kāryakāraṇabhāva eva na siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1477: ataśca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyabhūtasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya siddhaye paramārthe 'dvayajñānena gṛhyamāṇaṃ kimapi nāsti /
T04ksmadhlu:1479: yathocyate kaiścit - yo hi yatsvabhāvaviruddhaḥ sa tatsvabhāvaviviktaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1484: na cāpi hetorāśrayāsiddhiḥ sāamānyasukhaduḥkhākāravedakasya dharmiṇo jñānākhyapratītisvabhāvena siddhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1486: grāhyākārasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena asattve tadāśritaḥ parikalpito grāhakākāro 'pi niḥsvabhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1490: yadi sāmānyena paramārthato dvayaviviktastvaṃ sādhayitumiṣyate tadā siddhasādhanameva,
T04ksmadhlu:1491: yato hi vayamapi paramārthato dvayasya mithyātvād viviktatvamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1492: yadi hyabhāvasvabhāvaḥ khalu paramārthata ākāravirahitavijñānatvena sādhayitumiṣyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1494: yato hi vayamapi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpannatvāt sarvavijñānāni tāvat paramārthato 'siddhāni dvayākārasuviyuktānītyabhyupagacchāmaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:1495: yadi vijñānākhyaṃ dharmiṇaṃ dvayaviyuktatvena vastusattvena ca sādhayitumiṣyate tadā dṛṣṭāntavayāsiddhatvādanaikāntikattvaṃ hetoḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1497: ekasminneva jñāne jñānatadavabhāsayoravabhāsitatvena avirodho 'pi syādataḥ sādhyavikalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamapi syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:1498: yadi vijñānaṃ dvayaviyuktaṃ sidhyati tadā tadbalena svabhāvasattvamapi sidhyatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1501: yaddhi dvayaviyuktaṃ tadavaśyaṃ samyag vastusaditi ko hyatra sambandhaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:1502: yato hi yadi tannivartate tadānarthopasaṃhitaṃ pramāṇamapi nivartate /
T04ksmadhlu:1507: śītādisparśaviyuktānāmūṣmādīnāṃ svabhāvavat dvayasvabhāvātiriktaḥ tadviyuktasvabhāvatvena siddhaḥ pratītisvabhāvabhinnastatsamānasvabhāvaḥ kaścidapi dharmī nāstyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:1509: evaṃ hi anyavyaktinirapekṣaḥ san yaśca svayamevātmanābhivyajyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1511: kāyabhūmiparvatanadī sāgarādayo vividhākārā ye pugato 'vabhāsamānā bāhyārthāste svayamevātmanā abhivyajyamānatvāt pratītisvabhāvātikrāntā eva pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:1512: evamapi ye mithyatmanā kuleṣu gṛheṣu ca pravṛttimācaranti,
T04ksmadhlu:1513: teṣāṃ svakāyopagūḍhadayitayā pratītisvabhāvāliṅganamiva ācaraṇād asaddvayasamāyogo 'yaṃ dūṣitatvānna viśvāsayogyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1514: tathā ca dvayasvabhāvātmakāt priyatamād viyoge sati kimiva nānyena saha samāyogaḥ syādataḥ kevalamasyaiva dharmitvāvasthā naivopapadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1525: tathā sati ye nīlādivividhacittākārā bāhyārthatvena vijñāne 'vabhāsante te karmakartṛvyavahārānabhijñaiḥ kalpanādoṣavinirmukte citte spaṣṭato 'nubhūtā bhaviṣyantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:1527: tasya tāvad viśeṣasya bālaparyantaṃ nāsti suspaṣṭāvabodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1529: mithyaiveti bhavantaḥ svīrkunti tadā vimiktikāṃkṣiṇo bhavantaḥ tirobhūtadvayasvabhāvarahitātmakaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1532: ataśca svatīkṣṇaprajñākhaḍgena tāmāsaktiṃ chittvā kaścana tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattikṣaṇo
T04ksmadhlu:1539: ityevamavaśyaṃ kalpanābhinnasya asatsvabhāvākārāvabhāsasya svīkāraṇāt tallakṣaṇānvita evābhyupagantavyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1541: yadyevaṃ na syāt kathaṃ nāma mithyākārakalpanāsvabhāvoyostādātmyenānubhavo jāyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:1544: sa na satyaṃ nāpi mṛṣā” iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1546: evaṃ katipayaiḥ pratyakṣaiḥ 'sarve dharmā viviktā' iti jñātumaśakyatvat /
T04ksmadhlu:1547: vastveva teṣāṃ viṣaya ityabhidadhānāstāvat praṣṭavyā kiṃ sarvesāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ yāni
T04ksmadhlu:1548: pratyakṣāṇi tāni sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ nāvaboddhauṃ samarthāni utāho ghanājñanatimiropahatamatiyanānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1552: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣāṇi na pravartanta iti niścāyakasya pramāṇasyābhāvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1556: tasmin apravṛttijñānāṃ sarveṣāṃ strīpurusāṇāṃ cittasantatau pravartamānā yā cittapravṛtiḥ sā tāvānnaiva arvāgdarśināmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1558: ataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣeṇa tajjñānaṃ naiva bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1560: vayamapi hi arvāgdarśibhistathāvidhasya tāvad gambhīradharmatattvasya pratyakṣato darśanaṃ naiva manyāmahe /
T04ksmadhlu:1564: pratyakṣeṇa tāvat sarvadharmanairātmyabodho bhavatyeveti kasmātra sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1567: evamarvāgdarśināṃ yāni pratyakṣāṇi tāni timiropahatapratyakṣavad rupādimithyāviṣayakatvād vastusvabhāvaviṣayatvena samyagviṣayatvena vā tāvannaiva
T04ksmadhlu:1569: buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāyogināṃ cāpi jñānāni naiva tāvad vastuviṣayakatvena prasidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1570: yasmānna taiḥ kaścanāpi aviparīto vastusvabhāvaḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1572: yaduta sarve tairdharmā nisvabhāvāḥ aniruddhāḥ prakṛtyopaśāntāḥ atyantamajātāḥ atyantamabhūtāḥ atyantaparinirvṛtā eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1574: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad yena dṛṣṭaṃ tadapyanirdarśanamavidarśanaṃ ca,
T04ksmadhlu:1575: yato hi tat samyagdarśanaṃ yathāvad darśanaṃ ceti /
T04ksmadhlu:1576: kiṃ punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathāvad darśanamiti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:1580: iti / ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayāṇāṃ samyagvastutvaṃ na sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:1587: teṣu samyagarthabhāvanābalena prāntakoṭikadhyānāvāptito 'nuttarācintyaprabhāvasampannatayā tatpratyakṣeṣu sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ bhavatyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:1591: atha yattāvat pratyakṣaṃ tat sasvabhāvamiti yaduktaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādaikarasatvat pratyakṣamapi paramārthato niḥsvabhāvameva,
T04ksmadhlu:1592: tathāpi yā saṃvṛtisatyāśritā pratyakṣavyavasthā sā sarvā tāvadavyāhayaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1593: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi mādhyakāḥ sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ vyāvahārikāṇāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1594: yogijñānānāmapareṣāṃ pṛthagjanajñānānām āryapudgalādīnāṃ ye hetavastātānnaiva nābhyupagacchanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1595: kintuṃ ye tāvat saṃvṛtito 'pyahetukāste khalu vyavahārato 'pyanutpannā eva,
T04ksmadhlu:1597: yat sat tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvamapi tāvadutpadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1601: tathaiva pratītyasamutpannatve 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ nāsti vastutāprasaṅgaḥ pramāṇabādhitatvāta /
T04ksmadhlu:1602: yathaiva hi mantroṣadhādiprabhāveṇa gajādivividhamāyāprādurbhāvastathaiva karmakleśādiprabhāveṇ sattvānāmutpādādayaḥ prādurbhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1604: yato hi vividhairhi pratyayaiḥ sā māyāpi vividhaivāvabhāsate /
T04ksmadhlu:1605: āryaprajñāpāramitāsūtre 'uyuktamḥ “kaścichrāvakanirmitaḥ [kaścit pratyekabuddhanirmitaḥ] kaścid bodhisattvanirmitaḥ kaścit tathāganitmitaḥ kaścit karmanirmitaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1608: bālapṛthagjanebhyastāvad yogināmetadeva vaiśiṣṭayaṃ yatte māyākāra iva yathāvanmāyāṃ parijānanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1612: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:1618: ataḥ saṃvṛtiyogahini yogipratyakṣe tathā sthitatvātteṣāṃ śaśaśṛṅga ivātyantābhāvo naiva bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:1621: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi yoginaḥ pṛthagjana iva vyavahāratayā vyavasthāpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1624: pratyakṣeṇa parigṛhya taditaraśūnyapratyakṣeṇa tāvadavabudhyate' - ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1628: lakṣanaśūnyatve u sarve dharmāstāvat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvenaivābhyupagamyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1631: yā hi vastūnāmitaretaraśūnyatā sā naiva paramārthaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1637: yato hi svapnamāyādisadṛśavastūnāṃ svabhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ parasparamabhinnaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1646: sā upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāpi satī yogibhiḥ paramārthatayā anupalabdhākāraiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1647: ataḥ sarve dharmā nirābhāsajñānotpattyā jñātā bhavantīti vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1648: ata eva ca itaretaraśūnyatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ parikalpanāmaśrityaivābhihitā,
T04ksmadhlu:1650: [5] sā ca 'yogipratyakṣeṇa samyagavagamye' ti kathanaṃ naiva viduṣāṃ rucikaram /
T04ksmadhlu:1651: yuktyabhāvastatreti yat kathanaṃ tadapi nāsti yuktisaṅgatam,
T04ksmadhlu:1656: spaṣṭaṃ jñānamupajāyate yena te tān puraḥsthitaniva dṛṣṭvā sahasā vividhaśarīrakampādibhiśceṣṭamānā dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1657: ataśca yathoktatatvaṃ bhāvayatsu tajjñanamutpatsyata eveti sambhāvyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1661: prayogaḥ - ye tāvat kecinnirantaraṃ sādaraṃ bhāvanāmanutiṣṭhanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1664: yatra cirakālaṃ nirantaraṃ sādaraṃ sarvadharmanairātmyabhāvanaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1669: spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad yajjñānamavisaṃvādaṇaṃ janayati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:1671: sarvadharmanairātmyaviṣayakaṃ yogināṃ jñānamapi spaṣṭāvabhāsamānaṃ sad avisaṃvādakamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1672: yadyevaṃ sarvadharmanairātmyajñānaṃ yuktibhiḥ susādhyaṃ tadā kathamiva vidvāṃsastatra na pritāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:1678: na ca te 'smābhirnābhyupeyanta iti yaduktaṃ tattathā /
T04ksmadhlu:1682: sarvasāṃ yuktīnāṃ viṣayasya svabhāvasya cāsiddhatvāt” ietyavamuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1684: itthamasmābhirniḥsvabhāvatvenābhyupete sati yadā bhavantaḥ prasaṅgamāpādayanti tadā sa prasaṅga eva nāsti /
T04ksmadhlu:1687: tadā sa prasaṅga eva na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:1692: vayaṃ tāvad bhavadbhiḥ prayuktaṃ dūṣṇamapi paramārthato 'nutpannamevābhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1697: ityaktam / yat paramārthato 'sat tad vyavahāre 'pi pravartituṃ na śakyata ityevaṃ yo hi prasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1700: yato hi yena kāraṇena yasyātmanivartanaṃ tena tasya vyavahāranivartanaṃ tu nāsti paramārthasvabhāvavyāptam,
T04ksmadhlu:1703: paramārthasvabhāvavirāhitā api svapnādayo vividhavyavahāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1704: ataḥ sarve 'pi tāvad vyavahārā nirmāṇasvapnādivadaviruddhā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1708: iti hetoḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve sati nānumānādivyavahārāḥ pravartsyanta iti
T04ksmadhlu:1711: nirvivādarūpatayā saprasaṅgatvāt paramārtadharmyādibhiḥ anumānādivyavahārāḥ kutrāpi naiva siddhāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1712: tathāpi loke yathāprasiddha eva dharmiṇi vyavahārā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1713: yato hi pravādino hi tattvānirṇayārthameva anumānādivyavahārān prayuñjanti / yathoktam -
T04ksmadhlu:1723: pramāṇasya tāvat sarvāṇi lakṣaṇāni tattvapravṛtyarthameva bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1725: pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstrāṇyanadhīyānāsu gopālakāṅganāsu evamupadeśābhāve 'pi dhūmādiliṅgadarśanato 'gnyādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1726: ata eva vayamapi tattvapraveśāya tathatāvyavahārābhyāmanumānādipravartanād doṣarahitā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1727: api ca, ye vyavahāreṇānumānādipravṛttau yatrānityādi vastudharmaṃ satsvabhāvaṃ sādhayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1728: teṣāṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ tatra vyavahāreṇa vastubhūtadharmādayaḥ syureva,
T04ksmadhlu:1729: yato hi tatra tathāvidhā āśrayahīnā sādhyadisthitirnaiva siddhā /
T04ksmadhlu:1730: yadi tatra tathāvidha āśrayo nāsti tadā sādhyaniṣedhanād āśrayā siddhyākhyo doṣo dīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1731: so 'pi yadi yathābhūtadharmiṇo nivṛttiścettadā niḥsaṃśayaṃ sādhyādidharmiṇo 'vinābhāvasya niṣedhaṃ karoti,
T04ksmadhlu:1732: yato hi asiddhe sati hetvasiddhayādidoṣā dīyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1733: svayamupakalpitānāṃ katipayadharmiṇāṃ nivṛttāvapi sādhayādeḥ kasyāpi niṣedhasyābhāvād asiddhayādidoṣā naiva yujyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1748: ata eva sādhyadharmaṃ tadanukūladharmiṇaṃ cāvagantuṃ pakṣalakṣaṇavelāyāmeva yuktividbhirviśeṣeṇa 'svadharma' ityabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1754: sādhyasādhanayoriva ākāśādirnaiva vastubhūtaḥ svabhāvadharmīti sādhanabhūto 'yaṃ heturāśrayāsiddha ityapare /
T04ksmadhlu:1755: tatrāpi ākāśadidharmiṇāṃ vastutāyāḥ kṛte 'pyatra nirākaraṇe sādhyābhāvamātramabhyupagacchatāṃ nāsti ko 'pi doṣaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1758: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:1759: na tu dharmāntarayukto dharmītyevaṃ nirdeśakāle sveṣṭapratyakṣānumānāptaprasiddhidvārā
T04ksmadhlu:1760: niṣedhamavidhāya svabhāvasyaiva tāvanniṣedhaḥ svadharmī bhavatītyatra pakṣadharmatāvasthāyāmācāryeṇa
T04ksmadhlu:1775: anyathā kramayaugapadyābhyāmabhivyaktena arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogena paraparikalpitaḥ padārthāḥ kathamiva niṣeddhuṃ śakṣyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1777: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1780: nāsti tat kṣaṇikaṃ vāpi saccāpi na hi vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1783: tairthikaiḥparikalpiteṣu dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyādiṣu niṣeddhumiṣyamāṇeṣvapi kathaṃ tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā naiva pravartsyante?
T04ksmadhlu:1784: yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam /
T04ksmadhlu:1785: phalata ekāntenaiṣāmabhāvo vyavahāre kathaṃ siddhaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:1787: atha pramāṇameva prasaṅgasādhanamiti cettadā kimiva tatra āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣā na pravartante?
T04ksmadhlu:1788: yukttibalena āgantuśīleṣu doṣeṣu prekṣāvadbhiḥ svataḥ [svapakṣataḥ] siddhirnaiva yuktimatī atha bāhyārthādīn niṣeddhukāmānāṃ vidyata eva vastubhūto buddhilakṣaṇo dharmī,
T04ksmadhlu:1790: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo
T04ksmadhlu:1794: yadi te tatprasiddhatvamabhyupagacchanti tadā bāhyapradhānādivat buddhireva śaktatvaikānekatvavyāptadharmaviyuktatvanniḥsvabhāvaiva tāvat setsyati,
T04ksmadhlu:1798: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāttadā] tato bahyapradhānādayo na niḥsvabhāvāḥ setyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1799: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1800: buddhau tāvat siddhe 'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,
T04ksmadhlu:1806: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1807: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,
T04ksmadhlu:1808: yato hyanye [vādinaḥ] teṣu tayā utpattimattvābhāvadharmaṃ nābhyupayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1810: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,
T04ksmadhlu:1812: sa paramārthataḥ svabhāvavirahito 'pi bhrāntyā bāhyamiva pradhānādyabhinnamiva sarvasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ ca sarvadharmasamavetamiva kalpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:1814: yato hi sa bālairbāhyapadhānādyupagṛhītavādiprativādibhirapi taimirikairdvicandradarśanamiva tadabhinnatayaiva vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1815: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
T04ksmadhlu:1816: tathāpi tadākāratayā buddhirityevamupacaryate vastuto 'yaṃ nāsti [kathamapi] buddhisvabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1818: ataḥ siddhe 'pi tasya niḥsvabhāvatve buddhiniḥ svabhāvatāyā nāsti prasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1819: yato hi bāhyapradhānādīnāṃ tāvanniṣedhastu pramāṇaiḥ sādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1821: vastusatāṃ śabdādibāhyadharmiṇām anityādidharmasiddhaye [te] bāhyaśabdādayastabhinnāśca buddhistha upacāradharmiṇyevāśrayante,
T04ksmadhlu:1822: yato hi te deśakālādibhīnnāvasthāniyatā bāhyaśabdādayo vādiprativādināṃ buddhau svasvabhāvena naiva pratyakṣībhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1825: ato 'numānāmeyādayaḥ sarve vyavahārā buddhistha eva dharmiṇyāśritāḥ pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:1827: yadyevaṃ tadā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve parikalpitadharmiṇaṃ niḥśritya niṣedhādisiddhayartham āśrayāsiddhādidoṣāṇāmapravṛttavapi kāmaṃ balenāsmāsu apālambhāḥ kriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1828: yathā hi paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ bhavantaḥ pradhānādiniṣedhye parikalpitadharmiṇyeva sādhyasādhanādīn manasikurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1829: tathaiva vayamapi prasiddheṣu rūpaśabdādiṣu ye tāvat sadasadādisvabhāvā āropyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1831: tatra yathā āropite dharmiṇi vastutvāropaṇaniṣedhae 'pi vādiprativādiṣu pratībhāsamānatvād asadādidoṣā na pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:1834: avabhāso hi tatkāraṇanivṛttyā jāyamānena satyasvabhāvena tāvannasti vyāptaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1836: yadyevaṃ no cettadā sarve puruṣāstadarśinaḥ syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1838: yathaiva hi tasmin parikalpitadharmiṇi sāmarthyaśūnyatvavyāptyupanyāsena niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ prasādhya pradhānādayaḥ sādhyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1839: tathaivāsmābhirapi parikalpitavastuni tat [niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ] samyaktāa sādhayituṃ yathoktaḥ sāmarthyābhāvādiḥ kathaṃ na siddhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1843: atatstannirṇayo na kṛtaḥ vicāro 'pi nirṇayārthaka eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1844: yataḥ pramāṇādvārā siddhāntanirṇayakāle ko 'pi siddhānto nābhyupagato bhavatītyatastasmin kāle kasmin āśrayāsiddhimukhena dharmyasiddhayādidoṣaḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1845: atha vādī pramāṇaistattvanirṇayaṃ kṛtvā parebhyastatpratipādayituṃ pravṛtaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1849: pūrvata eva siddhāntamanabhyupagacchanto vādinaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇatastattvajñānaṃ kurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1850: taireva cāparānapi bodhayantīti kathaṃ siddhanto 'bhyupagataḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1851: pūrvaṃ svayaṃ pramāṇaistattvaściyaṃ kṛvā siddhāntena aparebhyo 'vabodhanamapi nāsti siddham /
T04ksmadhlu:1852: apare 'pi prekṣāvantastāvat tacchabdamātreṇaiva pramāṇairanupapanne 'rthe naiva viśvasanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1853: ataḥ svamirṇayavad aparebhyo 'pi nirdeśasamaye tādavasthyāt sarvatra pramāṇaireva tattvanirṇayaḥ kriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1855: ata eva kathaṃ tena dharmiṇastāvadasiddhādayaḥ pratīpādyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1856: samyakpramāṇabalena vādināmabhīṣṭasādhyasiddhāvapi 'siddhāntābhyupagamāt tebhyo doṣā jāyante' iti ye vadanti kiṃ teṣāṃ yuktyantaramiti /
T04ksmadhlu:1862: yadi tathāvidho dharmi siddho na syāttadā na ko 'pi kutrāpi tatsādhanārthaṃ pratvarteta /
T04ksmadhlu:1863: yadi tathāvidho siddhastadā taddharmoṃ 'pi ubhayasammataḥ siddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1865: ata eva sarve tattvajijñāsavaḥ siddhāntaviśeṣasiddhaṃ dharmiṇamapahāya āgopālaprasiddhameva tamāśritya sādhyasādhanaviṣayakaṃ cintanaṃ parivardhayanti
T04ksmadhlu:1869: [7] “yatkhalu paraprasiddhapramāṇaiḥ svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyaḥ” iti yaducyate tad dūṣaṇameva tāvanna bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:1871: ato vyavahāre vayam ubhayasiddhairhetvādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ sādhayāma ityevaṃ paścānnirdekṣyāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1873: na kenāpi samyagliṅgenāliṅgitā atiparokṣatvād” iti yaduktaṃ tadapi tāvannaiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1878: ataḥ avinābhāvaniyamanirdeśena sāmānyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmaṃ sādhayeyuriti kathanaṃ yujyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1879: tadvadatrāpi māyāmaricisvapnagandharvanagarādisadṛśeṣu katipayeṣveva dharmiṣu sa sidhyatītyataḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvād ekānekasvabhāvādidharmeṣu vyāptiḥ siddhaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:1880: api ca, asmābhiranyatra savivādeṣu rupādiṣu vyāptidharmopadarśanena sādhitatvānnāsti doṣa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:1881: [9-10] ye kecana - “kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ naiva sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā iti sādhayituṃ śakyante,
T04ksmadhlu:1885: yadā sādhanasvarupāntaḥpraviṣṭatvādimau vastusādhanāvityucyete tadā niḥsvabhāvatāyāmapi prayogaviśeṣavaśena sādhanasvabhāvāveva /
T04ksmadhlu:1888: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ” iti sāmānyena hetulakṣaṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:1892: tathāpi imau dvāvapi teṣu vyavahārasatyatvena vidyete eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1894: “kevalaṃ samyak kāryamātreṇa svabhāvamātreṇa vā hetunā bhavitavyam” iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1897: “ādarśadigataḥ pratibimbo hi tāvadanyadekaṃ rūpam” iti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1900: “tadeva rūpaṃ tathaivālambyate” idamapi kathanaṃ naiva samīcīnam,
T04ksmadhlu:1907: 'vijñānasyaiva pratibimbākāratayā pratibhāsanādasti sa [ākāraḥ] vijñāsvabhāvena vastusan' idi yaduktaṃ tadapi na yuktiyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:1908: yato hi amūrtaṃ nīlādivijñānaṃ niraṃśatayā sthitaṃ vividhākārarahitameva bhavatītyucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1909: pratibimbavastu tadvilakṣaṇatayā pratibhāsata ityataḥ kathaṃ sa [ākāraḥ] tatsvabhāvena san syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1910: yathoktaṃ bhavatāpi triṃśikāyāṃ pudgalaniḥsvabhāvataṃ pratipādayatā yad yo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa sarvathā nithyaiva,
T04ksmadhlu:1913: tathaivānye 'pi paraparikalpitadharmā naivālambitā bhavantīti kathaṃ nocyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1914: yathācāryairnirdiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsādhanāyāṃ vyāpyānupalabdhikṣaṇā dharmāḥ kathaṃ noktāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1919: [11-12] viruddhopalabdhyādayo 'sambhavā iti yaduktaṃ tā atyasambaddhā eveti /
T04ksmadhlu:1920: yato hi sarve dharmā viviktāḥ katipaye ca sahaviruddhā iti na sidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1921: tathāpi māyākhapuṣpādayaśca sāmānyatayā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sahaviruddhāśceti sidhyantyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:1922: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā katham bhavadbhiḥ paraparikalpitā īśvarādayo niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhayituṃ śakyante /
T04ksmadhlu:1923: ataḥ sāmānyena niḥsvabhāvatāmātreṇa yadi vyavahāre viruddhādayaḥ sidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1924: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvābhyupagame virusśādharmādīnupadarśaya niḥsvabhāvatvena teṣāṃ samyak sādhanāt kimatra tāvad virodha
T04ksmadhlu:1926: yato hi paramārthato niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu bhūtarupābhivyaktistu,
T04ksmadhlu:1929: ato yadi sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥsahānavasthānaviruddhāśca sidhyantyatastadviruddheṣu vastutāprasaṅga iti na vaktavyam,
T04ksmadhlu:1932: evameva dīpakādau adṛḍhalakṣaṇe vastuni paricchinne sati dṛḍhākāraviviktataiva tāvat paricchidyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1937: sa abhāva eva tāavat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo viradho vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1941: prasiddhe 'pi tasmin virodhe dīpakādayo hi vasturupeṇātyantamanupapannāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1942: māyādimithyāvastuṣvapi jātivināśayoravabhāsamānatvāt ata eva ācāryaiḥ paramārthapravṛttyarthaṃ yathā dīpakādiṣu nityānityādivirodho 'vabhāsate,
T04ksmadhlu:1946: paramārthavastusvabhāvena sahānavasthānalakṣaṇavirodhasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ paramārthavastusvabhāve na kathañcit pravartate,
T04ksmadhlu:1951: yadi pratyayāntarairvināśa iti tadā na vināśahetubhistatra kimapyupakriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:1952: pratyayāntaraiḥ kriyamāṇe 'pi vināśe sa svahetubhireva kriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1954: yadyavastutvād vināśasya tattvena anyatvena vā tasya vijñaptirna yujyata iti cintyate tadā ātyantikatayā sa vināśakāraṇairna kriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:1956: ato 'kiñcitkarā agnyādayo hi kathaṃ nāma paramārthato viruddhāḥ setsyanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1957: tathāpyagnyādayaḥ śītādīn kramaśo niḥsāmarthalakṣaṇān anityān prakarṣatamān utpādayantyata eva te hyagnyādayo viruddhā iti kevalaṃ vyavahriyanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:1958: ata ācāryairvirodhanayo 'yamityukto na tu virodha evetyuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1959: ataśca virodho 'yaṃ vyavahāramātrāśrita evokto na tu paramārthāśritaḥ agniśītādayaśca na paramārthato bāhyārthasvabhāvāḥ sidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:1966: yato hi vṛkṣādayo vyāpakāḥ vastutaḥ sāmānyātmakāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1977: atastāni vyāvahārikeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvena vastusvabhāvatvena vyāptāni bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1978: kintu tāvatā tāni paramārthasvabhāvatayā na samavatiṣṭhante /
T04ksmadhlu:1979: yato hi vyāpake vidyamāne 'pi sati vyāpyasya siddhirna niyatā /
T04ksmadhlu:1980: tathāpi vastusvabhāvatvena suvyāptāni kāryakāranavastūni yadi nivatante,
T04ksmadhlu:1981: tadā māyādivat paramārthataḥ parikalpito vastusvabhāva eva nivartate /
T04ksmadhlu:1984: tairthikaparikalpitatāni pramāṇādīnī tathātāyā ananukūlatvāt parītyājyānītī sanyakpramāṇalakṣaṇapratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇayanaṃ kṛtamiti
T04ksmadhlu:1985: itthaṃ katipaye tairthikāḥ piṇḍātmādikaṃ mithyāvastutattvaṃ sisādhayiṣayā sarvajñatāvirāgitākarmaphalasambandhādīnāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:1986: sāṃvṛtikīṃ vyavasthāṃ nirākartuṃ pramāṇānāṃ viparītalakṣaṇāni kurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:1988: karmaphalasambandhādivyāvasthāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ viśuddhāni pramāṇalakṣaṇāni viracitavantaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:1991: ato virodhādivyavahārāṇāṃ svīkṛtiātreṇa yo hi bhāvasvabhāvābhyupagamaprasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:1994: [20] nanvevamanumānena saha sambandhaprasidhyarthaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate tadā vastunastāvat siddhireva,
T04ksmadhlu:1996: abhrāntajñānenādhyavasitaḥ khalu vastusvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nāmānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate?
T04ksmadhlu:1997: yadi nirakriyate tadā pratyakṣameva tāvad bādhitaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:1998: yadi tad bādhitaṃ syāttadānumānameva tāvanna syāt sisthitam /
T04ksmadhlu:1999: pratyakṣasambaddhenāpyunumānena pratyakṣaṃ bādhyata iti kathanato naivācitamanyat /
T04ksmadhlu:2000: yadi pratyakṣasiddho 'rtho 'numānena naiva bādhyate tadā prāpyasya prāptyā susthita eva tāvad vastuvādīti kathanamapi samyaṅnirākṛtameveti /
T04ksmadhlu:2002: tatra yaddhi sādharaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat paramārthamadhikṛtya nāstyabhrāntam /
T04ksmadhlu:2003: anyathā sarvaṃ yogipratyakṣameva syānna ca syuḥ kecanāpyarvāgdarśinaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2004: yogipratyakṣātiriktaṃ sāmānya pratyakṣaṃ yadyapi [abhrāntaṃ] nāsti tathāpi vyavahāre svapnādivad yathāprasiddhenārthena sahāvisaṃvādāttadabhrāntamucyate
T04ksmadhlu:2009: phalato yadeva sarvākāratattvamadhikṛtyābhrāntaṃ tadeva sarvākāratattvāvisaṃvādād yathārthamabhrāntamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:2010: ata eva bhagavadbhireva tāvat sarvadharmalakṣaṇarahitatā parijñātā /
T04ksmadhlu:2027: yato hi arvāgdarśibhirvāstavikaḥ paramārśasvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣatayā pṛthak pṛthak nānubhūyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2028: ato naiva vastusvabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtimapi bādhate kintu yo hi tatra satyākāratvāropastannirākṛtireva sādhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2029: phalano vastuvādino arthābhāve 'pi arthābhiniveśinaste kathaṃ susthitā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2030: ekato 'numānaṃ vyavahāreṇa pratyakṣasambaddhaṃ sat sthitiṃ pratnoti,
T04ksmadhlu:2031: aparataśca pratyakṣaṃ kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajatitāgniriva tadbādhāṃ karotīti bādhitameva taditi cennaitāvatāsmāsvaniṣṭāpattiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:2033: sa ca mithyendhanāni bhasmīkṛtya svayamapyupaśāntaḥ praśāntavikalpalakṣaṇamuttamaṃ nirvāṇamavabodhayatīti / yaduta -
T04ksmadhlu:2036: ato yadi tattvajñānamutyadyate tadānumānalakṣṇā kalpanā nivṛttā satī nirāśrayāpi nānabhyupagatā [bhavatī] /
T04ksmadhlu:2037: ata eva bhagavatā ratnakūṭe savikalpāpi sampratyavekṣaṇā nirvikalpajñānaphalotpatteḥ kāraṇamiti [matvā] mahāphalābhinirvṛttaye kāṣṭhadvayagharṣaṇajanitāgnerdṛṣṭāntena nirdiṣṭā /
T04ksmadhlu:2038: [21] api ca, sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane yadyeko hetubhūto dharmo nīrdiśyate tadā nivṛtisādhakaḥ sa dharmo viruddho jāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2039: [22] yadyasan sa dharmastadā asato 'bhāvenāsambaddhatvāt kathaṃ hi sa [abhāvaṃ] sādhayediti /
T04ksmadhlu:2042: yato hyanena tāvat sadasadubhayadharmāṇāṃ paramārthatvasādhane hetorasambhavatvavocyate yuktijñaiḥ na tu niḥsvabhāvatādisāmānyadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasādhane
T04ksmadhlu:2043: yadi tathaiva syāttadā paraparikalpitānāmīśvarādīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvasādhane kathaṃ nāma te sarve codyā nābatariṣyantītī?
T04ksmadhlu:2044: tad yathā īśvarādiṣu sāmarthyavyāpyavastutvaniṣedhārthaṃ vastusvabhāve samāropaṃ ca nisedhārthaṃ asaddharmā na bhavantyasambaddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2045: evameva paramārthataḥ kāryakārāṇādivastudharmeṣu vyāpakaniṣedhena samāropaniṣedhaṃ sādhayituṃ kathaṃ nāsmāsu sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2047: yato hi vastusati svabhāve na tathā kartuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2048: yadi asatā asambaddhatayā asāmarthaṃ tadā kutra sāmarthyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2049: paramarthato 'sadvastuni na bhavati kaścana sambandho nāma /
T04ksmadhlu:2051: yathā sadvastuni dharmadharmibhāvādisarvāṇi vastujātāni kalpitānīti vyavasthāpyante tathā asadvastunyapi kathaṃ tāni naiva vyavasthāpyante?
T04ksmadhlu:2052: api ca, yadā ko 'pi kadācidapi svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvatvena paramārthato naiva sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2055: atasteṣāṃ prativādo vā parīkṣaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ yujyeta,
T04ksmadhlu:2057: sattvasya tadabhāvasya cāpi hetorānukūlyena vādiprativādinoryathāprasiddhatvena te prasiddhayavinābhūtā evoktāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2058: atasteṣu dharmadharmitvaṃ viruddhatvaṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryatvādīni ca yathā ābhāsante tathaiva sarvā api vyavasthā aviruddhā eva
T04ksmadhlu:2059: kaiścid vidvadbhiryadi darśanasyāsya dharmadharmiviruddhādyādhāreṇa prativādaḥ kriyate tadā tatra paramārthavyavahāranayānavabodha eva kāranaṃ bhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2061: [24] tadapi na śabdamātreṇa sidhyatīti yaduktaṃ tanna duṣanamanabhyupagamāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2065: ityevaṃ yadi vastuṣu paramārthasvabhāva eko bhavati tadā prakāradvayameva tatra bhavet hetupratyayāpekṣitatvāt sarveṣām,
T04ksmadhlu:2070: svabhāve 'smin ubhayamapi prakādvayaṃ paramārthatayā na sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2072: yadi pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā tatra sādhakapramāṇaṃ tadā vastusvabhāva eva pūrvaṃ tāvadubhābhyāṃ na siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2074: kintu kāryakāraṇabhāva eva tāvat pratyakṣeṇa na paramārthataḥ siddhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2077: nāpi ca tanmānasapratyakṣaṃ kutrāpi sidhyatīti tatrāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2080: kintu kāryakāranabhūtasya tasyānyārthasya paramārthato jñānagrāhyatvaṃ naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2081: vijñāne svapratibhāsa iva yo hi jñānetarasvabhāvo 'nyāvabhāsaḥ [pratīyate],
T04ksmadhlu:2090: yo 'pi tadākārastajjñānākārameveti viśeṣābhidhāne satyapi vijñānasadṛśyenaivānyāvabodhaḥ saṃjāyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2093: yadi nāsti viśeṣastadārthakriyārthinaḥ svato vastvanudhānena samprayujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2097: jñānasvabhāvasāmyena ca teṣāmapi parasparaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:2098: tadudbhūtatve satīti viśeṣāntaropādāne 'pi anyārthasya pratyakṣatvena pratyatirasambhavaiva,
T04ksmadhlu:2099: yato hi abhyupagamamātreṇopacaritatvād viśeṣo na prasidhyatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2100: anayacca, anyārtho yadi pratyakṣatvena prasidhyati tadā jñānaviśeṣastāvattatsadṛśastadudbhūto vā sādhanīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2101: kathaṃ jñānenānyārtho gṛhyata ityevaṃ vicāryamāṇe 'nyārtho yadi pratyakṣato 'siddhastadā kathaṃ tāvadasiddhena svabhāvabiśeṣeṇa siddhā mārgaviśeṣāḥ setsyanta iti yāvat /
T04ksmadhlu:2102: tadvijñānakṣaṇikatvasyāpi samanantarapratyayārthānubalenopapannatvād yathā jñānāni pūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣatayā samudbhavanti tathā janmāntarāṇyapi sambhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2105: svasiddhāntānusāraṃ ca yathā taddarśanopacāraṃ kurvanti tathā pratyakṣatayāvabhāso nāstyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:2110: ariṣṭanīlākṣapītākṣatimirādyapahatanetreṣu dūrasamīpasthita ekasminnapi vastuni vibhinnāni viṣamākārāṇi jñānānyutpadyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2111: ato bāhyāvayaviviṣayakaṃ kalpanājālaṃ citte nāstyeva vidyamānam,
T04ksmadhlu:2116: svapnādiṣu tathānīlādiguvatāmarthāntarāṇāṃ vidyamānatve 'pi nīlādyābhāsijñānānāṃ pṛthaganubhavo bhrānta evaṃ,
T04ksmadhlu:2118: ye khalu paramāṇvātmakalīādyarthānāṃ pratyakṣatvamāmanvate teṣvapi tāvat samānadoṣatāprasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2132: yasthūle bhrāntaṃ tattathāgrahaṇataḥ pūrvamapi na [abhrāntaṃ] sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2134: purataḥ pramāṇairyadi pramāṇyaṃ sidhyati tadā yā sthule bhrāntiḥ sā grahaṇapūrvikaivaikā sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2135: yadi na tathā sidhyati tadā sā bhrāntirgṛhītetyeva na sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2142: api ca, yādyākārā yāthātathyenābhyupagamyante tadā yathā vividhānāṃ rekhādīnāṃ vistārastathā jñānākārāṇāmapi ākāravat pṛthaktvam prasajyeta
T04ksmadhlu:2143: siddhāntavaividhyasthāpanārtham anekajñānānāmutpādamavagacchato vijñānasya viṣayeṣu yathā prasārastathābhāso 'sambhāva eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2145: yadi [ākārāḥ] bhinnāstadā arthasadṛśjñānena teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2153: api ca, yadi jñānasādṛśayaṃ sarvātmanā bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2159: yadi viparyaye hyupacārat karturekadeśa eva tadā sarvatra vastusādṛśyasambhāvanayā sarvajñātṛtvaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2168: yadi sa eva [anubhavaḥ] tadarthākārānubhavatvena gṛhyata iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2176: atyantaparokṣatvādarthāntarāṇāṃ te [arthāntarāḥ] tadīyajñānākāravantaḥ santīti naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2182: tadā yadi sāmīpyād vijñānenārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti kalpyate tadā sarvāṇyapi vijñānāni sarvasamīpaviṣayakāṇi syuḥ sarveṣu tatsattāyā bhedābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2185: tataśca 'idaṃ nīlaṃ pītamidam' iti vibhāgo naiva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2188: kalpanāsvarūpamātre jñānābhinnātmake sādṛśyātiriktatayā na kaścanāpi bhedo bhaviturmahati,
T04ksmadhlu:2190: sāmīpyavaśājjñānasya yadi nārthāntarādanubhavastadā kathamiti praśne tadutpattyaiveti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2198: viṣayatvābhāvādevendriyaṃ na gṛhyata iti cennaitāvatā tadaviṣāyatvam ,
T04ksmadhlu:2201: ataḥ aviṣayatvānnāsti tadviṣaya iti kathamiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2213: iti yaduktaṃ tadapyasiddham sākārabuddhayā arthāntaraparicchedābhāvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniśrcāyakapramāṇābhāve,
T04ksmadhlu:2215: anayā tāvad yuktyā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cittamātratākāyapramukhatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2218: kāryakāranabhāvastu pratyakṣasiddha iti cennaiva tad yuktimat,
T04ksmadhlu:2221: evaṃ yadi vijñānasya grāhyagrāhakākārarahitatve 'pi tasya vastusattvamabhyupagamyate tadā tatra tathānubhūterabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2223: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā sarvasyaiva tathatādarśanaṃ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2224: tajjñānamapi yathānubhūyate na tathā sthitaṃ bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2228: yadi jñānaṃ tadā naiva sā pratyakṣam,
