T04ksmadhlu:2234: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāsvabhāvaṃ tadā na tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayakam,
T04ksmadhlu:2240: yadi sa [grāhyagrāhakākāraḥ] mithyā tadā tadabhinnaḥ kalpanāsvabhāvo 'pi tathaiva mithyā,
T04ksmadhlu:2241: tathātve kathaṃ sa pratyakṣapramāṇena bhāvasvabhāvaḥ prasidhyet /
T04ksmadhlu:2242: yadi viśeṣo [viśeṣyaḥ] mithyā tadā kalpanāsvabhāvasya sāmānyasya vastutā asambhavinī,
T04ksmadhlu:2244: tadevaṃ tattvajñānasya yathāvadanubhavābhāvānnaiva tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatvaṃ yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2245: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣatve 'pi na hi tena jñānena kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2247: apekṣāviśeṣeṇa tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ parikalpyeta tathāpyarthāntaratvādapekṣāyāḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣābhāve sā naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2248: phalatastadapekṣayā vyavasthitasya tatsvabhāvasyāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na yuktiyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2249: kāryātmakasya kāraṇātmakasya ca svabhāvasya arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñānamapi bhinnaṃ bhinnam,
T04ksmadhlu:2251: yadyekasmin jñāne nānubhavastadā na kenāpi sambandhagrahaṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:2252: ekajñānāvabhāse 'pi 'idaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ cedam' iti pratyakṣe na śakyamubhayoḥ sattāsambandhagrahaṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:2256: tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayākarṣiṇā jñānenāpi paramārthatastad dvayaṃ naiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2265: yadi pratyakṣeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvo nānubhūyate kathaṃ tadā smṛtisvabhāvo 'pyutpadyeteti cenna,
T04ksmadhlu:2276: api ca, kāryahetunāpi sa vastutvena sādhayituṃ na śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2281: dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvapi paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye nāstyeva kutrāpi hetovyārptiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2285: taddhetukāle cāśeṣajagato vidyamānatvād 'asmin satī'ti tasya kāraṇatā naiva sarvathā sambhāvyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2290: kasyāpi kāryakṣaṇasya sattvaṃ kasyāpi karaṇakṣaṇasattvād yadi kalpyate tadā tatsamakālaṃ sarvasattvāntargaśeṣavidyamānakṣaṇānāmapi sattvaṃ syāt
T04ksmadhlu:2294: tathaiva taddhetukṣāsamākālaṃ sarvasattvāntargatāśeṣakṣaṇā vidyamānā yadi dṛśyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2296: evaṃ sati teṣāṃ kathaṃ na hetutvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2297: api ca, 'yadasti tat sat' ityuktau tacchabdena yadyanyo hetubhūto dharmītyevaṃ gṛhyate tadā so 'pi paramārthataḥ pratyakṣe naiva sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2301: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadā sato dharmasya hetutvaṃ naiva sambhavi nāpi cāsato dharmasya yaktam,
T04ksmadhlu:2306: yadi dharmī tāvadasiddhastadāparasyāpi sattvaṃ naiva sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2315: api ca, yā khalu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā samupalabdhiphalā,
T04ksmadhlu:2316: īdṛśonānvayena yā karyakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ tatrāpi paramārthataḥ sandehaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2317: kiṃ tattvataḥ sadityataḥ sat atavā adṛśyānāṃ piśācādīnāṃ samīpavartitvāt athavā dūredeśasthitasya vastvantarasya samīpavartino balādevaṃvidhaḥ samdehaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2318: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhyā deśāntarāt tadāgamanasya pūrvato vā tatsattvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2320: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ yādṛcchikaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2322: ye cānye tatsamarthahetavaḥ teṣāṃ nivṛttau tatphalasyāpi nivṛttau vyatirekena yā tatsiddhiruktā,
T04ksmadhlu:2326: yathā mātṛvivāhasaṃskāravati deśe janmādānam yatra ca nāsti mātṛvivāhastatrāsat /
T04ksmadhlu:2327: tatsamarthakāraṇāntarāṇi santītyevaṃ viśeṣābhāvānna syāt sandeha iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2330: kāryakāraṇayoḥ sandehe sati tannaiyatyārthaṃ yadyapi tatkāraṇaṃ samarthaṃ tathāpi prajñākṣetre viśeṣatastadasiddhivacanāni kathaṃ vidvadbhirnirākriyantām
T04ksmadhlu:2331: anvayavyatirekau vyatīricya vastuni tatsiddhiniścāyakahetūnāmabhāvāt tatrānavasthādoṣaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2332: yadi tat sattadā tatsattvaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2333: kintu sahakārivastūnāṃ pṛthaksvabhāva iva anyebhyastadutpattyāśaṅkā kathaṃ nivarteta /
T04ksmadhlu:2336: nārvagdarśināṃ parebhya utpattiniścayasya spaṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2337: yadi parebhyo 'pi tadutpattistadā na bhaved hetubhedād bheda iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2339: yadi pṛthak tadviśeṣeṣveva te sahakāripratyayā upayujyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2344: yadi viśeṣasya pṛthagviśeṣe upacaryamāṇatvāt sa tattvānyatvābhyāṃ cintayituṃ na yujyata iti vyāharanto naiva viśeṣān vyāharanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2345: prājñaptikasya kadācidapi hetāvayujyamānatvāt samūhamātreṇaiva tāvadutpattirvibhaktiścāpi vidhīyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2348: na ca kāyaṃ vyatiricya samūho bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2350: phalataḥ paramārthataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:2352: ata ācāryaiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yathāprasiddhi siddha ityuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2354: ityevaṃ paramārthato 'nityasvabhāvam sādhayituṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:2357: nityasvabhāvamapi tāvat paramārthataḥ sādhayituṃ nāsti pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:2360: ātmādinityavastūnyapi yathā svasiddhanteṣu vijñapyante tathā pratyakṣajñāne naivāvabhāsante /
T04ksmadhlu:2367: tasya [vijñānasya] vijñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇāt saḥ [vijñeyaḥ] api tad [vijñānaṃ] anusarati,
T04ksmadhlu:2368: anyathā tena jñeyasvabhāvānusaraṇamapi na kṛtaṃ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2376: ata ātmādīnāṃ sukhādiphalena saha kutrāpyanvayo na sidhyati avikalakāraṇatvena na tataḥ kādācitkasukhotpatiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:2381: ye tāvad rupādayaḥ prasiddhadharmiṇaste 'pi paramārthato 'siddhā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2383: anupalabdhyāpi tāvannaiva tatsattvasiddhiḥ pratiṣedhasiddhau samarthatvāt pratiṣedhamātraṃ sā sādhayatīti /
T04ksmadhlu:2388: phalataḥ vastusvabhāvaparīkṣaṇārthaṃ nāsti kimapi sādhakaṃ pramāṇamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:2389: ataḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ paramārthataḥ sattvena sa naiva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2390: tatra tāvadayaṃ payogaḥ - yasya paramārthaḥ sādhane nasti kimapi pramāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:2391: kalpanānirmitatvāttasya tathaiva samyaktāyā grahaṇaṃ naiva karttavyam,
T04ksmadhlu:2393: uparyuktayorubhayoḥ samyaksvabhāvayoḥ prasiddhayarthaṃ nāsti kimapi pramāṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:2396: nāsti hetorasiddhatvamiti yaduktaṃ tat pūrvaṃ vistareṇa vicāritam /
T04ksmadhlu:2400: tādṛśasya khalu vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasya kutrāpyanvayaṃ vihāya vyatirekamātrena siddherasambhavāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2402: yat sat tat kathamasaditi tannivṛttyā vyatirekī bhavituṃ śaknoti,
T04ksmadhlu:2405: yadi sa svīkriyate tadā kvacittadeva saditi sadavyavahārapramāṇaṃ yat yat sattānuvidhāne prasiddhaṃ tadevāsmākaṃ vastuni prasiddhamiti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2407: evaṃ sadvyavahārapramāṇavyāptamapi pramāṇamātreṇa paramārthatayā naiyatyena sadviṣayitvena naiva setsyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2409: anyathā vṛkṣeṇāpi śiṃśapādiviśeṣā niścayeṇa jñāsyanta iti,
T04ksmadhlu:2411: evaṃ tāvad vṛkṣastvaśeṣaviśeṣasādhāraṇatvānna tena devalādiviśeṣā nirṇetuṃ śakyāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2412: pramāṇaṃ hi naiva tāvad bhāvātikrānte 'parasminnapi sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2414: sarvapramāṇāni bhāvābhivyañjakāni tadvyāptapramāṇabalabhāvivyavahārapravartakānyapi pramāṇāvajñātavastumātre pravṛttatvād vṛkṣādivat kutaḥ sādhāraṇānīti
T04ksmadhlu:2416: saṃvṛtikajagadarthaviṣayīṇyapi pramāṇani bhavantītyetad bahudhā pūrvaṃ carcitam /
T04ksmadhlu:2420: vaktṛṇāmapi tattvaviṣeye kaścana vivādo na syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2424: tattvajñānārthameva taiḥ sarveṣāṃ mohāvakāśo dūrīkriyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2425: lakṣaṇakārairlakṣaṇeṣu parasparavirodho bhinnasiddhāntapraveśo vā na kariṣyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2427: ato vyavahārapramāṇaṃ yannaiva paramārthaviṣayi tadapi vyavahārapramāṇaṃ sambhavatyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:2431: dehadhāriṇo ye vastusvabhāvasya yathāvat parijñānena saṃsārakārāto mumukṣavasteṣāmavidyā viṣayebhyo vinivṛttavabhāvā,
T04ksmadhlu:2433: abhīṣṭārthakriyāsādhakarthaprāptimātreṇa puruṣā naiva muktāḥ syuḥ sarvasya muktiprasaṅgāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2434: ataḥ avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti yaduktaṃ tat pramāṇasādhāraṇalakṣaṇam /
T04ksmadhlu:2436: ataḥ kathaṃ tasmin samyag vastu aviparītatayā setsyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2438: [26-29] ye tāvat paramārthataḥ svaparobhayāhetukato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ samyaktayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2440: yāni tāvat svato vā parato vā aviparītayā sadvastūni,
T04ksmadhlu:2443: yato ye tāvat sāṃkhyādayaste hetuṃ satkāryaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2444: svata eva vastūni jāyanta iti bruvāṇā naiva yuktisaṅgatāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2445: na hi sad vā asad vā vastu svataḥ svahetau niṣpadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2449: phalataḥ ko hi nāma kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2452: tadātmanā siddho 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt kastāvat kasyotpādakaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2457: yadi sa svabhāvena siddhastadā tasmin aṇumātramapi upakāryasvabhāvasyābhāvāt kathaṃ sa utpādyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2458: aviśeṣaṇīyatve 'pi yadyutpādyatvamahetukatāyāmupakalpyate tadā sajjñānamapi tathaiva kiṃ na parikalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2460: ata eva vidvadbhiḥ “ābhyātmikāyatanāni na svata utpannāni,
T04ksmadhlu:2462: sajjñānavat” ityasmin prasaṅge prāṅgārthamaviditvā kecana [prayoge] asmin dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ,
T04ksmadhlu:2465: ityaṃ pareṣu parasparavirodhaṃ pratipādayiṣayā pareṣu siddhāni sajjñānādīni tāvadudāhriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:2474: pariniṣpannabhāvātmakatve 'pi yadi tadupakāraḥ svīkriyate tadā tadbhinnaḥ sa upakāro na svata utpadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2476: yadyabhinnastadopakārasyāpi tathaiva siddhatvāt sa kathamiva setsyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2478: api ca, yadi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'yaṃ vṛkṣadrumavat paryāyatayocyate tadā na tathā lokaprasiddhiriti /
T04ksmadhlu:2481: yadi hetvabhivyaktau vipariṇāme vā sati phalaṃ bhavatīti nirdiśyate tadā evamayaṃ pṛthagvyasthitaḥ saddhetureva /
T04ksmadhlu:2483: yato hi sa yadi abhivyaktervipariṇāmasya vāvabhāso niścayena tadbhinnastadā kevalādanyasmādutpattirevābhyupagatā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2484: yadi nāsti bhinnastadā kāryakāraṇaviplavadoṣaḥ prasaktaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2487: parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇadharmasya itarapratiṣedhakatvād anyatrāsiddhatvācca anubhayapakṣakalpanamapi naiva yuktīmat /
T04ksmadhlu:2488: api ca, yadyabhīṣṭe taddhetau abhīṣṭaṃ vastu ātmanaḥ purvasvabhāvamaparityajya abhivyaktādyavasthāṃ prāpnoti tadā avasthāvikṛtiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2491: yadi parityajyeti pakṣastadā niraṃśasvabhāvatvāt kaścidapyanvayasvabhāvo na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2494: api ca, vyaktamapyanābhāsitaṃ saditaralakṣaṇatvād itarābhyāmabhivyaktipariṇāmābhyāṃ prabhāvitatvāt parikalpitameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2499: etadaviparītatvena paricchede sati na tat paricchedayogyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2500: yasya paricchedakāle yo vicchedyo na bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2502: ye parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇāste ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva yuktarupāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2509: ataḥ yo hi vastubhedaḥ prāgavasthāvilakṣaṇaḥ parikalpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2517: iṣyamāṇe 'pi copalabdhisvabhāve prāgvat paścādapi anupalabdhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2520: dugdhādīnāṃ śatadhā vināśe 'pi yā hi dadhyādirupeṇa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2522: api ca, yaḥ kaścid dṛḍharupeṇa bhāvasvabhāvastatsya kathamanyathā vikārānubhavaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2523: yadi sa tāavadadṛḍhasvabhāvastadāpi bhaṅguratvānniranvayaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syāditi tasyāpyanyathā vikārānubhavo naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2524: ato 'bhivyakteḥ pariṇāmasya cāyujyamānatvād yā hi tābhyāṃ svata utpattiparikalpanā,
T04ksmadhlu:2526: yadi ākasmikī tavat svata utpattistathāpi yaddhi vastūnāṃ deśakālasvabhāvaniyatattvam,
T04ksmadhlu:2528: nirapekṣeṣu tāvad vastuṣu tathāvidhā naiyatyāmbhāvanā naiva yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:2529: yadi hi parasāpekṣatvaṃ tadā parata utpattiḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2530: na hi upakārābhāve apekṣā nomopapadyate sāpi paścānniṣetsyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2531: apekṣāyā api tāvat sadā saṃnihitasvabhāvatvāt sarvadaivotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2532: ityevaṃ vyavahāre 'pi tāvat svata utpādo 'sambhava eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2535: tadā sa [parākhyaḥ pratyayaḥ] nityo vā bhaved, anityo va /
T04ksmadhlu:2540: phalataḥ kathaṃ nāma tasmāt kramaśo 'rthakriyā sampasyate?
T04ksmadhlu:2548: asattve 'pi tatpratibaddhātmabhāvasya prāpyamāṇatvād buddhiparikalpitā apekṣā tāvad vyavasthāpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2549: kintu tadabhinirhārāya yo hi apratisāmarthyavān hetuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2552: ato nityatvena yadabhīṣṭaṃ vastu sadaivopakaroti tadapratihatasamarthyaṃ hetuṃ parityajya kathamanyān apekṣiṣyate?
T04ksmadhlu:2556: yena tebhya utpattimasvīkurvadbhirbalena “naivotpādyante” ityevam ātmabalopadarśanaṃ kariṣyate, nānyatra /
T04ksmadhlu:2558: evameva kāryāṇi yadi hetudharmān nānusaranti tadā tadabhinnatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādeveti /
T04ksmadhlu:2560: akramādapi hetoḥ kramiṇaḥ kāryasyotpādo na virudhyatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2562: yataḥ 'kāryāṇi sarvān hetudharmān nānuvidadhate' ityevaṃ tatkathanaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2565: kimapi kāryaṃ nityasya vastano vyatirekaṃ naivānuvidhatte,
T04ksmadhlu:2569: avikale 'pi kadācit kāryotpādābhāvāt yad yatra anvayavyatirekau nānuvidhatte,
T04ksmadhlu:2572: sataḥ kāryasya tāvat [kvacidapi] apekṣā naiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2575: itthaṃ nitye tāvat kramaśo 'rthakriyā na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2577: yato hi tasya tathāvidhārthakriyāyā vinaṣṭasvabhāvamanusṛtya kāryotpattirvā tadviyogo vā na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2578: yadi tatsāmarthyasvabhāvaṃ paścatkāle 'pi anusarati tadāpi tena sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yāni pūrvotpannani tāni naiva punarutpādayituṃ śakyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2580: yadanyat tatsadṛśaṃ tatkathaṃ notpadyata iti virodhaparīkṣāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2584: tata utpādyasya kāryasya anutpattāvapi tadutpattisāmarthyasvabhāvānusaraṇaṃ pratihataṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2585: yo yadā yadutpādayati tadā tasmin apratihatasāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti kathanaṃ naiva yuktimattaram /
T04ksmadhlu:2586: tasmādayaṃ pūrvamapi paścātkāla iva anutpādaka eva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2588: tataśca paścātkāle 'pi pūrvavad utpādaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2589: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā viruddhadharmayogād asmaikatvahāniḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2594: ato parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo virodhāntaro na sidhyatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2599: ataḥ kalpakalpāntareṣu aviśeṣatayā sthitatvāt pūrvavat paścādapi tasya vināśo naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2601: yathā te atītādapi vipākahetoḥ kāryotpattiṃ varṇayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2604: evaṃvidha upacāro vā vartamānakriyākramo vā atītāddhetorbhavatīti vādo naiva sarvathā yuktaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2606: yadi tata utpattiraṅgīkriyate tadā ahetuta eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2609: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā vartamāna iva anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvāt kathaṃ hi sa atīta iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2614: evaṃ sati vinaṣṭāyāḥ kriyātaḥ kāryotpattirnaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2616: kathaṃ hi kāryotpattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ kriyāvināśa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2617: ekasvabhāvātmake vastuni kriyāvanti akriyāvanti ca kāryāṇi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2623: anyathā pūrvavat paścādapi sā tathā bhavituṃ na śaktā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2624: api ca, kriyā nāma sā kiṃ samarthasvabhāvā yaduta karmasvabhāvā?
T04ksmadhlu:2625: yadi tat svabhāvadvayaṃ vastunaḥ sakāśād bhinnaṃ tadā kathaṃ nāma tad [vastu] vinaṣṭamityabhidhātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2626: yadi tadupahatasvabhāvaṃ tadā samastavastuno nityasattāvādasya hāniḥ prasajyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2627: arthāntaravināśe satyapi vastuno hyacalasvabhāvasya vināśo naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2628: yathā mṛte 'pi devadatte yajñadattasya anupahatasvabhāvātmakatvānmṛta sa iti vaktuṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2633: tasyāmapi tulya eva virodhaḥ parīkṣā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:2635: anyārthatve sati kriyāyāḥ vastu tāvad ahetukameva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2640: kriyā yadā vastuna utpattirabhyupagamyate tadā kriyā yadā svabhāvata evotpādayati
T04ksmadhlu:2643: arthāntarasya pakṣatve anyārthakalpanāyām anavasthādoṣānnaiva [kadāpi] hetutvaṃ sidhyet /
T04ksmadhlu:2644: vastūpakārābhāvād 'asyeyaṃ kriyā' - iti sambandha eva na siddhaḥ syād,
T04ksmadhlu:2646: upakārakatvameva yadi vastutvenāṅgīkriyate tadā kriyātmakatvād vastunaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2647: kriyāmupakarotīti cettadā kāryamapi kathaṃ na tathaivopakaroti?
T04ksmadhlu:2649: yadi kriyā hi sanmātravastusāpekṣaiva tadā avikalahetutvāt sadā talsamīpavartinī eva,
T04ksmadhlu:2651: yadi sā arthantarabhūtā tadā sambandhastāvadasiddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2652: kriyāṇāmeva parasparayogād vastu tāavad gauṇameva sthāsyapi /
T04ksmadhlu:2654: karmasvabhāvatvaṃ naiva yujyate ye tāvadakṣaṇikāste sadā ekasvabhāvatvenāvasthitvānnaiva
T04ksmadhlu:2656: ataḥ keṣvapi 'karma kriyate' iti na sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2663: vastunaḥ svasvabhāva iva kriyāyā api avināśaprasaṅge sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2664: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti sati kriyāyā naiva [kadāpi] vināśaḥ sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:2665: saiva kriyā punaryadi anyatve 'nabhidheyeti kalpyate tadā prajñaptisattvāt sā avastveva /
T04ksmadhlu:2673: yadi aprāptakriyastāvadanāgata ityucyate tadā tadānīṃ tasmādapi kāryotpattiḥ ātyantikatayā naiva yuktimatī,
T04ksmadhlu:2675: yadi vastu sarvadā vidyamānaṃ tadā tasyāḥ prāpteravikalakāraṇānāṃ sadbhāve 'pi kimiva kriyā naiva prāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2676: nāpi kriyā vastunaḥ sakāśādarthāntarabhūteti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2677: yadi nāsti arthāntarabhūtā tadā kriyāvat svabhāvo 'pi naiva aprāptaḥ syādabhinnatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2679: vastunaḥ svabhāva iva tadabhinnā kriyāpi sarvadā sadeva,
T04ksmadhlu:2683: yadi tataḥ [vartamanāt] kāryaṃ samutpadyate tadā samakālaṃ vā samutpadyatām,
T04ksmadhlu:2686: kāryotpattitaḥ pūrvaṃ śaśaśṛṅganibhād asatkāraṇād utpādo naiva yuktaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2687: yasmin kāle ca hetorātmabhāvaḥ [kāryotpadane] samarthastasmin kāle kāryasyāpi samakālaṃ sattvāt siddhameva tat [kāryam] iti /
T04ksmadhlu:2688: atastasmin [karye] sa hetuḥ kamapi vyāpāraṃ naiva karoti /
T04ksmadhlu:2691: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva bhaṅgaḥ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2692: viṣama [bhinna] kālamiti pakṣo 'pi naiva sambhavati evameva yadi kāryaṃ [utpādāt] pūrvameva sat syāt tadānāgatotpādaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2694: yadi [kāryaṃ] kṣaṇāntaravyavadhānenotpadyate tadā tadatītādevotpadyata iti naiva yuktamityuktapūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2701: atra bhagavatāpi - “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati” iti kāryakaraṇabhāvasya nirdeśāt kalpanātrayaṃ vivarjya caturthī svīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2702: tāḥ kalpanāḥ punaḥ - kāraṇat pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vā,
T04ksmadhlu:2705: avyavahitatve sati dvitīyakṣaṇe 'vasthānaṃ vā - ityevaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2706: tatra yattavat pūrvameva sthitaṃ bhavati na tad hetau sati jāyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2716: ityaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe vidyamānaṃ kāryameva hetoḥ samutpadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2718: tato 'vyavahite dvitīye kṣaṇe kāryasattāyā anubhavārtham - “asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī” tyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:2722: prathame kṣaṇe kāraṇasya avinaṣṭātvāt tadavyavadhānenaiva ca kāryasyotpādāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2726: vidyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kālāntarāvyavahitaṃ ca kāryaṃ yadyabhyupagamyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2729: niraṃśe tāvad vastuni kālāntareṇāvyavahite ca sati samakālikatvaṃ muktvā nānyā gatiḥ sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2731: yadi nāsti madhye kālāntarāstitvaṃ tadā avaśyaṃ pūrvāparatoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃsparśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2732: tathā ca sati sarveṣāṃ [kṣaṇānāṃ] ekasminneva kṣaṇe samanupraveśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2733: [phalataḥ] yathā paramāṇoḥ sarvātmanā saṃyoge piṇḍasya aṇumātratāprasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2735: yathā khalu deśakramaḥ pramāṇairavabhāsamānatvāt saṃvṛtau svīkriyata tathā kālakramo 'pio tatsadṛśa eva,
T04ksmadhlu:2737: tatra prayogaḥ - ye sarvātmanā kālāntareṇāvyavahitāsteṣu pūrvāparakālabhedo na sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2745: abhāvena ca saha sarvātmanā vā ekadeśena vā avyavahitatvamiti cintā na pravartata iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2747: tayormadhye kasyā api kālāntarasadbhāvasambhāvanāyā abhāvānnaiva tadā hetvabhāvayogaḥ sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:2753: yadi tad vartamānaṃ tadā [tasya] asattven saha virodha āpadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2754: yadi tat sadityabhyupeyate tadā avyavahitatvadicintā kathaṃ na pravṛtā syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2756: kintu kāryasattākāle tadasaditi hetoḥ avyavahitatvādicintā naiva kāryeti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:2759: itthaṃ tu bhavantaḥ kāraṇasya nirantaratve satkāryasyotpattiṃ varṇayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2762: nirantaratvam avyavahitvaṃ saṃspṛṣṭatvamityādīnāmabhinnārthakatvāt tadabhyupagamasāmarthyena kāryakāraṇaikatvamapyabhyupagataṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2764: api ca, vinaṣṭahetoḥ kāryotpattiprasaṅgasya ayujyamānatvād bhavantastaṃ [pakṣaṃ] parityajya vartamānahetoravyavadhānena kāryotpattimabhyupagacchanti
T04ksmadhlu:2765: tatra tāvat kiṃ sarvātmanā kāryotpattiṃ svīkurvanti yaduta ekadeśeneti cintā pravṛttaiva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2768: tatra ca ye nāpyekadeśena na ca sarvātmaneti bruvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2769: tena taiḥ kimucyata iti vicāryamāṇe avyavahitamapi nāpyavyavahitamiti kathanaṃ paryavasyet /
T04ksmadhlu:2771: api ca, yadi vidyamānakāryakāle kāraṇaṃ nāstyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:2772: tadā 'avinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt kāryamutpadyata' iti naiva kathanīyam,
T04ksmadhlu:2774: yasmin kāle kāraṇam avinaṣṭaṃ tasmin kāle kāryamapi nāsti,
T04ksmadhlu:2776: evaṃ cintyate - svayaṃ vināśavyavahite 'pi vastuni nāsti samakālikatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:2778: tathaivātrāpi kāryakāranayorasamīcīnarūpatve 'pi samakālikatvaṃ nāstītyayaṃ vicāraprakāro na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2780: evaṃ tatra sadasadbhāve yadyekadeśenāvyavahitatvaṃ tadā avayavisadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2782: tathaiva chāyātapayorudakadharāyāṃ cāpi yadi sarvātmanāvyavahitatvaṃ tadaikadeśatvameva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2784: asmākaṃ tu [mate] sarva evāyaṃ sadasadbhāvaḥ paramārthato 'siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2786: avyavahitatvādisamudbhūto 'sadbhāva iti nāsti kaścana vyavahārastathāpi dvipīye kṣaṇe vastūni svasvabhāvanirodhamātraṃ prajñapayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2791: kāryakāraṇayostu paramārthataḥ sattvabhyupagamād ekadeśenāvyavahitatvādicintā tāvat pravartata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2792: āryaśālistambasūtre yo hi bhagavatā tulādaṇḍopamayā avyavahitatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'bhihitaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2808: yadapi bhagavatā 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati' ityuktaṃ tena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:2809: eva vikalpo 'bhyupagamyata iti yaduktaṃ tad vakṣyate kiṃ 'asmin satīdaṃ bhavati'
T04ksmadhlu:2810: iti vacanena vikalpatrayaṃ niṣidhya caturthavikalpābhyupagam āgamena nirdiṣṭo yaduta yuktyā?
T04ksmadhlu:2813: yato hi yau chāyāṅkurau dīpaprakāśau vā samakālavidyamānau tāvapi dīpe sati prakāśo bhavatīti na vyavahāraviruddhau /
T04ksmadhlu:2816: yadi hi vastutvaṃ pramāṇāntaraiḥ paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikatvena sādhyate tadā tadapi parikalpitamātrameva,
T04ksmadhlu:2818: itthaṃ tu loke 'pi samakālikaṃ chāyāṅkurādikamapi kāryakāraṇabhāvena jñāyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2824: yato hi yathā yuktyā vikalpatrayaṃ na sambhavati tathā caturtho 'pi vikalpaḥ paramārthato naiva sambhavatīti [pūrvaṃ] vistarena nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2828: na tvāgamena vikalpatrayaṃ parihatya caturthavikalpāśrayaṇaṃ kalpanīyam /
T04ksmadhlu:2830: phalataśca sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ māyeva prajñāptyā utpādādibhya eva santuṣyatām ,
T04ksmadhlu:2836: ato ye ācāryāḥ “na paramārthata adhyātmikānyāyatanāni praratyayataḥ samutpadyante,
T04ksmadhlu:2844: vyavahāre parataḥ siddhatvānnastyasiddhatvaṃ pramāṇasyāpi [bhavanmate paramārthataḥ] samyagvastutvāddhetvādīnāṃ na vyavahāraḥ kutrāpi sidhyatīti nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2846: tairthikāḥ ye hi parādivyavahāravaśāt parādīni santīti kathayanti tān ācārya āha -
T04ksmadhlu:2850: parādayaḥ śabdā ye tāvatprajñāptigocarāstānapi paramparayā vastusaṃsargiṇa ityabhidadhatāṃ teṣāṃ 'vastusabhāvaḥ pratyayeṣvastītyutpadyate' ityumamabhiprāyamādāya dūṣaṇaṃ pradattam,
T04ksmadhlu:2851: pratyayādiṣu sattve paramārthato vastusvabhāvasyānutpādāditi vistareṇa khalvabhihitam /
T04ksmadhlu:2852: ato yadā sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthataḥ parata utpādo naivopapadyate tadā pratyayādibhyo 'pi anutpādādasiddha eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2853: ato nāstyeva paramārthataḥ śabdasaṃsargi kimapi vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:2854: phalato 'siddhe 'pyevaṃvidhe vyavahāre vastu tāvadabādhitameveti yaduktaṃ tanna yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2855: [30] ye sāṃkhyādayaḥ pradhāneśvarādikaṃ manvānāḥ pradhāneśvarādibhyo vastūnāmutpādamabhyupagacchanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2856: teṣāmapi mataṃ svato vā parato vā utpādapakṣe pṛthakpṛtham doṣābhidhānānnaiva yuktarūpamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:2857: anye ye kadācit svātantryena ubhayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti ,
T04ksmadhlu:2859: apare ca ye tāvat - 'ubhayātmakasya vastunaḥ pramāṇaviruddhatvānna ko 'pi tadabhyupagacchatīti hetoḥ ubhayata utpattiṃ dūṣayitvā bhavantaḥ kevalamātmānameva
T04ksmadhlu:2861: te tāvad vidvāṃsaḥ svayaṃ śāstrāṇāmaparijñānāt śabdārthayośca samyaganavagamāt [kevalaṃ] śabdaśa upahasanti /
T04ksmadhlu:2862: kecana tāvat kaṇṭakāditīkṣṇatādṛṣṭāntena sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'hetuta utpadyanta iti kathayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:2863: tatra vastūnāṃ paramārthato 'hetuta utpattiṃ sādhayatāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntastāvannaiva siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2868: anenaiva teṣāṃ taikṣṇyādīnāmapi niścitatvānna ko 'pi [dharmaḥ] ahetuta utpadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2869: evaṃ kādācitkatvāt sarveṣāmeteṣāṃ vastūnāṃ sāpekṣatvaṃ niścitameva anapekṣitasya tu sadā aviśeṣāttasya kādācitkatvaṃ nopapadyata eveti /
T04ksmadhlu:2874: ahetukatve sati sarvatra abhinnatvāt kaṇkādiṣvapi tīkṣṇatāyā nirdhāraṇaṃ na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2876: ye bījādayaste loke kāryakāraṇātmakatvena pratyakṣataḥ siddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2878: api ca, hetutaḥ sādyasya sādhanāvasare anyataḥ [hetataḥ] utpatteḥ [siddheḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2883: ato 'hetuvādī khalu vyavahāre pratyakṣādibhirbādhitatvād vidvadbhiḥ sāvadhānatayā pariharttavya eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2885: te yathā avicāraramaṇīyatvena prasiddhāstathā teṣāmaniṣedhād anutpattirityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2891: atasteṣu vyāpterutpatteḥ samyaṅ nivṛttyā tasyāpi [sasvabhāvatvasya] nivṛttiḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2895: sā khalu [utpattiḥ] tadvijñāne tathaivāvabhāsata ityapi kathanamyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:2897: tatrāpi paramārthatastathākāro naiva sambhavīti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2899: tadutpattyā sasvabhāvatvādīnāṃ vyaptatve 'pi utpattau satyāṃ samyaksvabhāvo naiva niyatarūpeṇa sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:2900: vyāpakasāmīpye sarvavyāpyāṇāṃ sāmīpyaṃ navaśyaṃbhāvīti niścitamityuktameva pūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:2902: paramarthato na kasminnapyutpattiḥ pravartata iti sādhitameva /
T04ksmadhlu:2903: yanna kaiścidapi pratyayaiḥ samutpadyate tad vastu kutaḥ prādurbhavatīti kathayadbhirabhivyaktimātrameva
T04ksmadhlu:2904: ato 'naikāntika eva heturiti cet tatasyāpi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtatvāt tyājyamevaitaditi /
T04ksmadhlu:2905: atha pratyayairvastu abhivyajyata eveti cettadā ki sā abhivyaktiḥ svalakṣaṇopacayasvabhāvā
T04ksmadhlu:2906: vā tadāvaraṇasaṃkṣayātmiokā vā indriyaiḥ sukṛtā vā tadviṣayakavijñānotpattilakṣaṇā
T04ksmadhlu:2908: tatra naiva tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kathamapi yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2910: yadā anupacayasvabhāvaḥ svato vinaśya abhivyañcakapratyayairutpadyate tadā ekasyāparasyānupacayasvabhāvasyotpādavaśāt svalakṣaṇopacayo bhavatīti
T04ksmadhlu:2911: na, tatpūrvasvabhāvo yadi na nirudhyeta tadā dvau parasparāvirudhau upacayāpacayasvabhāvau niryuktitayā ekasminneva svīkāryau syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:2912: yadyapūrvaḥ kaścana svabhāvo notpadyate tadā abhivyañcakāḥ pratyayāstāvannirarthakaḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2918: tadā sarve te pratyayā ye yadā arthamabhivyañcinti tadā ananyārthabhūtā kriyā tatra naiva sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:2920: nityasya bhāvasya tvāvaraṇaṃ tadviśeṣāṇāmavināśād anutpādācca kadāpi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2925: yadi nāsti sa samartho vā svavijñānavijñeyo vā tadā svahetuvikalatayā tadvijñānotpattireva na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2927: yathā āvaraṇasaṃkṣaye tathā vijñānotpattāvapi avighnāpādanasvabhāvo 'pi kriyāyāṃ naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2928: asāmarthyāt tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvābhāvācca abhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayairāvaraṇaṃ kriyata ityasyāpi nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtameva [pūrvam] /
T04ksmadhlu:2930: yadi sāmarthayamabhyupagamyate tadā āvaraṇakārake satyapi avikalahetoḥ sadbhāvāt sadaiva vijñānotpattisambhavād vyañjakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ kriyā nirarthikaiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2931: ato nityasya tāvadakiñcikaratvāt kathamapyāvaraṇaṃ na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2932: anityatā tu kadāpi kenāpi hetuviśeṣeṇa vijñānānutpādakasyānyasya kṣaṇasyotpādād āvriyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:2936: yadi tadanyārthabhūtaṃ tadā sukṛtatvaṃ naiva yuktiyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:2939: kasminnapi vastuni kenāpi kimapi karaṇaṃ tāvannaiva sambhavamiti [pūrvaṃ] nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2940: indriyaiḥ sukṛtatve 'pi yadi abhivyañcakairbhāvaiḥ tadindriyavijñānotpādāsāmarthyam athavā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvāsattvaṃ tadā tadvijñānotpattirasambhavinī,
T04ksmadhlu:2942: yadi vidyata eva sāmarthyaṃ tadvijñeyasvabhāvo vā tadā indriyaiḥ sukṛtakatvataḥ pūrvameva tasmin [viṣaye] vijñānotpādasya prasañgaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:2944: atastamin viṣaye vijñānotpādalakṣaṇamapi na saṅgataṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2945: yato hyevaṃ tad vyaṅgyaṃ vastvapi yadi asamarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyavabhāvaṃ vāpi nāsti tadā vijñānotpāde 'pi na pad [vastu] tasya [vijñānasya] viṣayaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:2946: yadi [tad vastu] samarthaṃ vā tadvijñānavijñeyasvabhāvaṃ vā syāt tadā svasvabhāvavat
T04ksmadhlu:2947: sāmīpyāt tatsattāmatreṇaiva vijñānasya samutpādo bhaviṣyatītyato na tena vyañjakavijñānotpādaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:2949: api ca, bhavatāṃ tāvanmate sarvesāṃ vastūnāṃ jāyataḥ sadaivāvatiṣṭhanta iti hetostatra [vastuṣu] vyaṅgyavyañjakādīnāmapi sadā avasthitatvāt
T04ksmadhlu:2955: nityasya ca sarvasāmarthyavirahiotatvānnaiva hi vastutvaṃ kathamapyupapadyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2961: te 'pi kramayogapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt sarvasāmarthyaśūnyā eveti pūrvamapi [bahudhā] nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:2967: ityevaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo ye sarvasāmarthyaśūnyāsteṣāṃ vandhyāputrādyabhinnatve 'pi ye khalu tān vastutvena parikalpayanti ,
T04ksmadhlu:2970: pratisaṃkhyānirodhādayo yadi kasyāpi jñānasya viṣayāstadā avaśyaṃ te hetutvenaṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:2975: anupakāritve 'pi yadi vijñānena vijñeyasvabhāvasya abhāvād viṣayatvaṃ kalpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2976: tathā sati yadi vijñānaṃ vijñeyasvabhāvamanusaratīti tadā tadvijñānasyāpi tadanusaraṇena nityatāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2978: yadi sarvajñajñānaṃ taditi na kasyāpi vastunaḥ sāmīpyamiti kalpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2981: yena kāraṇena tato vibhaktaṃ śaśaśṛṅgādiṃ ye jñeyatvenopacaranti,
T04ksmadhlu:2986: vandhyāputrādisadṛśe tadabhitnne 'pi yadi vastviti nāma prajñapyate,
T04ksmadhlu:2988: kintuṃ kathaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'hetukā iti nocyata ityucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2997: yadi tāni kramaśa ekasiddhinisedhāmyām aparaniṣedhasiddhibhāñji na syustadā asadeva syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:2998: phalata ekasya niṣedha evāparasya siddhiriti hetoḥ kathaṃ tāvadanabhidheyaṃ vastvityabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:2999: anyathā [yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā] anabhidheyatvāt sarvāṇyeva vastunyanabhidheyāni syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3000: phalataḥ svaparoditānām aśeṣavastuviśeṣāṇāṃ vilopasambhavād mahātmabhirvajrakaṇādiyukticatuṣṭayasyābhidhād ebhyo mārgebhyo
T04ksmadhlu:3002: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3003: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
T04ksmadhlu:3005: ityevaṃ sarve dharmā nirātmāna iti sādhyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3006: ata eva bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāsūtre vastuṣu nityānityagrāhasya tāvanniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3011: yadā tad rūpaṃ sadeva nāsti tadā tannityābhidhānasya tu kathaiva kā? ityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3013: ata evātrāpi parataḥ kāryotpāde tāvat ko virodhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3017: satkāryotpādaniṣedhāryamapi bhavatāṃ savidhe nāsti ubhayasiddho heturdṛṣṭāntaścetyādi yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:3019: tathā hi - kiṃ tat yat sadityucyate?
T04ksmadhlu:3020: aṃśaistāvanniraṃśasya siddhirasambhavinīti yasya svabhāvaḥ sarvātmanā niṣpannaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3021: yaśca niṣpannasvabhāva iti tasya paraiḥ[hetupratyayaiḥ] apūrva ityākhyaṃ bhedaṃ kartuṃ naiva śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3027: vicchinnamātre sādhye tathaiva ca hetornideśe na te abhūtadharmito viruddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3039: sa hetusannidhānāt pūrvamapi tathaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ 'hetubhirutpannaḥ' iti kathayituṃ śakyate?
T04ksmadhlu:3045: tadā paścādapi kathaṃ sa satsvabhāvaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3047: yaśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sa tadviruddhadharmiṇi kathaṃ nāma yuktaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3048: yathā amūrtadhārmāntarbhūtaṃ tāvadākāśaṃ kathaṃ nāma mūrtaṃ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3049: utpattyākhyo hi prasiddhaḥ satsvabhāvastāvad asatsvabhāvaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ hi nāma paramārthato 'bhāvena samprayuktaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3052: pṛthaksāmarthyavataḥ kasyāpi bhāvātmakasya hetoranantaraṃ prādurbhāvasya sampratibhāsābhāvāt
T04ksmadhlu:3053: taddhetorasadutpadyata iti loke utpattiviśeṣaviṣayikāyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ abhidhānasya
T04ksmadhlu:3055: vyavahāramātreṇa tu vastusattve bādhāleśo 'pi naiva sambhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3062: ataḥ 'asadutpadyate' iti yadktaṃ tadabhāvato bhāvasiddhiriti naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3065: yadyetad vastu hetoḥ sāmīpyāt pūrvamudbhūtaṃ nāsti,
T04ksmadhlu:3067: yadi tadā kiñcidapi nāsti tadā tat kadācid vastutvenābhidhāsyata iticintā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3068: yadi nāsti vastunaḥ kimapi bhāvātmakamastitvaṃ tadā tasya svabhāvo 'sadeveti suspaṣtamabhidhāsyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3073: pūrvaṃ nāsīdityasadutpattervyavahārasyāpi hetupratyayābhāsāḥ kathaṃ samyagityabhidhātuṃ śakyāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:3075: yato hi yadi nāstyanyastadā abhūtādanyo bhūto nāsti satsamīpavarttyapi /
T04ksmadhlu:3080: ekasmin krameṇa sattvāsattve aviruddheityabhidhānamapi naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3082: yadi samakāle te aviruddhe tadā krameṇāpi kathaṃ te na tathā,
T04ksmadhlu:3084: bhinnadharmiṇi viruddhalakṣaṇasyāviruddhatve 'pi ekasmin dharmiṇi naiva krameṇāpi tad bhavituṃ śakroti /
T04ksmadhlu:3087: anyathā parairapi pradhānādīnāṃ kramaśo mahadādigaṇe parivartanam abhivyaktim vā upakalpayatāṃ vyaktāvyaktādidharmavirodhaḥ kathamabhidhīyate
T04ksmadhlu:3088: krameṇa vastūnāmutpādakeṣu īśvarādiṣu kathaṃ nāma samarthāsamarthādivirodhodbhāvanaṃ yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3089: ye kecana parvatakāyavajrādīn dṛḍhasvabhāvān teṣāṃ śītoṣmādyavasthābhedena kramaśo bhedaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3090: te 'pi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sisādhayiṣavaḥ kathaṃ krameṇa prādurbhavatsu teṣu śītoṣmādiviruddhatvamabhidhātuṃ śaknuvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3092: bhūtvā cābhāvatvenāvabhāsanta iti vicāraṇād ekasmin kramaśaḥ sadasattvaviruddhatvena vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti kathayantīti cennedaṃ yujyate
T04ksmadhlu:3093: yato hi tāmrādiṣvevaṃ dāḍharyamārdavaśaityauṣṇyādīni krameṇa dṛśyanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3098: yato hi māyāsvapnādisamā alīkā api [padārthāḥ] abhūtvā bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3100: kintu svabhāvataḥ sadasatostu krameṇāpi tayoḥ sadasatorvirodha eva / tadyathā -
T04ksmadhlu:3106: āryakaṅkāvatārasūtre 'pi pūrvaṃ rāgādīn sattvenābhyupagamya punarasattvenāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vaināśikataiva /
T04ksmadhlu:3107: kāryakāraṇabhāvo yadi paramārthata syāttadā evamabhidadhānānāṃ [sā] dṛṣṭistāvat samyag mārgānusaraṇād muktimārgānukūlaiva strānnatvananukūlā
T04ksmadhlu:3108: ato laṅkāvatārasūtre yaduktaṃ tadapyaviruddhamevaṃ, tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:3112: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3113: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3116: pratiniyatasāmarthyato viruddhamapi svabhāvaṃ kartuṃ naiva pāryate,
T04ksmadhlu:3117: tathā sati śaśaśṛṃṅgādīnāmapyutpādaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi vidvāṃso bruvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3118: ato hetūnāṃ niyatasāmarthyena vyavasthāpi niyatā bhavedityabhidhānamapi tāvadasambaddhameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3119: saṃvṛtāvapi khalvasata utpattiḥ kathaṃ na vitudhyata iti vicāraṇāpi tāvannaiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3122: api ca, yā khalu vastūnāmutpattiḥ saṃvṛtimāyāvadavasthitā,
T04ksmadhlu:3128: ata eva sarvāṇi khalu vastūni māyāvadeva vyavasthitāni /
T04ksmadhlu:3130: sato 'sataścānutpannatvāt sarve dharmā anutpannā evetyanekadhā sadasatorniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā anutpāda eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3131: bhagavata 'pi parikalpisvabhāvamabhipretya sadasatorutpattivirodho vyavasthāpitaḥ na tu tattvata ityevaṃ yeṣāṃ kathanaṃ tadapyagre 'bhidhāsyate
T04ksmadhlu:3132: yo hi vastvātmā paramārthato 'nupanna so 'pi tattvata utpanna ityevaṃbhūto yo parikalpitaḥ svabhāvastamapi ye parikalpitasvabhāvatvenābhyupagacchanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3135: sa parikalpitasvabhāva iti cintyate tadā parikalpitātmakayoḥ sadastoryathā utpattivirodhastathaiva
T04ksmadhlu:3137: tattvatastu utpatteḥ sadasadākārātirikttvena anyākāratayānutpannatvāt sādhāraṇameva taditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3138: ato yaḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ sa paramārthataḥ śūnyaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3140: nāstyayaṃ heturanaikāntiko 'pi yadi viparyayastadā yathoktadoṣadūṣitāni pramāṇānyapi sambhaveyuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3141: yo hi hetupratyayānapekṣya samutpadyate tasya kṛtaka eva svabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3144: ya eva kṛtakastasya naiva prakṛtyā svabhāvo yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3149: bhūtvā ca vigaccati tau [svabhāvau] parasparaviruddhatvādasambaddhāviti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3153: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
T04ksmadhlu:3154: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //“
T04ksmadhlu:3155: nityānityasvabhāvayorupakalpitatvād vastūnām antadvayadarśane prasaṅgamāpādayitum uttam āryaśrīmālāsūtre -
T04ksmadhlu:3158: 'anityāḥ saṃkārā iti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syāducchedadṛṣṭiḥ sāsya syānna samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3159: nityaṃ nirvāṇamiti ced bhagavan paśyet sāsya syācchaśvatadṛṣṭiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3173: na hi jñānajñeyābhyāṃ bhinno vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3175: yujyata eveti ye kathayantītyanenāpi [kathanena] naiva [hetoḥ] viruddhatvaṃ sādhayituṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3178: māyādiṣu hi mithyātvena [tatra] naiva pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:3183: yato 'smābhirapi paramārthata utpattimabhyupagamya naiva hetornideśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3185: na hi siddhāntāpekṣayā dharmihetvādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyata iti tu pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3186: yadi māyādayo vyavahāreṇāpyanutpannā ityabhyupagamyate tadedaṃ lokasyāpi nirvartakatvād asmābhirasyāṃ nivṛttau prayatno naivāstheyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3187: ko 'pi svasthamanāḥ puruṣo yadi 'yathā māyādīnāṃ pratyayā mantrauṣadhyādayaśca dṛśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3189: tattu teṣāṃ [kathanaṃ] viduṣāṃ kṛte 'tyantaṃ hāsyāspadamapamānakaraṃ ceti /
T04ksmadhlu:3192: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
T04ksmadhlu:3193: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3195: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattannasti svabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3196: niḥsvabhāvā hi te bhāvāḥ kadācit sambhavanti na //
T04ksmadhlu:3198: pratītya yad yad bhavati tattacchāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3203: [31] yadi vināśādayo hi vikalpāḥ paramārthata utpāttau bādhitā ityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3209: yadi yuktyā te prasidhyanti tadā paramārthata eva bhaveyuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3213: na hi pramāṇabādhitā mithyāsvabhāvā api māyādayo loke 'prasiddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3214: ato vastusthitaṃ bhrāntaṃ vijñānamapi māyādivalloke prasiddhamityucyamānamapi na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3215: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva māyādisvamiyucyamānamapi na yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3216: na hyekasmin vividhaprakārake viruddhajñāne tathaiva bhāyādisvabhāvaḥ sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:3218: māyādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvatve 'pi jñānasya tadabhinnatayā gṛhītāmithyākāratvenāvabhāsitatvāt tadapi tadvanmithyaiva /
T04ksmadhlu:3219: anyathā satyāsatyasvabhāvayostāvat ko hi sambandhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3223: yadi nāstyātmanā virodhastadā kathaṃ sa pramāṇena sādhayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3225: sa ca pramāṇaiḥ sidhyatyapītyucyate tadā sādhananirbharaḥ saḥ kathamasvīkāryaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3228: api ca, antarjñeyavādināṃ matānusāraṃ yadadvayajñāne ākāradvayaṃ sāgaraparvatabhūmijalādikaṃ tadaṃśatayopacaryate,
T04ksmadhlu:3232: na ca prativādibhiḥ saha vivādā api jāyeran /
T04ksmadhlu:3234: na ca satyātmakasya jñānasya pratibhāsamārnairmithyākāraiḥ saha kaścanāpi sambandhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3236: na hi bhavatāṃ mate virodho dṛśyata ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣatastattvadarśitvasambhavād muktyatthināṃ kṛte tattvabhāvānāyāḥ pratyatno nirarthaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3237: yadyevaṃ cintyate yad 'bhrānte vijñāne vividhāvabhāsānāṃ viruddhatve 'pi virodho naiva vyavasthāpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3241: yadyevaṃ na syāt tadā tadanumānaṃ vastubalapravṛttameva na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3243: tatra tāvattattvānyatvādivirodho 'pi nābhidhīyate ' - yadyevaṃ vicāryate tadā sāṃvṛtakāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathaṃ virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3244: mithyābhūte tasmin vastubalapravṛttānumānaviṣayatvāsambhavāt sa viruddha iti nābhidheya eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3247: yato hi bhavatāṃ tathāvidhena virodhena mithyātvasiddhireva syānnatvavabhāsanirākṛtiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3249: yadi sa mithyātvena prasādhyate tadāsmākameva pakṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ syād,
T04ksmadhlu:3250: yato vayamapi kāryakāraṇadeśakālahetupratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ satyāmapyapekṣāyāṃ [taṃ] pramāṇabādhitaṃ ca mithyā caiva manyāmahe,
T04ksmadhlu:3252: tathāvidhavirodhakaraṇena bhavadbhiranyeṣāṃ vastugrahanivṛttiḥ kathaṃ nāma na svīkriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3253: kintu nirdoṣābhidhānāttāvad bhavatāmeva bādhā syāt asmākaṃ tu pramāṇānāmapravṛttirapi nāsti,
T04ksmadhlu:3254: anyathā kathaṃ nāma saṃvṛtau sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3255: yathaiva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sidhyati tathaiva samyaktvena abhyupagatavatāṃ mithyāropanivṛttaye kevalaṃ vayaṃ pramāṇāni prayuñjamahe, nānyatra
T04ksmadhlu:3256: pramāṇānāṃ prayoge satyapi naiva pratyakṣabādhā pravartate /
T04ksmadhlu:3268: yadhevaṃ na syāttadā spaṣṭāvabhāsitayā bāhyārthasya pratyakṣasiddhe 'pi na sa pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3269: phalata ekānekasvabhāvavirahitatve 'pi na sa niḥsvabhāvaḥ sidhyatītiḥ sidhyatīti syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3270: taimirikādiṣu keśamaśakādīnāmavabhāse 'pi pratyakṣato virodhānna kenāpi teṣāṃ mithyātvam asvīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3271: ataḥ svānurūpakāryakāranabhāvena anādikālikaparamparāagatānāṃ sarveṣāṃ janmanāṃ deśākālahetuviśeṣāpekṣitatve 'pi māyotpādavat saṃvṛtāveva vyavasthā kriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3273: teṣāṃ yadā samakālikāsamakālikavyavasthāyāṃ nāsti virodhastadā akṣaṇikatvādidoṣā api teṣu naiva prarvatante,
T04ksmadhlu:3275: māyāsvapnādisadṛśeṣu dharmeṣu paramārthatastāvat kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatvādayo naiva hi yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3277: ye rūpasya nityatve 'nityatve vā ācaranti te nācaranti prajñāpāramitāyām tat kathamiti?
T04ksmadhlu:3278: tad rūpaṃ yadā nāsti tathā sat tadā kathaṃ tannityamanityaṃ vā syāt /“
T04ksmadhlu:3280: katipayeṣvanyeṣu [sutreṣu] yā khalu saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatā deśitā,
T04ksmadhlu:3281: sā prasādasaṃskārebhyo mānasamudvignaṃ kṛtvā kramaśo nairātmye praveśāyaiva deśitā /
T04ksmadhlu:3286: yadi māyādivadaṅkurotpādādiṣu bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyamabhyupagamyata iti cintyate tadā vastunaḥ svīkṛtireva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3287: yato hyevaṃ yāni sāṃvṛtikāni bījākhyāni tāni sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttānyevābhidheyāni /
T04ksmadhlu:3288: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā kathaṃ bhavadbhirlokāgavirodhaparihāraḥ kartuṃ śakyeta /
T04ksmadhlu:3289: vayaṃ tu yattāvat sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇebhyaḥ śaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttaṃ tadeva vastviti kathayāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3290: 'yadi bhavantastathāvidhamapi saṃvṛtisaditi nāmnābhidhātumabhilaṣante tadā saharṣaṃ bravantu,
T04ksmadhlu:3293: yato hyevaṃ svapnādau gajāśvagnibhūmivṛṣabhādayo mithyābhāvā ye vividhārthakriyāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3294: kurvāṇāḥ parasparabhinnaśarīrānugatā dṛśyante te yathaiva bhinnadeśakālavasthāsu
T04ksmadhlu:3295: dṛśyante tathaiva kiṃ sarvābhidhānasamatikrāntaśaśaśṛṅgādibhyo vinivṛttakāyāḥ santi?
T04ksmadhlu:3297: te yadyekāntena vinivṛttakāyāstadā tevāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3299: tarhi kathaṃ bhavantaḥ prasiddhivirodhasya parihāraṃ kariṣyanti?
T04ksmadhlu:3300: yadyucyeta yathāvabhāsaṃ tatsvabhāvo nāvatiṣṭhatītyataḥ pratītyasamutpannatvājjñānasvabhāvatvena vastutaḥ santīti?
T04ksmadhlu:3305: yadi jñānasvabhāvastāvad śuddhasphaṭika iva niraṃśaḥ kkacanāpyanavasthito nīlādivividhasvabhāveṣvanavabhāsamāna ityabhyupagamyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3306: tadā svapnādiṣu gajāśvādīni vastuni tatsvabhāvatvena na samudbhaviṣyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3308: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā tathāvabhāso naiva śakyarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3309: ata eva vayaṃ jñānasvabhāvātītaṃ viparītākāreṇāvabhāsitaṃ mithyātvāllaukikamabhyupagacchāmastathā parikalpitasvabhāvenocyamānameva vastutvena bhrānto viṣaya iti kathayāmaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3312: evaṃ vastvātmanā prasiddhamapi pramāṇena yathāvat sfuṭamavabhāsite 'pi paramārthatayā vastusvabhāvatvena na vyavasthāpayāmaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3315: nivṛttamanivṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ naiva praviśatītyucyeta tadevaṃ yathoktaḥ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3317: yathā - māyāsvapnādyabhinno vastusvabhāvaḥ pramāṇena suspaṣṭīkṛtaḥ ayamapi paramārtha iti prajñapyate tadā saharṣaṃ prajñapyatāmutsavaścānubhūyatām,
T04ksmadhlu:3321: malaviśuddhayarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ ca pravṛttyarthaṃ ye paramārthanukūlāṃ yathāprasiddhāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3325: [yato hi] te naiva santi paramārthataḥ saditi tu pūrvamevāveditam
T04ksmadhlu:3329: āgame 'uyuktam - “etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharmaṃ nirvāṇam,
T04ksmadhlu:3331: paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi vastuno yadi niyatadeśakālādyavabhāso bhavatīti kathaṃ na śaśaśṛṅgādayo 'pyavabhāsanta iti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:3333: yato hi keśādivanmithyāvabhāse 'pi kimiti keśādīnāmeva mithyāvabhāsaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3335: yadi timirādihetupratyayādīnāṃ pratīniyatasāmarthyena tathā pratiniyatatvamityucyeta tadā asadvastuni kathaṃ nāma hetupratyayādīnāṃ pratiniyatasāmarthyamiti kathayituṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3337: tadā tathaiva apareṣvapi pratiniyatahetupratyayatvena pratiniyatasāmarthye 'pi kimiti naiva tathā vyavasthā svīkriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3339: tathā sati taimirikadṛṣṭakeśādīnāmapi vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi pūrvamevāveditam /
T04ksmadhlu:3340: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā taimirikairadhyālambitānāṃ mithyākeśāṃdīnāṃ hetupratyayā api kathaṃ nāma niyatāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3341: taimirikakeśādīnāṃ jñānasvabhāvenāpi satyatvaṃ naiva yujyata iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3342: api ca, yadi jñānasvabhāvaḥ satyatvena siddhaṃ syāttadā keśādayo na tato bhinnā iti teṣāmapi satyatvenāvabodhaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3344: keśādayastu mithyātvena lokena pramāṇena ca siddhā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3345: ato jñānamapi keśādimithyāsvabhāvenābhinnatvāt tathaiva mithyāmātramiti kathaṃ keśādīnāṃ tatsvabhāvatvena satyatvaṃ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3346: yathā sarvaṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni tathaiva saṃvṛtāvapyutpannāni bhavituṃ na śaknuvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3347: tathā hi - ye tāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāsteṣāṃ saṃvṛtāvapi notpādaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3348: yathā - śaśaśṛṅgādaya iti ye bruvanti teṣāṃ māyādibhiranaikāntikatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:3352: ataḥ paramārthato 'sato yadi saṃvṛtāvapyasattvaṃ tadā saṃvṛtisatyasyaiva vināśaprasaṅgaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3355: saṃvṛtāvapi adṛṣṭotpadāḥ śaśaśṛṅgādayo na tathāvidhakarmaṇāṃ sañcayābhāvāna tu paramārthasvabhāvarahitatvād,
T04ksmadhlu:3357: na hetupratyayanirbharatāmātreṇa vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ māyādimithyāvastūnāṃ hetupratyayasamūhabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3358: na hi darśanamātreṇa vastūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ sanniti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3360: ato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ spaṣṭataḥ siddhatve 'pi pramāṇamārgasya jñānābhāvad ye 'nyato dūṣitān nirākartumabhilaṣante,
T04ksmadhlu:3365: evaṃvādinaṃ kaścit 'kathaṃ nāma ekasmādekasyānutpattibodhaḥ' iti pṛcchatīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:3370: yadi kecana' īśvarādinā ekena jagad utpadyata iti kathayantīti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:3372: yadyekamādekasyotpattiriti tadā sā nityād vā anityād vā bhavet /
T04ksmadhlu:3373: na nityāt, tasya anutpannāvasthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvāparakālavad madhye 'pi utpādakatvavirodhāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3378: nityatāyā hānisadbhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tasyotpādakatvaṃ vistareṇa nirākriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3382: na hi nityānityābhyāṃ vyatiriktastasya kaścanotpādaka iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3383: ye cānyaiḥ [vādibhiḥ] ekasvabhāvā īśvarādayo jagato 'sya hetavo manyante,
T04ksmadhlu:3386: ata ekasmādekasyotpattirna bhavatīti kathanakāle bhrāntatayā īśvarādikaṃ yannirdiśanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3388: na hi īśśvarādayo hetutvena astitvabhājo bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3390: nityastāvat sarvasāmarthyaśūnya iti ca pūrvameva prasādhitatatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3393: yato hi tato yadi bhinnasantānavartināṃ phalānāmutpattirbhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:3394: tadā tasya anyasajātīyakṣaṇasya pratisandhānābhāvād dvitīya eva kṣaṇe samucchedaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3395: yadyevaṃ tadā tataḥ sadā vijātīyaphalānāmutpattikāle sarveṣāṃ pūrvasajātīyakṣaṇānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3396: paścādvartini kṣaṇe pratisandhānābhāvād ye tāvadanityasvabhāvā īśvarādisaṃjñakā jagato
T04ksmadhlu:3400: hetorabhāvena tasyotpatterasambhavāt athavā sampūrnameva jagat tadvadahetukameva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3401: yato hi pūrvamapi paścādapi taddhetutvena [sarvathā] kimapi nāstīti /
T04ksmadhlu:3405: tadā sa eva kathaṃ na tasya phalaṃ vā tadutpanno veti kalpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3408: abhinnasantāne vidyamāno sa heturanādikālāt tasyāmeva santatau pravṛtta eveti,
T04ksmadhlu:3409: naivānyasantāne vidyamānaḥ sannutpattikāraka iti kalpyate tadā tasmin paramārthato 'samakālatvam,
T04ksmadhlu:3410: anyatra ca sajātīyakṣaṇotpattirapi naiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ bahuśo nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3411: ataccāpi hetubhedasya abhinnakārake prasaṅgaśca paścāt pratipādayiṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3413: yadyante cakṣurādayastāvat phalasyaikasya niyatotpādakā iti manyante,
T04ksmadhlu:3415: yato hi cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi yadā svavijñānamutpadayanti tadā sajātīyānyakṣaṇāni notpādayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3420: yadyevaṃ tadā hetubhedo bhedaniyāmako naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3421: yo hi ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3424: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā ahetukānyeva tāvad vastūni syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3425: tatra hetubhede 'pi yadi phalabhedo na syāttadā hetorbhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedau na kṛtau syātām,
T04ksmadhlu:3428: itthaṃ naiva te samūhād vyatiriktāḥ sidhyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3429: naiva ca te samūhāt pṛtham kartuṃ śakyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3430: parantu parasparabhinnasvabhāvāt pratyekasmādutpattisāmarthayavato yadi phalamudbhuyate tadā abhinnameva kathaṃ nāmodbhūyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3432: na tvanekaphalotpādana ityevaṃ cettadapi na yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3433: yadyevaṃ tadā sajātīyaphalapratīsandhānābhāvād dvītiye tāvat kṣaṇe cakṣurādisantānānoccheda eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3434: yadi teṣu sajātīyakṣaṇotpāde sāmarthyamityucyate tadā tadanyadeva tāvad vastu syāttataśca sāmarthyameva hetuḥ syānna na khalu vastu /
T04ksmadhlu:3439: yadi te svabhāvabhūtaṃ samarthamuparkurvantīti manyate tadā phalamapi tathaiva kiṃ na kurvantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:3443: ataḥ kathaṃ nāma phalaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3448: ataḥ phalasya sajātīya vijātīyatayorbhedo naiva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3449: hetubhedastrāvat [phalasya] bhedako na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃvidhasya prasaṅgasya ko hyarthaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:3450: yadi khaṇḍaśo notpādayatītyarthastadā vastusvabhāvasya niraṃśatvād aśaṃtaścotpādasyāsvīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ nāma prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3452: yadi viśeṣako [bhedako] na bhavatītyevamartho gṛhyate tadā asiddhamevaitat /
T04ksmadhlu:3453: hetubhistāvadanekebhyo vijātīyaphalebhyo viparītameva jantaya ityabhidhānamapi naiva yuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:3454: yato hyekasya aṃśata utpatterasambhavāditi prasaṅgo naivocyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3455: parantu bhavanto ye vastuṣu parasparaṃ vyatirekaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā manvate,
T04ksmadhlu:3457: yadi vividhahetūnaṅgīkṛtyāpi phalamekavidhameva svīkṛyate tadā bhrāntisadbhāvād vastūnāṃ tāvad bhedo vividhahetubhirakṛta eva syādityevaṃ prasaṅgo nūnamabhidhānīyaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3462: tadā tebhya utpadyaṃ sajātīyaṃ phalaṃ vijātīyaṃ ca naiva parasparanivṛttaṃ syād,
T04ksmadhlu:3464: yadi hetavaste nivṛttisvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ sajātīyaphalanāṃ bhedakā api bhaviṣyantītyucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3465: tadā tathaiva te sāmānyaphale 'pi kathaṃ na bhedakāḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:3466: yato hi tatra sarve ekaikā hetavo bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3467: ye tāvadekotpādakasvabhāvā eva te tato viparītaṃ kamapyanyaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3468: yato hi te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttyā anyārtha iva bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3470: punaste parasparanivṛttasvabhāvāḥ kintu naiva te utpādakasvabhāvanivṛttāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3478: ekasvabhāvasyābhāvo naiva tasya svabhāvo bhavituṃ śaknoti,
T04ksmadhlu:3480: tenaiva tatphalaṃ niṣpādanīyamiti yaduktaṃ tatra kā yuktiriti cet sāṃkhyaireva tatsamādhānaṃ vidheyamiti śobhanaṃ pratibhāti /
T04ksmadhlu:3481: yato hi te khalu bhinnabhinnasvabhāvaṃ jagaditi pratipādayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3482: atasteṣāṃ yattatra grahaṇaṃ tannivṛtyarthameva ācāryeṇa bhinnavastunirdeśakānāṃ kṛte
T04ksmadhlu:3483: vyavahāravaśāduktam tāni [vastūni] pratītyasamutpannatayā naiva paramārthata ekārthāni
T04ksmadhlu:3484: nāpi ca bhinnarthānīti manvānāṃ kṛte naiva kimapyuktamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:3485: teṣāṃ tāvadanusāraṃ tu māyāsadṛśatvāt sarveṣu teṣu na kimapyekaṃ vastu bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3486: api ca, yadi vastuṣu paramārthataḥ svabhavadvayam,
T04ksmadhlu:3488: aparaśca svabhāvalakṣaṇastadā nivṛtte 'pyasmin svabhāvenaivotpādakalakṣaṇastāvannivartata ityuttaraṃ khalu samīcīnaṃ syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3489: yasmin samaye sarva evotpādakasvabhāvastasmin samaye yadi te parasparanivṛttasvabhāvā api tadā utpādakasvabhāvato nivṛttatvāt kathaṃ nāmotpādakāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3490: teṣāmayameva svabhāvo yat svabhāvabhede 'pi ekamutpādayanti viruddhasvabhāve 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3491: ca sati naiva parīkṣāyogyā iti yadi bhavadbhirucyate tadā pādau prasārya tathātāparīkṣātaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3492: parāṅmukhabuddhayo ye vyavahāramātramanusaranti te sukhenāsituṃ śaknuvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3493: ye tu tathātāparīkṣāyāṃ pravṛtabuddhayasteṣāṃ kṛte tathaiva sukhāsanaṃ naiva yuktarūpam /
T04ksmadhlu:3494: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā īśvarādistāvadekaḥ sannapi svabhāvabhede 'pi ca sati krameṇa yugapad vā vicitrasyāsya jagato heturupeṇa naiva kathamapi viruddho bhaviṣyati,
T04ksmadhlu:3496: svabhāvabhede 'pi nāsti parīkṣāyogya ityabhidadhatāṃ kṛte kiṃ nāmottaraṃ dattaṃ syāt?
T04ksmadhlu:3497: tenaiva phalamutpādanīyamiti pratipādayatāṃ tatra kā yuktiriti ye kathayanti teṣāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3498: kṛte agnyādikamapekṣyotpadyamāno dhūmastāvad śakramūrdhato 'uputpadyata iti kathanaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3501: vyavahāre 'pi ekasamūhāntargato yadyekaphalasyotpādako bhavettadā naiva viruddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3502: kintu samūhāntargatastu viruddha evetyevaṃ kathayadbhiḥ saha nāsti kaścana bhedaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3506: samuho 'pi bhinnaḥ svabhāvataścotpanna ityevamabhidadhānaiḥ saha ko virodha iti vaktavyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3507: tatra yathā ekasamūhamāśrityotpadyamānaṃ phalaṃ samūhāntareṇāpyutpadyate tadā tenotpādyasya svabhāvasyāniyatatvād ahetuka ityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3508: tathaiva ekasminneva samūhe vijñānādayo yadā ekahetumapekṣyāpi tadvilakṣaṇahetuta utpadyante tadā kimityahetukatāyāḥ prasaṅgo noktaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3509: hetoryathātmakena prayogeṇa nirduṣṭāt svabhāvaviśeṣād hetubhedo bhedakaśca viruddhāveva syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:3510: yato hi cakṣurādinā bhinnasvabhāvena cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ phalānāmutpattikāle sākṣād bhedābhāve 'pi pratītisvabhāvād rūpādayaḥ pṛthagviṣayatvena niyatā bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3512: te cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samantarapratyayena ca pratītisvabhāvāḥ syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3518: viṣayeṇa ca samantarapratyayena cāpi pṛthaktayā viṣayagrahaṇaṃ naiva niyatam /
T04ksmadhlu:3519: evaṃvidhayā niyatavyavasthayā niścayena hetubhedo bhedaka eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3520: bheda eva bhinnaviśeṣa ityasau vicāro yadi vyavahāratayā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ pravṛttyarthamevocyate tadā tu sutarāṃ yajyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3522: atha ye tāvad bhedāstee aprajñaptimātrātmakā vā nivṛttiviśeṣeṇa prajñaptisvabhāvātmakā vā?
T04ksmadhlu:3523: yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastadā vijñānasya ālambanādasvabhāvādabhinnatvena tathaivānekatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3526: tathaivābhinne 'pi rūpādibhya utpadyata ityucyata iti cedekasmin ekadā parasparaviruddhāvutpādānutpādau
T04ksmadhlu:3527: kathaṃ nāma na viruddhau syātāmityayaṃ doṣo naiva yujyatāmiti vicārya ye viśeṣān
T04ksmadhlu:3528: vijñānato bhinnārthatvena kalpayanti teṣāṃ tadā vijñānamahetukaṃ syād anyasminneva
T04ksmadhlu:3531: yadi prajñaptisvabhāva iti dvitīyapakṣaḥ svīkriyate tadāpi vijñānasyāhetukatvaṃ prasajyata eva,
T04ksmadhlu:3533: prajñaptyātmakatve kasyāpi yogo naiva bhavatītyataḥ sarveṣāmahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3534: phalataḥ paramārthato 'nekebhya ekasya phalasyotpattirnaiva sarvathā yujayata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3538: tadā hetubhedābhāve 'pi phalasya bhinnatvāt phalasya tāvad bhedābhedau kathaṃ nāhetukāviti /
T04ksmadhlu:3539: yena khalu kāraṇena tatra phalāntarotpattimattve nāstyanyaḥ [kaścana] viśeṣaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3541: ato hettuatāvat svabhāvapracyuto bhūtvā phalaṃ notpādayatīti,
T04ksmadhlu:3542: tathāpi tasmin hetvātmakatve bhedābhāvāt tannirvṛte phale 'pi tāvad bhedo na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3546: atastasyāḥ parihāraṃ kartuṃ śakyata ityabhidhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3550: yad yathā dṛśyate tattathaiva sadityabhiniviśamānānāṃ kevalaṃ mithyākalpanānāṃ nirākaraṇāya svapna iva sādhyamānatvānnāsti tāvad virodho 'pīti
T04ksmadhlu:3551: api ca, cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ yānyanekasmādutyadyamānāni dṛśyante,
T04ksmadhlu:3552: teṣāṃ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvastāvadekatvena naiva kathamapi siddhaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3554: vividho 'pi svabhāvo yadyekaḥ syāttadā sarveṣāmevaikadravyatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3557: ekasya cānekaṣāṃ ca vastūnāṃ paramārthata utpattistāvat kutra samavalokyate?
T04ksmadhlu:3559: ekaikasya phalasya stāvadanaikairhetubhiḥ kriyamāṇatvādayamapi pakṣastāvadanekasmādekasyaivotpattipakṣaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3564: ato nāstyayamasiddho heturapi koṭīnāṃ catuṣkaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo 'pi kaścanotpattipakṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3568: ācāryo 'pi saṃvṛtau kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitiṃ svīkṛtya yathā vyavahāre ekasmādanekasya cānekasmādekasya cotpattiḥ prasidhyati tathā dṛśyata eveti kathayāgāsa /
T04ksmadhlu:3570: pravṛttyarthaṃ kāryahetvorbhedakāle yadi heturbhinnastadā kāryabhedo 'pi sutarāṃ syādityuktavān,
T04ksmadhlu:3575: teṣāṃ sameṣāṃ samādhānamapi pṛthakpṛthasmāmiḥ pūrvameva kṛtam /
T04ksmadhlu:3577: sa anaikāntika iti ye kathitavantasteṣāmapyuttaraṃ dattapūrvameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3579: tadā naiva tāni saṃvṛtāvapi bhavituṃ śakyānīti yaduktam,
T04ksmadhlu:3582: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmapi samādhānaṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pūrvaṃ samyaktayā kṛtameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3583: tathāpi ye tāvat kecana dveṣavaśād dūṣaṇāni prayuñjate,
T04ksmadhlu:3589: tatra yaistāvat kadācid īśvarādayo nityaikatvasvabhāvena parikalpitāstaisteṣu kramotpādadharmayogo 'pi yataḥ svīkriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3591: yato hyekasvabhāvatāyāmanutpādāsthāto 'bhinnatvāt pūrvakālavat paścātkāle 'pyutpādakasvabhāvatā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3592: yadyutpādaka eva svabhāvaḥ syāttadā pūrvāvasthātaḥ svabhāvasya bhinnalakṣaṇatvādekatvahānireva syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3594: yato hi tattvatāyāṃ samakālikatvamaparasmiṃśca svaparapratisandhānaṃ tāvannaiva yujyata iti pūrvaṃ prasādhitameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3595: ye tāvadākāśādīnāṃ trayāṇāmasaṃkṛtānāmekasvabhāvatvaṃ phalapratisandhānābhāvaṃ ca teṣāṃ svīkurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3598: yato hi pratyekajñānāttajjñeyasvabhāvastāvad bhinna eva syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3599: yadi na syāttadābhinnatvāt pūrvavat tajjñāne jñeyasvabhāvo naivopapannaḥ syādata ekasvabhāvastāvannaiva yujyata iti /
T04ksmadhlu:3601: ye tāvannityaikasvabhāvāḥ kālapuruṣapradhānabrahmādayaśca vicitrāyā asyā jagadvyavasthāyā hetutvena parikalpyante,
T04ksmadhlu:3602: te yadi satyāsatyādivividhasvabhāvāṃ vastusāmagrīṃ krameṇa yugapad vā gṛhṇantīti svīkriyate tadā tatsāmarthyata ekatvarahita eva svabhāve te niyamena te niyamena svīkṛtāḥ syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3603: yato hi vividhasvabhāvasya jagato grahaṇe ekasvabhāvā naiva yujyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3607: ye tāvat pudgalāmidhaṃ padārthaṃ nityānityatvenānirvacanīyamiti parikalpayanti te 'uyenam ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvena sākṣāt svīkurvantyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:3609: api ca, bhinnabhinnasvabhāvenānubhūyamānasya tāvat kṣaṇikatve 'nirvacanīyatā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3610: kāyaḥ bhūmiparvatādayo ye 'nityāḥ sāvayavāḥ pṛthaksvabhāvāstān ekadravyatnena parikalpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3612: teṣāṃ svīkṛtā syāt yato hi yadi tasya pratyekasminnavayave nāsti bhinnasvabhāvastadā
T04ksmadhlu:3615: ye tāvad dehādīnāṃ paramāṇusañcayātmakatvāt tān paramāṇūn pṛthakśaḥ parikalpayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3618: yato hi niraṃśasvabhāve [vastuni] yatraiva hi saṃyogādayo 'nubhūyante,
T04ksmadhlu:3620: yasmin pakṣeṇa kenacit saha saṃyogaḥ sañcayo vā na bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3624: paramāṇuṣu cāvayavidravyeṣu cobhayeṣu tāvadanekasvabhāvatvamapi na yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3625: yato hi sañcitasvabhāvātmakatvātte yadā naivaikasvabhāvatve yujyante tadā tatparatantratayā vyavasthitatvena teṣāmanekasvabhāvatvamapi naiva sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3626: itthaṃ yadā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ cāpi dravyamekānesvabhāvarahitaṃ siddham,
T04ksmadhlu:3627: tadā tadādhārena kalpitanāṃ guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghātasya cāpi siddhiḥ sutarāṃ naiva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3630: jñānamapi tāvat kāmamekasvabhāvamityupakalpyatāṃ kintu tatsvarūpaṃ vividhasyabhāvagrāhakamiti svīkṛtatvāt tatsāmarthyata ekasvabhāvarahitameva taditi svīkṛtaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3631: yato hi tajjñānaṃ tāvat sākāramityavaśyaṃ svīkarttavyam,
T04ksmadhlu:3632: anyathā viṣayākāreṇa yo nākāritastasya jñānakāyasya viṣayaġ
T04ksmadhlu:3634: yadi sākāratvena svīkriyate tadā tasyaikasvabhāvarahitatvamapi spaṣṭatayā svīkṛtameva syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:3637: ataḥ sarvāṇyeva tāvajjñānāni vibhinnānāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayitvena svīkriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:3638: ata eva svayūthyāḥ 'sañcitālambanāḥ paścavijñānakāyāḥ' iti svīkurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3642: tatra vividhatāyāṃ [vicitratāyāṃ] svamatasthāpanārtha tāvadanekajñānotpattikalpanamapi nāsti samīcīnam,
T04ksmadhlu:3645: guṇakarmasamavetānāṃ dravyādīnāṃ tāvajjñānena yugapadgrahaṇasvīkārād apare 'pi [siddhāntavādinaḥ] jñānaṃ citrākāratvenaiva svīkurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3646: ye hi dravyaparyāyādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvaṃ vastu tāvanmecakamaṇivadityāmananti,
T04ksmadhlu:3656: svapnādijñānānyapi nīlādivibhinnākārān anubhavantīti tanyekasvabhāvānīti naiva yuktāni /
T04ksmadhlu:3658: te bāhyapadārthānāmaviṣayibhūtatvāttat svasaṃvedanasvarūpaṃ paryantaṃ ca jñānamiti svīkurvanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3659: te 'pyanādikālīnabhrāntavāsānāparipākavaśād rūpādivibhinnaviparītāvabhāsānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiṃ svīkurvantyato vijñānamekasvabhāvamiti naivābhyupagacchanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3660: phalato darśaneṣu kasminnapi vijñānaṃ naikasvabhāvamiti sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3662: tadā anekasvabhāvo 'pi na sidhyatīti bahuśaḥ pūrvamāveditam /
T04ksmadhlu:3663: ata eva svātantryeṇa sādhako hetirapyayaṃ nāsiddha iti yathoktanayena vādiprativādyubhyeṣu sarve dharma ekānekasvabhāvarahitā eva siddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3664: ye va vyavacchedamātrātmakāsteṣu sādhyasādhanānugato dharmeyeva avastubhūtaḥ sidhyatīti pūrvamanekadhā nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3671: yato hi yathoktanayenaiva te hetuṃ sādhayantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:3672: ityevaṃ ye kecidindriyairagamyā ātmādayaste tadvyāptakramikakāryayogādidharmāṇāṃ svīkṛtyā ekānekasvabhāvarahitatvenaiva prasiddhāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3674: tādṛśānāṃ vastūnāṃ pratiṣedhāya dharmiṇaḥ parīkṣāyāḥ sarvatrānivāryatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3676: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] tadā tanniṣedhāya bhavatāmapi arthakriyāsāmarthyaviyogalakṣaṇo hetustāvat kathaṃ siddho bhaviṣyatīti codanā kathaṃ na syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3677: paraparikalpite dharmiṇi tathāvidhakramikakāryāṇāṃ svīkṛtyaiva tadvyāptadharmāṇāṃ niṣpattestanmatamātrāśritatvād dharmiṇastasya tāvat parikalpitatvameva
T04ksmadhlu:3680: vyavahāreṇāpi tāvat sādhyavyāptasādhanasya siddhatvāditi pūrvameva samyaguktatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3684: ekasvabhāvahitatvena siddhe satyanekasvabhāvarāhityamapi sutarāṃ pratyakṣataḥ siddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:3697: āropasvabhāvātmakatvāt sarvapratyakṣāṇāṃ kathaṃ hi tairekānekasvabhāvayuktatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyata iti cintāyāṃ heturyamatra māyākārāpratyakṣānumānābhyāmanaikāntika eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3698: yato hi māyākārajñāne tāvad yo 'yaṃ gajādyākārāropastasmin svabhāve paramārthato nabhiniveśo jāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3700: evaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pratyakṣasya nirākṛte 'pi bhāntikāraṇe kadācidanyāropākārasvabhāvavataḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3703: tathaivānumānajñānamapi yaddhi sāmānye tāvad vastulakṣaṇe samāropākāram,
T04ksmadhlu:3704: tadapi vastutathatāyā yathāvajjñānasvabhāvatvāt tadviṣayakaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇasadbhāvādanaikāntika eva hetuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3711: vividhaprakārādiliṅgaiḥ sarve yadyekasvabhāvarahitatvena sādhyante tadā te 'nekatvasvabhāvarahitā api sidhyanyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:3715: vyavahāre ghaṭādiviṣayaparicchedena puruṣā atulyasambaddhān vyavahārayogyānatyantaṃ paricchedayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3719: paricchedo yadi naiva viccinnastadā sa nāstyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:3727: vyāpyasya vyāpakasya vā vastunaḥ svato 'siddhatvādasiddha eva sa heturiti kecana /
T04ksmadhlu:3728: tathaiva dharmiṇyeva kevale vyāpyasadbhāvasidhyarthaṃ vyāpakanivṛtyā vyāpyanivṛttirasiddhaivetyapare /
T04ksmadhlu:3730: evaṃ vyāpyavyāpakādisarvavastūnāṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvṛttyāśritatvaṃ prasādhya paścād vyavasthā kṛtetyapi pūrvamāveditameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3731: atyantaṃ samīpavartini vyāpake niyataṃ vyāpyaviśeṣajñānaṃ naiva bhavatītyapi pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3737: ato vivādāspadībhūteṣu sarvadharmiṣu sāmānyena sādhayitumiṣyamāṇatvāt kathamimau dvau [vyāpyavyāpakau] ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritāviti cet?
T04ksmadhlu:3738: ekasmin dharmiṇyāśritatve 'pi [mithaḥ] sāpekṣatvād bhinnāveveti nāsti doṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3747: ye sarvābhilāpavigatalakṣaṇāste na kathañcanāpi bodhyā bodhakāśca,
T04ksmadhlu:3760: atastasmin kathaṃ na sarva vivādā āpateyuriti /
T04ksmadhlu:3761: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3763: bhāvā yatra vicāryante na te santi savabhāvataḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3767: yadi niḥsvabhāvatā tatra naiva bodhyata iti cettadā aśvaśṛṅgasyāpi bodhābhāvaḥ kathaṃ nollikhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3768: bhavatāmabhilāpalakṣaṇarahitāḥ sarva bhāvā na manāgapi bodhyanta ityādiprayogeṣu vidyata eva sādhyasādhakayorniṣedhasvabhāvaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3771: ato nāsti prayogakauśalamapi sarvesāṃ vastunāṃ niścetavyaprasaṅgālliṅgasyaiva vastuno bodho na kenāpi svīkriyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3775: liṅgaṃ tāvat kalpanayā bodhakatvena vyavasthitamiti yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3776: ato niḥ svabhāvatve 'pi niayatatadākārasya sādhyakāraniścayotpattau hetutvād bodhakatvena kalpanāyāṃ nāsti kaścana doṣaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3778: ākāśaniṣedhakasya liṅgasya nitarāṃ kalpitatvādeveti pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:3780: tatrāpi yadi vastubhūtaḥ sambandha evaiko hetutvena kathayitumiṣyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3788: ekatve sati naiva dvayāśritvaṃ tāvad yuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3789: yadi sa sambandhibhyo 'rthāntara iti tadā svasvabhāvavyavasthitatvāt kathaṃ nāma sambaddhasvabhāvaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3790: yadi nāstyarthāntara iti tadā kevalaṃ sambandhināveva syātām /
T04ksmadhlu:3793: yāni hi sambandhodbhūtāni lakṣaṇāni tānyapi kalpanātmakānyeva,
T04ksmadhlu:3796: api ca, yadā kāryasvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ tadā apekṣāvirahānnaiva tasya kūtracinnirbharatvam /
T04ksmadhlu:3797: ato nāsti tasya kenāpi saha sambandhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3798: apariniṣpanne 'pi tasmin kāraṇena saha sambandhakāle vidūre sthitatvādasambaddhameva tat syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:3810: asambaddhatve sati abhedābhāvāt kathaṃ tādṛśī yaktiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3812: abhede sati tadātmaka eva sambandha iti nirdeśaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:3818: yadyevaṃ na syāttadā 'abhinnatvād' ityapi vaktuṃ na paryeta /
T04ksmadhlu:3819: tatra 'abhinnatvad' ityayaṃ heturyadi paramārthādhikāreṇocyeta tadā anekāntika eva,
T04ksmadhlu:3820: yato hi kṛtakatvānityatve yadyapi paramārthato naiva bhinne tathāpi bodhyabodhakavastuṣu tāvat te dṛśyete /
T04ksmadhlu:3821: yadi vyavahāre 'pi tayornāsti bhinnatvamityucyeta tadā asiddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:3823: evameva śabdādidharmiṇi yadā akṛtakatvādito nivṛttirniścīyate tadā nityādito 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:3824: nirvṛtterniścayanāt paramārthato bhinnatāyā abhāve 'pi nivṛttiviśeṣāpekṣayā kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3825: bhinnavyavasthāyā upakalpanād bodhyabodhakavastuvyavasthā tāvat kriyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3826: itthaṃ yadā vastūni sāmarthyataḥ pratimbivad ekānekasvabhāvavinivṛttāni bhavanti tadā paramārthasvabhāvato 'pi teṣāṃ nivṛttirniyataiva /
T04ksmadhlu:3828: ata eva ca tatra bodhyabodhakabhāvo 'pi sambhavatyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3829: punaśca, yathā nityaṃ tāvd vastu arthakriyāsāmarthyavirahād vastusvabhāvena rahitaṃ sādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3831: [41] yadapi atadvyāvṛttiviśeṣeṇānayoḥ kṛtakatvaṃ tad vastu syāt nīlapītādivattasvabhāvatvāditi kathanaṃ tāvadasambaddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:3835: yathā nityavastuniṣedhāya arthakriyāsāmārthyarahitatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ ca vyāvṛttikṛtaviśeṣe satyapi naiva vastu,
T04ksmadhlu:3838: yatkhalu nīlātmakaṃ pītātmakamiti nidarśanaṃ tadapi paramārthe tāvad vastunyasiddhatvādayuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:3841: yato hi nayo 'yamasanniti kathanamātreṇa tāvat paramārthe vastuni na kimapi siddhaṃ bhāvati,
T04ksmadhlu:3843: tatra buddhau pratibhāsamāno yo hi pūrvodito dharmī,
T04ksmadhlu:3845: kintu paramārthe vastuni sa naiva yuktarūpaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3847: ekānekasvabhāvarahitaṃ khalu paramārthaṃ vastu naiva kiñcit,
T04ksmadhlu:3849: sarve khalu padārthāḥ ekānekasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptā iti tu pūrvameva prasādhitam /
T04ksmadhlu:3850: māyādibhiravyatiriktāḥ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvā hi bhāvāste yadi 'vastu' nāmnā vyavahriyeran,
T04ksmadhlu:3858: [42] evaṃ yathā ekānekasvabhāvalakṣaṇo hetustāvannairātmyaṃ sādhayati tadvadabhāvadharmini
T04ksmadhlu:3859: dharmivyāvṛttisādhakatvād viruddho 'yaṃ heturiti yaduktaṃ tattu atyantaṃ pramāṇānabhijñatāmātrameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3862: kintu yadā sa [dharmī] niḥsvabhāvatvena sādhyate tadā siddhe 'pi vādino mate kathaṃ tāvad viruddho heturbhaviṣyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3863: niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ hi sādhayitumiṣṭāyāṃ vastusvabhāvo dharmī naiva sambhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:3865: ataḥ sādhyasādhanābhyāṃ yathokto dharmī avastubhūta eva sammat ityasmāt kāraṇāt tena hetunā tāvad vyāvṛttireva sādhayate /
T04ksmadhlu:3867: yathāyaṃ heturnairātmyaṃ sādhayati tathaiva abhāvadharmyapīti keṣāñcit kathanamasambaddhameva /
T04ksmadhlu:3868: yato hi yena kāraṇena tāvannairātmyasya abhāvasya ca dvayordharmayorviruddhahetubhyāṃ siddhirucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3877: dṛśayate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
T04ksmadhlu:3878: phalato niḥsvabhāvatāsādhanārthaṃ na ko 'pi heturiti yatkathanam,
T04ksmadhlu:3880: [43-44] yadi vijñānamapi itaradharmāṇāmiva niḥsvabhāvameva syāttadā mithyātvād yogibhiranyadharmāṇāmiva tasyāpi parityāgaḥ kariṣyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3881: yadyevaṃ kariṣyate tadā na ko 'pi yogino bhaviṣyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3883: nāpi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāmapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ naiva ca teṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04ksmadhlu:3884: anena khalu hetunā sarvāsāṃ vyavasthānāṃ vilopa eva syāditi yatkathanaṃ tadapi naiva yuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:3885: yato hi prasaṅgastāvadayaṃ yadi satyābhiniveśaparityāgārthamucyate tadā saharṣamucyatām,
T04ksmadhlu:3890: yanmithyā tat sarvathā parityājyamityetasya naiva kimapi kāraṇamupalabhāmahe,
T04ksmadhlu:3893: te yogibhiḥ parityājyā iti kathanaṃ tu yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3894: parantu ye tavat sākṣāt paramparayā vā svaparaprayojanaprasādhakāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3895: kṛpālūnāṃ parahitakaraṇopāyabhūtāsteṣāṃ kathaṃ sarvadā parityāgaḥ kartum śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3897: te sarve viparītaparihāradvārā parityājyā api yāvatsaṃsāramaparityājyā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:3898: te yadyapi māyākāra iva sarvān mithyābhūtān jānanti,
T04ksmadhlu:3904: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:3907: bhāvo 'pi tāvanna grāhyo na cābhāvo 'pi parityājyaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:3911: kṛpāparādhīnacetaso yogino 'pi parahitārthaṃ vividharūpeṇa gajādimithyānirmāṇādikaṃ sādhayanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3912: tatra mahākaruṇāparādhīnatayā ye pareṣām aśeṣahitasukhopāyaśālinaḥ prajñālokena vidhvastasakalakleśāndhakārāḥ
T04ksmadhlu:3915: itthaṃ sameṣāṃ vastūnāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi hetupratyayasāmagrīpāratantryena māyāvat sambhavantyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:3923: saṃkṣepato bhagavatām apratisṭhitanirvāṇahetustu karunā prajñā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:3924: kṛpayā hi tannirvāṇāvabodhe 'pi te naiva tasya sākṣātkāraṃ kurvanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3925: prajñayā tāvat sarvasaṃkleśahetoḥ sammohasyānavakāśāt saṃsāradoṣagandhenāpyaliptāḥ santo naiva saṃsāre patanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3928: ata eva ca sā bodhasattvānāṃ mārga ucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:3929: tayā virahitāḥ sattvāstu śrāvakādibhūmisu patanti / yathoktam..........
T04ksmadhlu:3934: tadā nūnaṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā eva bhavanti /“
T04ksmadhlu:3936: tadyathā - acintyasāmarthyavattvād yogino yathā vastūnyavabhāsante tathā karatalāmalakavat saṃvṛtiparamārthākārābhyāṃ sarvākāraṃ
T04ksmadhlu:3939: sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ niruttaraṃ lokottaramaśesadharmanirābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ tattvāvabodhakaṃ bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:3945: sarve dharmā nirmāṇaniva bhavanti tadā bhagavati nirvāṇe ca kimantaram?
T04ksmadhlu:3947: katham? bhagavataḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirmāṇavad bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:3949: nirmaṇasya tāvannodbhavo nāpi parinirvāṇaṃ kimapi bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:3950: itthaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ sarvadharmeṣu nirmāṇamivādhimuktiṃ vidhāya prajñāpāramitāyāmācaritavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:3952: [45] ye hi rūpādayo bhinnadeśakālāvasthāsu spaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣeṇāvabhāsante te niścayena svabhāvena yuktā ityataḥ pratijñā tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bādhiteti yat pūrvamuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:3957: kintu naiva svabhāvaḥ paramārthatayā siddha iti pūrvamāveditam /
T04ksmadhlu:3958: api ca, yadi bhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvat pratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvamabhyuopagamyate tadā naiva tena bādhā yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3959: timirādyupahatalocaneṣu vidyamāne 'pi dvicandre na tena ekacandrādibādhā yuktimatī /
T04ksmadhlu:3960: yadyabhrāntapratyakṣe 'vabhāsitatvena tthā [bādhā] abhyupeyate tadā tannaiva sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:3962: na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇaṃ na jihṇa pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
T04ksmadhlu:3963: pramāṇa yadyeta bhaveyurindriyā kasyāryamārgeṇa bhaveta kāryam //
T04ksmadhlu:3964: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jaḍāḥ svabhāvena avyākṛtāśca /
T04ksmadhlu:3965: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva arthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu karyam //
T04ksmadhlu:3967: te naiva kimapi vastu sattvenālambante / yathoktam -
T04ksmadhlu:3969: te rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ tathāgatacakṣuṣā anupalabdheṣu sarvadharmeṣu sattvenābhiniviśante “.......iti vastaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:3970: pratijñāyā anumānenābhāsa iti yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:3971: yato hi nānumānena kimapi vastu svabhāvataḥ sidhyati,
T04ksmadhlu:3992: mahāmate, sarve dharmā niḥsvabhāvā ityapi bodhisattvairnaiva pratijñā kāryā /
T04ksmadhlu:3997: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na vidyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4034: na tveteṣāṃ paramārthataḥ sattvam' - iti nirdeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4035: rūpata ārabhya sarvākārajñānaparyantaṃ ye tāvad dharmāsteṣāṃ na staḥ saṃyogaviyogāvapi /
T04ksmadhlu:4036: yato hi rūpaṃ adarśnam apratigham alakṣaṇameva asattvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4037: sattvānāṃ grahaṇārthaṃ te kevalaṃ tathāgatena lokavyavahārārthaṃ kathitāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4039: lokasaṃvṛtau ye pinaḥ prāptirabhisamayaḥ pañcagatibhedāste 'pi pūrvata eva paramārthato na santi /
T04ksmadhlu:4047: anyatra bhagavān spapne sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchā tadabhāve saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca mithyaiveti kathitavān /
T04ksmadhlu:4049: yato hi mahāyānāndanyatra bhagavān teṣāṃ [āryasatyānāṃ] upadeśaṃ kṛtavān /
T04ksmadhlu:4051: “yaduta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgadho mārgaśceti naiva santyāryāṇāṃ satyāni,
T04ksmadhlu:4061: tattu śrāvakānadhikṛtya saṃsārodvignamānasānāṃ kṛte pudgalanairātmyapraveśāryaṃ tāvadanityādisvabhāvatvena kevalaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
T04ksmadhlu:4063: [53] yaśca tāvajjanyajanakasvabhāvo janeṣvāgopālaṃ prasiddhastena prasiddhivirodhadoṣo 'pīti yaduktaṃ tadapyasambaddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:4065: yadi prasiddhastadā te naiva santi sādhāraṇajanāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4069: tadā tadvirodhaparihāreṇa tadbādhāyā api parihāraḥ kṛta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4070: [54] yaccāvaśyaṃ parotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogābhilāṣeṇa tato 'vaśyamutpattyabhyupagamāt svavacanavirodha ityuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:4072: niyatotpattyarthaṃ hetuprayogānnaiva tataḥ paramārthato niyatotpattirabhyupagatā bhavati /
T04ksmadhlu:4076: paramārthata utpattiniṣedhenātra vastūnāṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva paramārthataḥ sādhayitumiṣyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4078: ato yadyapi hetubhyo niyatatayā pāramārthikī utpattirnaiva bhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:4081: [55] yacca bhagavatā - “cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam” - ityuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:4083: anyatra tu - “na cakṣuḥ pramāṇaṃ na śrotra ghrāṇam” ityādinā ṣaḍindriyāṇāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣiddhameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4085: lokasaṃvṛtau tu sarva [dharmāḥ] saṃvidyanta evetyevaṃvidhaṃ bhagavān svābhiprayaṃ suspaṣṭaṃ prakaṭitavān /
T04ksmadhlu:4095: nāma rūpaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇam ityat ārabhya yāvad buddhatvam anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiḥ buddha iti tāvad dvatetyupadideśa /
T04ksmadhlu:4100: ato vyāvahārikacakṣurādīnābhisandhāya draṣṭṛtvato jñātṛtvaparyantamātmaprasiddhestaddṛṣṭiniṣedhāryaṃ pudgalanairātmyapraveśābhiprāyeṇa cakṣurādīnāṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4101: ata eva cānābhāsina ākāśetpalasya nīlatvādivadime nīlādirūpāṇāṃ ye sāṃvṛtikā ābhāsāste 'pi na santyatyantābhāvarūpāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4102: [56] 'yat kiñcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakam' ityamunānumānena
T04ksmadhlu:4103: samyaktayā kṣaṇikatvena sthitasya vastudharmiṇaḥ siddhirninirdaṣṭeti yaduktaṃ tadapyutpādavināśadharmiṇo
T04ksmadhlu:4106: yato hi bhagavatā saṃskārāṇāmutpādavināśasvabhāvasya samyaganudarśanaṃ taduddeśaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāmiva nirmitasadṛśamityuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:4108: āryadharmasaṃgītau hi tathāgatena bhayasthānasya parihārārthaṃ vyavahāre cotpādanirodhau tāvaduktau /
T04ksmadhlu:4112: yathā mayā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
T04ksmadhlu:4116: sarve dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā nāsanna sat punaḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:4125: ye ca pratyutpanne pṛthagutpannāste vartamānakāla ityubhidhīyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4126: vartamānakālotpannāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni na sthitāni nāpyasthitānīti parijñāyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4138: trayātmakatvāt kṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇaṃ sthitiḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:4140: tadapi sūtrāntareṣu sakalasāmagrīsamavadhānāt samutpadyamānānāmagnidhūmādīnāṃ sāmānyena niṣedhaparakameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4141: ato naiva tat paramārthamadhikṛtyoktamiti nirdiṣṭameva pūrvam /
T04ksmadhlu:4143: samavāyād vinirmukto buddhayā bhāvo na gṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4147: samavāyāt pṛthaṅ nāsti na cānyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:4149: na skandhā dhātavo naiva sarve dharmā alakṣaṇāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4156: ataḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpitasvabhāvatvāt tatsvabhāvasaṃgṛhītāstāvadagnidhūmādayo 'pi kalpitasvabhāvā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4162: paramārthastu yadā na kasyacanotpādastadāhetukatvaṃ tāvadanupapannameveti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4165: [59-60] āryadharmasaṃgītau tavaduktam - bodhisattvena tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yo vyāvahārikatvena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4176: [61] yacca tadā vastveva svīkṛtaṃ syādityuktaṃ tatpūrvaṃ kṛtottarameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4177: [62-64] kā nāma saṃvṛtiryadi sarvamevāsaditi yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yuktisaṃṅgatam,
T04ksmadhlu:4181: yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4183: athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ] bādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4186: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4198: tattvānyatvayostāvat parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt tattvānyatvavirodha iti pūrvameva nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4202: ato bhāvamabhāvaṃ vā svabhāvamāśrita yattāvaccodyaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirādhārameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4203: vastunyeva tāvad vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā sambhavī /
T04ksmadhlu:4210: asāmarthādināṃ paramārthasatyāśritatvena sāmarthyādīnāṃ ca saṃvṛtisatyāśritatvena vyavasthīyamānatvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4211: māyāpuruṣādivat sarvavastuṣu bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt krmaśaḥ satyadvayabhedo vyavasthāpyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4213: tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4214: māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ sampratipādyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4216: ato māyādivyavahāra ivāpekṣāviśeṣena satyadvayaśritā ime sarvavyavahārā aviruddhā evetyavaśyamabhyupetavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:4217: yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā taimirikādyālambiteṣu keśādiṣu vijñānavādināṃ ca dvayābhāseṣu kimivemāni codyāni na syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4218: itthaṃ yadīme keśādayaḥ paramārthato 'santa eva tadā kathamiva te sadrūpeṇāvabhāsante,
T04ksmadhlu:4219: kathamiva ca deśakālāvasthānāṃ pṛthaṅ niścayaḥ parigṛhyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4220: utpādānutpādādayaḥ sadasatī ca parasparamekasmin naiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4221: yato hi tatra yathā keśādiṣu dvayābhāseṣu ca bhrāntābhrāntajñānābhyāṃ vyavasthitasvabhāvasya saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyamāśritya saṃvṛtau sattvaṃ paramārthe cāsattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4223: tathaiva sarvavastūnāṃ sādṛśyena nedaṃ codyaṃ yujyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4225: teṣāmayamāśayaḥ - yena hetunā yathoktabhrāntanāṃ saṃvṛtasvabhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ naiva samyagutpādo jāyate tathāpyutpattisādṛśyamupadṛśyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4227: ata eva bhagavatā cāpyuktam - “bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā” iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4230: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi /
T04ksmadhlu:4232: itthaṃ paramārthato 'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4233: ata ubhe api na sto 'sambaddhābhidhāne yadyevaṃ nāsti tadā bhavadbhirapi 'sarvāṇi vastūni paramārthato 'nutpannāni' ityādīnāmarthaḥ kathamupanīyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4234: kathaṃ vā bhavatāṃ satyadvayāśrito vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
T04ksmadhlu:4235: yadi niyataṃ śabdārthamatiricya mithyaiva pare dūṣyante tadā spaṣṭamasambaddhāmevābhidhānaṃ parilakṣyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4237: yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi kalpitamevocyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4254: ataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā,
T04ksmadhlu:4257: kecana śāstraracayitāraḥ prasiddhimatītya kalpanādisvabhāvatvenipakalpitaṃ vastu mithyāsaṃvṛtisaditi kathayanti,
