T04ksmadhlu:4259: yattu pratītyasamutpadānukūlatvena parikalpitaṃ tattu” nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ” ityataḥ saṃvṛtisadevetyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:4262: [66] yacca 'māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthaḥ' ityuktaṃ tadapyasatyārthe māyārthasya svīkārād doṣahitameva,
T04ksmadhlu:4270: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:4273: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:4276: ato mithyāsvabhāvatvājjñānasvarūpe 'ntarjñeyavādināṃ mate mahān viśeṣo [bhedaḥ] jāyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4277: [67] saṃvṛtiḥ śabdamātrātmiketyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi pūrvapakṣarūpeṇa svamatopakalpitmeva /
T04ksmadhlu:4285: teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā /
T04ksmadhlu:4292: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti,
T04ksmadhlu:4294: sūtre 'pi paramārthasatyanirdeśasāmarthyena sarveṣāṃ jñānajñeyābhidhānādīnāṃ saṃvṛtisatyatvena nirdiṣṭatvānnaiva te śabdamātratvena nirdiṣṭā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4298: yato hi nirviśeṣaḥ anutpannaḥ aniruddhaḥ abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādirahitaḥ sa iti /“
T04ksmadhlu:4304: evaṃvidhaḥ paramārthaḥ saṃvṛtisatyanivṛttasvabhāva iti nirdeśo 'pi kathamupapannaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4305: tatra paramārthatvena nirdiṣṭānāmārthānamavastubhūtānāṃ subhāṣitādivibhāgo 'pi naiva suśaka iti codyaṃ tāvat siddhasādhanameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4308: ataḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitatvena yadi tathatāsvabhāvo naiva vibhāgārhastadā naivāyaṃ kaścanāpi doṣa iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4309: ityevaṃ ye tāthāgatāgamāḥ pratyakṣaparokṣatayā paramārtathābhidhāyakā dehavatāṃ ca hitasukhajanakāste subhāṣitānītyucyante,
T04ksmadhlu:4310: tadviparītāni na subhāṣitānīti teṣāṃ bhedaḥ sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:4311: bhavanmatānusāraṃ tavannāmnaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvatayopādānāt subhāṣitāsubhāṣitarupeṇa kathaṃ vyavasthā kriyate?
T04ksmadhlu:4318: yato hi abhidheyādisamastavastūni paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvena māyādivat parikalpitasvabhāvāni /
T04ksmadhlu:4320: tathaiva paramārthato niḥsvabhāvāni vastūni kathaṃ na vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyante?
T04ksmadhlu:4321: viśeṣataḥ kevalaṃ vastusvabhāva eva śabdārthasāmānyasvarūpo bhavatīti yaduktaṃ tatra kimapi kāraṇaṃ naiva paśyāmaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4322: anādīti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vastubhūtaṃ tasyāpyasaditi sāmānyavyavahāro dṛśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4323: sukhādīni svasaṃvedyāṃ - nittyādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tadapi naiva yujyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4324: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃvṛtyantargatatvāditi pūrvaṃ kṛta eva nirdeśaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4325: vastūni kevalamanidarśanasvabhāvāni eva bhaviṣyantīti yaduktaṃ tatrāpi nāsti kācana yuktiḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4328: na tu satsvabhāvā nirdiṣṭā iti pūrvamuktameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4333: yatāvat paramārthe hyāropitasvabhāvaḥ sa saṃvṛtireva sa [paramārthastu] sarvaprapañcātītaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4337: yadi paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavākcittaniṣedhamātrasvabhāvaḥ syāttadā sa paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ na gacchet,
T04ksmadhlu:4341: teṣu vastuvāsanāyā api pūrvaṃ kṛtaniṣedhāt kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyantargatābyeva tānyoto 'nyataḥ pūrtirnaivāvaśyakī /
T04ksmadhlu:4342: yadi pramāṇairabhāvo naiva māyādibhirbhinnastathāpi paramārthataḥ svataḥ saditi nāma kriyate tadā saharṣaṃ kriyatāṃ svairamutsavo 'pyanubhūyatām,
T04ksmadhlu:4343: kintu svamatānakūlyena kṛtāṃ vyavasthāṃ vastūni naivānuvidadhate /
T04ksmadhlu:4344: pratītyasamutpannatā svasaṃvedyatā ca naiva vastūno heturbhavati,
T04ksmadhlu:4346: yadyapratītyasamutpannatve vastūni naiva dṛśyate tadā tadadarśanamanyatrāpi tathaiva syāditi kathanasambaddhameva,
T04ksmadhlu:4351: vastūnāṃ yadi samyaktvaṃ tadā sthitatvāsthitatvatoḥ parasparavirodho 'pyanupapanna eveti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:4355: tāni sarvāṇi calasvabhāvāni vastūni māyādivat prakṛtyā niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇarahitāni,
T04ksmadhlu:4357: so 'pi [svabhāva] tathāgataḥ syānnavā syāt sarvadā sthitatvānnityaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4363: satya iva prasiddhatvāt taccintanādhikareṇa satyeti nāmnā vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4370: tayā vyavasthitaṃ jagat tadadhikāreṇa yataḥ satyamityucyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4371: ataḥ saṃvṛtiravaśyaṃ vastutayā svīkartavyeti yaduktaṃ tasyāpyayuktatvāt pratijñā naiva hāpayituṃ śakyā /
T04ksmadhlu:4373: yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ sā saṃvṛtiḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:4374: yadyapramāṇaṃ tadā kathaṃ tayā nairātmyaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyam?
T04ksmadhlu:4376: yato hi yathā anumānajñānasya mithyākāragrahaṇapravṛtatvāt saṃvṛtisvabhāvatve 'pi
T04ksmadhlu:4383: [72] yāni vijñānādīni saṃvṛtibījāni tāni paramārthato 'ṅgīkarttavyānīti yaduktaṃ tanna yaktiyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:4385: yato hyeteṣāṃ svānurūpahetavastāvadanādisaṃvṛtirūpā iti svīkriyanta eva,
T04ksmadhlu:4387: yadi tad bījaṃ paramārthasiddhamekaṃ ceti tadā kutrāpi tadanvayābhāvādanaikāntikameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4388: vṛkṣādyaśeṣasaṃvṛtioināṃ yadyuttaropādānahetvānukūlyaṃ na parikṣiṣyante tadā ramaṇīyatāmātrameva dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4390: yakṣānurūpabaleḥ sadbhāvāt sarvāstāḥ saṃvṛtayo 'satsvabhāvāḥ prasādhitā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4391: anyathā [yadyevaṃ na syāt] katha tāḥ saṃvṛtaya iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4394: tadviruddhatvād asiddhatvāt pramāṇabādhitatvācceti tā gauṇā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4395: [73] vastusvabhāvastāvat svīkriyata iti yaduktaṃ tattu yena kāraṇena vastusvabhāvaḥ svīkriyate tena satyadvayabhedānudhānaṃ kutrāpi naiva sidhyati
T04ksmadhlu:4397: teṣu ye utpādādayaḥ samāropyante te saṃvṛtisatyatvena vyāvasthāpyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4398: pramāṇaiḥ samyaṅ nirupya anāropitā ye tāvadanutpādādayaste paramārthasatyatayā vyāhriyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4399: ataḥ paramārthato 'satyapi vastusvabhāve satyadvayaṃ vyāvasthāpyata eveti gauṇā eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4404: aviparītasya jñānasya artha iti viṣaya iti kṛtvā sā paramārtha ityucyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4405: yatkhalu viṣayi lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ tadanyaśbdārthaprayogairapi vyavahriyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4406: śravaṇamananabhāvanopajātāyāḥ prajñāyā anukūlatvād vyavahāreṇaiva sā evamabhidhīyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4407: tatra yena kāraṇena paramārthatattvalakṣaṇabhāvanayā yogibhiraśeṣasaṃkleśān parihatya uttarottaraprajñādiviśeguṇāṃścadhigamya mahārthatvaṃ prasādhyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4409: tadapi lokottaraṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sarvakalpanāvigatatvāt sarvadharmanirābhāsatvācca svasaṃvedyamanupalambhātmakaṃ ca,
T04ksmadhlu:4412: anena vastuviṣayataḥ samyagatītatvena nirdeśādālambanadarśanasya niṣedha eva kṛtaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4415: api ca, yadyasti tāvadekaḥ tāvadekaḥ kaścana gauṇaḥ paramārthastadā nirvāṇaṃ tāvat kīdṛśaḥ paramārthaḥ?
T04ksmadhlu:4416: tatra kasyāpi vastunaḥ samyaktayā arthasvabhāvasambhavābhāvāt tadapi kathamebhiścodyairanavamardanīyaṃ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4418: paramārthe vastūni tāvanna santīti yaduktaṃ tadapi paramārthamadhikṛtya jñānātmakatvaṃ samyagaviparītatvenāsadevetyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:4419: ekena khalu prakāreṇa paramārthastāvadasanniti yaduktaṃ tattattvato vicāreṇāsadevetyarthaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4420: [75] saṃvṛtiparamārthayorekatvamiti yaduktaṃ tatra bhagavān paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskāralakṣaṇena saha tattvato nānyaṃ nānanyamiti svayamevoktavān
T04ksmadhlu:4422: “yaduta yadi paramārthalakṣaṇam saṃskārebhyo nānyaṃ [abhinna] syāttadā sarve bālapṛthagjanāḥ satyadarśinaḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4424: yathā ca saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśalakṣaṇāstathaiva paramārtho 'pi saṃkleśalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4425: tathā ca yathā paramārthaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣvabhinnastathā saṃskāralakṣaṇanyapi[abhinnāni] syuḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4428: bhūtārthaprāpteranantaraṃ yogibhiḥ paramārthagaveṣaṇaṃ naiva yujyata iti paramārthastāvat saṃskārebhyo nāstyanyo nānyo 'pīti /
T04ksmadhlu:4431: nimittabandhanairamuktatvānna ca te doṣṭhulyabandhanādapi muktāḥ syuḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4433: api ca, paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ yadi saṃskāralakṣaṇebhyo bhinnaṃ syāttadā na syāt paramārthaḥ
T04ksmadhlu:4434: saṃskārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam na ca paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā vā syāt,
T04ksmadhlu:4438: paramārthalakṣaṇe tu niḥsvabhāvatvena tattvānyatvābhyaṃ vastu nābhidhātuṃ śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4439: vastusattve hi tattvānyatvabodhasya sambhavānna tu niḥsvabhāve vastuni tatsambhavaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4441: jñānātmakaparamartho 'pi saṃvṛtyā saha tathatālakṣaṇe paramārthākāre ekatvena svīkriyata eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4450: jñānātmakastu paramārtho māyādibhirabhinnatvāt samyaksaṃvṛtisvabhāvaśca tattvāvabodhānukūlatvāt paramārthasvabhāvaśca /
T04ksmadhlu:4454: itthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭisamutthitā eva dānādayaḥ parisuddahetusamutthitatvādiṣṭaphalaṃ viśeṣaphalaṃ cābhinirharanti,
T04ksmadhlu:4459: atastatsamutthitapāramitānaṃ sarvo 'pi prayāso mithyātmātmīyasamutthitadānādivad aviśuddhahetusamutthitatvenātyantaṃ nirbala eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4465: yena kāraṇena dānādiṣvapravṛteḥ puṇyābhāvastāni dātavyādīni naivātyantamasadbhūtāni,
T04ksmadhlu:4472: upākuśalā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parisampadayanti?
T04ksmadhlu:4474: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānaṃ datvā parityajanti tadā māyābuddhireva ṭeṣāṃ dāne sūpatiṣṭhatīti” vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4475: ata eva bhagavan ye bodhisattvā bhavanti,
T04ksmadhlu:4480: kintu pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāṃ tāvat te pravartanta eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4484: ata eva prajñāpāramitādiṣvapi śūnyatādhimuktasya anupalambhāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni paripūrṇāni cetyuktāni /
T04ksmadhlu:4502: yadarthaṃ hi pariṇāmanā vidhīyate tadapi niḥsvabhāvatvenaiva jñeyam /
T04ksmadhlu:4505: tathaiva upādātā deyaṃ dānaphalaṃ pariṇāmanā bodhiśceti tattasvabhāvena śūnyā iti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4507: tad dānaṃ ca dānapāramiteti saṃjñāṃ pratilabhate,
T04ksmadhlu:4508: na tu kadāpi malinā bhaviṣyati” iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4509: ityevamanupalambhasamāśritāni dānādīni bṛhatphalāni viśuddhāni ca bhānti /
T04ksmadhlu:4514: yadyātmanāsattvānniḥsvabhāvāstadā siddhasādhanameveti yaduktaṃ tadapi yadyātmanā 'sattvānni' svabhāvatvena vyavastāpyate tadā na ca viruddhatvaṃ nāpi siddhasādhanamiti /
T04ksmadhlu:4515: yato hi yadi vastunaḥ svabhāvo 'vipoarītatadā parāpekṣayā tatsattvam tatsattvam āditaścāsattvaṃ naivopapadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4517: phalatastāvadimāni vastūni paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parāpekṣitānītyato niḥsvabhāvanyeva /
T04ksmadhlu:4518: na hi svabhāvasya kṛtakatvaṃ nāma yujyata iti pūrvaṃ kṛtanirdeśāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4519: na caisāṃ paramārthataḥ parāpekṣayāpi sattvamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam /
T04ksmadhlu:4523: evameva yadi vastvādīni prakṛtitaḥ sasvabhāvāni tadā svātmanāsattvaṃ svabhāvena ca sattvaṃ naivopapadyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4525: ekasmin vatūni sattvāsattvasthitāsthiotatvādayaḥ parasparaviruddhadharmā naiva yujyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4528: parikalpitātmanā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ tadā naiva siddhasādhanamiti pūrvameva prasādhitam,
T04ksmadhlu:4533: yaccāryāṇāṃ paramajñānagocaraṃ vastūnāmaviparītaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi naiva saditi yuktyagamābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipaditameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4537: [78] sarvāṇi tāvad vastūnyādita ev notpannānityato 'nupannānīti yaduktaṃ tatra naiva siddhasādhanādayo doṣāḥ pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:4538: yato hi sarve dharmāḥ paramārthato 'nādikāladeva praśāntatvādanutpannā ityabhyupagamyante,
T04ksmadhlu:4541: api ca, bhagavatā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ santrāsaparivarjanārthamebhirapi prakārairvastūnāmanutpattiḥ sandarśitā,
T04ksmadhlu:4544: parikalpitātmanā svātmanā vanutpāde 'pi naiva siddhasādhanamiti nirdiśyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4548: sarve tāvad dharmā dharmadhātulakṣaṇāyāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ samarasatvena tathātākāratayā naiva viśeṣotpattirityato 'nutpattirabhyupagamyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4557: [triyānasādhanam] yadapi sādhanaviśeṇa yānatrayasiddhayanumānaṃ śraddhāviśeṣeṇa ca gotraviśeṣānumānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tenāpi yanatrayaṃ sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4559: punaścanena yānatrayasādhanānumitasya gotratrayasyāpi niścitāvabodho naiva kartuṃ śakyaḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4561: sūtre 'pi - “evaṃ hi sati aparimitasya yānabhedasya yanabhedasyaprasaṅgaḥ syāt” - ityukyam /
T04ksmadhlu:4562: yena khalu kāraṇena sattveṣu gotrabhedānumānasya niyatā siddhiḥ niyataśca śraddhabhedābodhaḥ pratīyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4565: te 'pi kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4566: ye kalyāṇamitrasamparkādinā kevalaṃ parahitacintane pravartamānā avalokyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4567: ye khalvalpamātrake svasukhe hite cāsajyamānāḥ pareṣu daurmanasyaṃ dhārayanti,
T04ksmadhlu:4573: ato gotrabhedasyāpyaniyatatayā kathaṃ tāvad yānatrayaniścayaḥ sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4574: sattvanāṃ vivuidhāśayavaśenāpi gotrabhedo niścetuṃ na śakyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4575: yāni tāvat pañcābhisamayagotrāṇi tānyapi ekaniścayābhiprāyeṇaiva nirdiṣṭāni,
T04ksmadhlu:4577: tasminneva hi sūtre gotrāṇyanātyantikatayaiva nirdiṣṭāni / tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4579: punarapi tathāgatādhiṣṭhānāt kadācit karhicit kuśalamūlān vyutthāpayati /
T04ksmadhlu:4586: yato hi tathāgatā lokasya vividhāśayavaśena vividhāni yānāni nirdiśanto dharmopadeśe pravartante,
T04ksmadhlu:4590: tadanantadameva tena aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4601: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ bodhisattvamārge pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ” iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4607: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
T04ksmadhlu:4608: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4611: ata eva āryasaddharmapuṇḍarīkasūtrādau ekayānanirdeśo naiva neyārtha iti pratipāditam tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4614: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ upāyajauśalyena tadaivaikaṃ buddhayanaṃ triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti” /
T04ksmadhlu:4623: ye bhunti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
T04ksmadhlu:4625: upāyametaṃ kurute svayambhū bauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
T04ksmadhlu:4626: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha //
T04ksmadhlu:4627: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
T04ksmadhlu:4628: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathañci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaścayam //
T04ksmadhlu:4629: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4630: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ //
T04ksmadhlu:4631: pratoṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayambhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
T04ksmadhlu:4632: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhāpeti //
T04ksmadhlu:4633: mārtsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
T04ksmadhlu:4634: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattva na mametu sādhu //
T04ksmadhlu:4635: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtīyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
T04ksmadhlu:4637: tatra prajvalitagṛhāntaḥsthitān bālajanān bahirniṣkāsayitumupāyabhūtasya vāhanaviśeṣasya dṛṣṭāntadvārā,
T04ksmadhlu:4638: tadvadeva ratnadvīpasthitaṃ nāyakapuruṣaṃ nivartayitumupāyabhūtasya madhye 'raṇyaṃ nagaranirmāṇasya ca dṛṣṭāntadvārā bhagavān upāyabhūtāni yāni trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭavān,
T04ksmadhlu:4641: “mañjuśrīḥ, tasmin buddhakṣetre yānenaikena niryāstīti tad yānaṃ tāvat sāravat syāditi /
T04ksmadhlu:4648: kasmaicicca śrāvakayānaṃ nirdiśeyustadā tathāgatasya tāvaccittam apariśuddhamabhiniveśajuṣṭaṃ ca syāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4649: prādeśikī ca tasya mahākaruṇā syānnānātvasaṃjñā ca /
T04ksmadhlu:4652: yebhyaśca sattvebhyo 'haṃ dharmamupadiśāmi te sarve bodhiniyatā mahāyānaparāyaṇāḥ sarvajñatābhinirhatāḥ pakṣaikaniṣṭhāśca bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:4666: “yacca parinirvāṇaṃ yāni ca trīṇi yānānyupadiṣṭāni tatsarvaṃ tathāgatānāmupāyamātram,
T04ksmadhlu:4668: ” ata eva ekayānanirdeśastāvadābhiprāyika iti vacanasya dharmadhātulakṣaṇe sarvayānānāṃ
T04ksmadhlu:4672: āryadaśadharmādau yānatrayanirdeśastu upāyasvarūpatvād vineyajanebhyaḥ sa ekayānanirdeśābhiprāyeṇaiva vihita ityeva niśceyam /
T04ksmadhlu:4674: na tu vāstavika ityato vineyajanā naiva teṣu pravartante /
T04ksmadhlu:4675: mahāyānasūtrākaṅkāre hi - ekasya yānasya ca yā hi deśanā tadānukūlyena prayojanena sā /
T04ksmadhlu:4676: iti yaduktaṃ tacchrāvakāṇāṃ yadyanuśayasamucchedo jāyeta tadā jāterapi sarvathopacchedād
T04ksmadhlu:4677: anekajanmaparamparāsamudāgataṃ buddhātvaṃ kathaṃ nāma sādhyaṃ syāditi kathanaṃ tu
T04ksmadhlu:4680: “arhato 'pi vināśasadbhāvāttatsaṃtrāsena tāvadarhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā api bhagavataḥ śaraṇaṃ pratipadyante,
T04ksmadhlu:4687: yadi naiva te teṣāṃ parihāraṃ kurvīran tadā santyaneke nirvāṇadhātorapasārakāsteṣu prahātavyadharmā...” iti vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4688: yaśca jātikṣaya ityādinā kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ samudbhavastasya neyārthatvaṃ tu taminneva sūtre nirdiṣṭam / tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4689: “bhagavan, arhantāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vimuktiṃ yāvad yat pratyekṣaṇājñānaṃ yāścāśvāsādhāyikāścatastro 'nusmṛtayastat sarvamābhiprāyikam,
T04ksmadhlu:4692: dvidhā bhavati cyutiḥsamucchedikā ca acityapariṇāminī ceti /
T04ksmadhlu:4695: bhagavan, arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptabodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayakāyasya cyutistu bodhimaṇḍaparyantam acintyapariṇāminyeva bhavati
T04ksmadhlu:4696: bhagavan, anayordayoścyutyoḥ samucchedacyuteradhikāre tāvadarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jātikṣayo jāyata iti pratīyate........ iti' vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4697: anayostāvaccyutyoravidyāvāsabhūmipratyayairanāstravakarmahetubhiḥ samudbhūtā jātistu bhavatyeveti nirdiṣṭam / tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4700: avidyāvāsabhūmipratyayā anāstravakarmahetukā arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca manomayāstrayaḥ kāyāḥ sambhavanti.....iti” vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4701: āryalaṅkāvatārasūtre cāpi nirdiṣṭaṃ yad dhātutrayātikrānta api te 'nāstravadhātau avasthitā bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:4702: atastathāgatādhiṣṭhānena jātivaśitāṃ prāpya sambhāradvayaṃ ca paripūrya te buddhatvamavāpnuvantīti / tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4705: punarapi lokottarānāstravadhātuparyāpannān sambhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartītāṃ pratilapsyante /
T04ksmadhlu:4707: tathā hi śravako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
T04ksmadhlu:4710: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nirvartate /
T04ksmadhlu:4713: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
T04ksmadhlu:4714: atra khalu kāṣṭhodadhyupamayā bhavasāgare pravahamānatvaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4715: taraṅgopamayā tāvad dharmalakṣaṇaṃ prati abhiniveśavaśāt parinirvāṇaṃ na prāpyata iti saṅketitam /
T04ksmadhlu:4718: 'niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti' ityādinā tāvannirvāṇanagare 'praviṣṭāstathā bhavasāgare 'pi na bhramantīti /
T04ksmadhlu:4720: tadantaraṃ tato vyatthāya sambhārān paripūrya buddhatvāvāptirityādikaṃ spaṣṭatayā nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4721: yaccāpyāryalaṅkāvatārādisūtreṣu nirmitaśrāvakānadhikṛtya śrāvakavyākaranaṃ kṛtaṃ taddhīnādhimuktasattvānāṃ bhayaparihārārthaṃ yānatrayanirdeśopāyapradarśanārthaṃ ceti jñātavyam /
T04ksmadhlu:4727: ato 'nayā yuktyā te sattvā buddhatvaṃ pratyabhimukhīkriyanta iti /“
T04ksmadhlu:4729: ato 'nekajanmaparamaparāsādhyaṃ buddhatvaṃ na pratilabhanta iti tadā bodhipariṇāmitānāmapyarhatāṃ na pratisandhirna ca teṣu buddhātvādhigama iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4730: yadi praṇidhānabalena tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena ca teṣāṃ pratisandhirabhyupagamyate,
T04ksmadhlu:4737: yadi te sarveṇa sarvamanuttarasamyaksaṃbodheye abhavyā iti tadā kathaṃ nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ vighnaṃ na kariṣyāmītyuktam /
T04ksmadhlu:4743: parigṛhyocchinno 'smi buddhāyānāditi vadedetāvanme samucchrayasya paścimakaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ
T04ksmadhlu:4746: arhantastāvat kleśakṣayahetoḥ sarvathā naiva pratisandadhate, tathātvāt /
T04ksmadhlu:4748: ye ca kāmadhāturāgarahitā anāgāminaste buddhagotrakā iti /
T04ksmadhlu:4749: dvividhā api te 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ acintyapariṇāminyā jātyā yuktatvātteṣāmiti
T04ksmadhlu:4755: “arhattvaṃ samadhigamya yadi sa samyaksaṃbodhimabhilaṣate tadā kathaṃ nāma ajātiṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti,
T04ksmadhlu:4759: apitu acityaparinirvāṇe pariṇāmanayā tasya jātiṃ prajñapayāmiti” /
T04ksmadhlu:4766: kṣatriyakule 'bhiṣikaḥ kaścana rājakumāro yadi sarvāsāṃ śilpavidyānāmadhyayanaṃ karoti /
T04ksmadhlu:4767: sa nāsti tīkṣṇendriyo 'pi tu mandendriyaḥ san paścādadhyeyasya pāṭhayasya prathamam,
T04ksmadhlu:4770: kimetāvatā sa nāsti rājakumāra iti kathayiṣyate?
T04ksmadhlu:4775: tathaiva bodhisattvagotrakā api ye mandendriyāste pūrvaṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa kleśakṣayaṃ kṛtvā paścādanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau abhisambuddhā bhaviṣyantīti /” vistaraḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4777: tadarthastāvat sarveṣāṃ buddhatvasāmīpyāpekṣābhiprāyeṇeti - yaduktaṃ tadapi svecchāmātropakalpitatvādayuktameva /
T04ksmadhlu:4778: sārvagatikānāṃ bhavyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathoktamityatra ko virodhaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4779: tathaiva cāryaratnameghādisūtreṣvapi bhagavataḥ śākyamunernāmaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikabījāropaṇād abhedena sarve sattvā avaivartikatve vyākriyante,
T04ksmadhlu:4781: ato yena śrāvaṇaṃ yena vā śravaṇaṃ yaśca śrotā teṣavapi avaivartikabījāni vidyanta eva,
T04ksmadhlu:4782: yato hi bhavatāṃ mate 'pi malānāmāgantukatvāccittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaramabhyupagamyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4785: sarve sattvāstathāgatagarbhā iti yaduktaṃ tena sarve 'pyanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhipadaprāptiyogyā evopadarśitāḥ,
T04ksmadhlu:4786: yato hi tathāgataśbdo dharmadhātuḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyalakṣaṇaḥ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraścetyeteṣvartheṣvabhyupagamyate /
T04ksmadhlu:4787: tathā ca nirdeśena sarve 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhisvabhāvā eva nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4788: api ca, 'yānam' iti yaduktaṃ tadapi nirvāṇagaraprāpako jñānātmako mārga evetyuktam,
T04ksmadhlu:4800: ato yattāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatattvasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tadeva nirvāṇaprāpakaḥ samyaṅ mārgo nānyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4802: eta eva bhagavatā nānyena tāvanmārgeṇa mokṣa iti nirdiṣṭam /
T04ksmadhlu:4824: ityanena prakrāreṇa dvayasaṃjñānukūlā kṣāntirapi tāvadasattvena jñānavyeti prakaṭitam /
T04ksmadhlu:4825: āryasatyadvayāvatārasūtre 'pi prajñaptaṃ yat sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ bhāvābhiniveśa eva /
T04ksmadhlu:4826: ata eva sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabhāvanayaiva tāvat kleśāḥ parihartuṃ śakyante,
T04ksmadhlu:4827: nānyena kenacinmārgeṇeti kṛto nirdeśaḥ / tathā hi -
T04ksmadhlu:4843: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavanti /
T04ksmadhlu:4845: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃṃ vinītā draṣṭavyā /
T04ksmadhlu:4848: kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittān prajānāti,
T04ksmadhlu:4863: taiḥ kumārgavicārān dūrata eva parityajya mahātmabhiryo hi yuktyāgamapradīpaḥ prakāśīkṛtaḥ sadbhiśca puruṣaiḥ [yaḥ] muhurmuhurāveditaḥ sa sādaraṃ nirantaraṃ ca sadā sevanīyaḥ /
T04ksmadhlu:4865: sarve ca dharmāḥ paramārthato niḥ svābhāvā iti sidhyati /
T04ksmadhlu:4867: bhāratīyopādhyāśīlendrabodhinā bhoṭadeśīyānuvādakena dpala brcegas mahābhāgena cānūditam /
